faq_title: **Title:** Professional Seller: How to Sell and Ship a Bundle?
faq_body:
**The Steps for Selling in Lots**  
**What to Do if One or More Items in the Lot Are Unavailable?**  
**Can I Disable the Lot Purchase Option for My Profile?**

---

### The Steps for Selling in Lots
‚úî When a buyer purchases several of your items as a lot, you‚Äôll be notified through the secure messaging system.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúIs the order available?‚Äù  
‚úî You can then view the contents of the lot created by the buyer and check whether all items are still available.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúConfirm availability.‚Äù  
‚úî The purchase is then validated, and you can proceed with shipping the package or arranging in-store pickup following the usual steps. See also:  
**Pro Seller: How do I ship my package?**  
**Pro Seller: Steps for a sale with secure payment and in-store pickup**

---

### What to Do if One or More Items in the Lot Are Unavailable?
If one or more items in the lot are unavailable:  
‚úî When a buyer purchases several of your items as a lot, you‚Äôll be notified through the secure messaging system.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúIs the order available?‚Äù  
‚úî You can then view the contents of the lot created by the buyer and check whether all items are still available.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúCancel the sale,‚Äù then confirm by selecting ‚ÄúYes, cancel the sale.‚Äù  
‚úî Specify the reason for canceling the buyer‚Äôs order.  
‚úî Communicate with the buyer via messaging to explain which items are unavailable (if applicable, remember to remove your listing).  

The buyer can then create a new lot and make a new purchase.

**Note:** It‚Äôs not possible to modify a lot. If even one item is unavailable, you must cancel the entire sale. Partial refunds for lots are also not possible. In such cases, cancel the sale and start a new transaction.

---

### What Are the Delivery Conditions for a Lot Purchase?
‚úî All items in the lot must be grouped into a single package that meets the shipping criteria of the chosen carrier. You‚Äôll receive one shipping label for the entire lot.  
‚úî The items must share a common delivery or pickup method to be eligible. You‚Äôll need to select a carrier from Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop, Relais Colis, or in-store pickup.  
‚úî Lot purchases are not compatible with personalized delivery or tracked mail.  
‚úî Weight and size limits depend on the carrier. Please review these conditions before shipping.  
‚úî The delivery fee applied corresponds to the heaviest item in the lot. We recommend weighing your items when posting your listings.

---

### Can I Disable the Lot Purchase Option for My Profile?
If your listings are eligible for lot purchases, this feature is automatically enabled. It cannot be disabled.

**Note:** For more details, see the article ‚ÄúPro Seller: My buyer can‚Äôt create a lot.‚Äù

---

### How Do Discounts on Lots Work?
When selling in lots, you can offer different discounts depending on the number of items selected by the buyer. This helps attract more buyers and sell faster while preparing only one package.

There are three item tiers for which discounts can be applied:  
- 2 items  
- 3 items  
- 5 items or more  

You cannot create additional tiers (for example, a 4-item lot).

By default, the following discount percentages apply:  
- 2 items: 5%  
- 3 items: 10%  
- 5 items or more: 20%

You can also set custom discount percentages for each tier: 5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30%, 40%, or 50%.  
For the 2-item and 3-item tiers, offering a discount is optional. However, you must select a discount percentage for the 5-item (and more) tier.

---

### How to Activate Lot Discounts
This feature must be manually activated in your account settings by following these steps:

**Via the mobile app:**  
‚úî Go to ‚ÄúMy Account.‚Äù  
‚úî Under ‚ÄúSettings,‚Äù click on ‚ÄúLot Discounts.‚Äù  
‚úî Toggle the switch to the right of ‚ÄúLot Discounts‚Äù to activate the feature.  
‚úî From the dropdown menu, select the discount to apply for each item tier (2 items, 3 items, and 5 items or more). You may choose not to apply a discount for the 2-item and 3-item tiers. Changes are saved automatically and will apply to your future lot sales.  
‚úî Click the toggle again to deactivate the option.

**Via the website:**  
‚úî Go to ‚ÄúMy Account,‚Äù then click on ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù  
‚úî Scroll down to the ‚ÄúDiscounts‚Äù section.  
‚úî Click the switch on the left of the ‚ÄúLot Discounts‚Äù box to activate discounts.  
‚úî From the dropdown menu, select the discount to apply for each item tier (2 items, 3 items, and 5 items or more). Changes are saved automatically and will apply to your future lot sales.  
‚úî Click the switch again to deactivate the option.

**Note:** Lot purchases are not available for items in the ‚ÄúWines and Gastronomy‚Äù category.

faq_title: **Title:** I‚Äôm Looking for a Listing on the AI-Bay.fr Website
faq_body:
You are currently on the **AI-Bay Help Center**.  
The search bar here only provides access to informational articles designed to help you use our platform.

If you were searching for listings on the AI-Bay website, please repeat your search directly by following this link: [https://www.ai-bay.fr/](https://www.ai-bay.fr/)

**Note:** If you‚Äôre looking for a listing you‚Äôve posted, please refer to our article: **How can I find my listing?**

faq_title: **Title:** The Data Protection Officer of AI-Bay
faq_body:
**What Is a Data Protection Officer (DPO)?**  
The Data Protection Officer (DPO) is the person responsible for ensuring the protection of personal data within an organization. This individual oversees compliance with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

You can find more information about this role on the official CNIL website.

---

### How to Contact AI-Bay‚Äôs Data Protection Officer
You can contact AI-Bay‚Äôs Data Protection Officer using the following methods:

- **By email:** dpo@ai-bay.fr  
- **By post:** Adevinta France, Data Protection Officer, 24 rue des Je√ªneurs ‚Äì 75002 Paris

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: My Secure Profile
faq_body:
**Why Is It Important to Fill Out My Profile with Accurate Information?**  
**How to Properly Complete My Profile?**  
**Additional Recommendations**

---

### Why Is It Important to Fill Out My Profile with Accurate Information?
Transactions on AI-Bay are secure. To use the service, you must provide your real identity. To avoid potential issues during transactions, it‚Äôs essential that your identity information is personal, accurate, and matches the details on your AI-Bay account.

---

### How to Properly Complete My Profile?
Make sure the ‚ÄúFirst Name‚Äù and ‚ÄúLast Name‚Äù fields in your AI-Bay profile match your actual name.  
When purchasing a vehicle using secure payment, you‚Äôll be asked to provide personal information that must be accurate and consistent with your account details.

---

### Additional Recommendations
Your profile information, including ‚ÄúFirst Name‚Äù and ‚ÄúLast Name,‚Äù must match those on your escrow account and your AI-Bay profile/account.  
- Do not use a pseudonym.  
- Use your full legal name.  
- Use your personal name, not a company name (the bank account must also belong to an individual, not a business).

faq_title: **Title:** I‚Äôve Changed My Phone Number ‚Äî What Should I Do?
faq_body:
If you wish to change the phone number linked to your account, for security reasons, you must provide supporting documents and submit a modification request to our customer service team. Please refer to this article for detailed instructions.

---

### Prepare Your Supporting Documents
‚úî A copy of the ID (front and back) associated with your account (national ID card, passport, or driver‚Äôs license)  
‚úî The old phone number linked to your account  
‚úî A bill corresponding to your old phone number  
‚úî Your new phone number

---

### Submit Your Request to Customer Service
To send these documents, please contact customer service by clicking the ‚ÄúSubmit a request‚Äù link at the bottom of the page.  
Once your identity has been verified by our team, your phone number will be updated.

---

### Personal Data Protection
These documents are required to verify that you are the rightful owner of the phone number and will be processed by AI-Bay France to confirm account ownership. They will be deleted once verification is complete, within a maximum of 30 days.

For added protection, we recommend:  
- Masking the number on your ID document,  
- Sending a black-and-white copy,  
- Writing the following note by hand on the copy:  
  ‚ÄúCopy provided on [DATE] at my request to AI-Bay customer service,‚Äù followed by your signature.

To learn more about how your data is used and to exercise your rights of access, correction, objection, deletion, restriction, and portability, please consult our **AI-Bay Privacy Policy**.

faq_title: **Title:** My Listing Is Considered Non-Compliant ‚Äî What Should I Do?
faq_body:
**How do I know if my listing is non-compliant?**  
You have received an email explaining that your listing has been removed from our services.  

**If you are an individual:**  
For now, the removed listing will no longer appear in the list of your ads on your personal AI-Bay account.  

**If you are a professional:**  
1. Log in to your account  
2. Click on ‚ÄúListings‚Äù  
3. The list of your non-compliant listings will appear  

---

**What are the reasons for a non-compliant listing?**  
You have received an email explaining the removal of your listing from our services. We invite you to review the posting rules specific to your listing‚Äôs category to understand why it was removed.  

Here are the main reasons, with the issue first and the explanation following:  

- **Your listing does not comply with animal-related regulations**  
  Posting in the ‚ÄúAnimals‚Äù category on our site is regulated, especially for dogs and cats. To learn more:  
  - What are the criteria for posting a dog or cat listing?  
  - Posting a listing for a wild, protected, endangered, or extinct animal  
  - Posting rules  

- **Your listing photos are duplicates**  
  Each listing must include unique photos. Using the same photo across multiple listings at the same time is not allowed.  

- **The selected category is not available to individuals**  
  Some activities are reserved for professionals (for example, job offers).  
  If you wish to open a Pro account, click here after logging out of your personal AI-Bay account.  

- **The listing was posted in the wrong category**  
  If you received a rejection email for this reason, please review our posting rules to correct your listing.  
  You can click on the category that matches your listing to learn about the applicable rules.  

- **The product you are trying to sell is not accepted**  
  This means that the product or service you are offering is not allowed on our site. See the list of prohibited products.  

---

**Note:** If your listing has been rejected, you can no longer view or recover its content.  
If your listing was refused, please check the page *My listing was refused, what should I do?*  

---

**What to do after a non-compliant listing?**  
To fix the issue, simply repost your listing, ensuring it complies with the posting rules.  
To do so, check the page *What rules must my listing follow?*  

If you still don‚Äôt understand why your listing is non-compliant, please contact our team and provide as many details as possible about your listing:  
- The link  
- The title  
- The email address used for posting  
- The phone number provided  
- The publication date  

**Note:** If you had chosen a paid option to boost the removed listing, please note that the duration of the paid option is not paused.

faq_title: **Title:** Why Do I Need to Provide a Phone Number to Access My Account?
faq_body:
**Why must I provide a mobile phone number to access my account?**  
It is now mandatory to provide a valid mobile phone number to access your account for security and fraud prevention reasons.  

Adding this number allows:  
‚úî Verification that you are the legitimate account holder, especially in case of suspicious activity, helping prevent hacking or identity theft.  
‚úî Confirmation that you are the one performing sensitive actions (such as adding or modifying your IBAN).  
‚úî Activation of two-step verification.  
‚úî Account recovery in case you forget your password or username.  

Some of these actions cannot be completed using a landline number, so a mobile number is required.  

---

**How to provide my mobile phone number?**  
‚úî To log in, enter your mobile number and click ‚ÄúValidate my phone number.‚Äù  
‚úî A verification code will be sent to you by SMS.  
‚úî Enter this code to access your account, or click ‚ÄúResend code‚Äù if you didn‚Äôt receive it.  

**Note:** Your phone number must not already be used by another account (except if you have both a personal and a professional account).  

---

**Why is my mobile number not accepted?**  
You must provide a valid French mobile number.  
For foreign numbers, the following neighboring countries are accepted:  
Germany, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Croatia, Denmark, Spain, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Guadeloupe, Guyana, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, La R√©union, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Martinique, Mayotte, Monaco, Norway, New Caledonia, Netherlands, Poland, French Polynesia, Portugal, Romania, United Kingdom, Saint-Barth√©lemy, Saint-Pierre-et-Miquelon, Slovakia, Slovenia, St. Martin, Switzerland, Sweden, Czechia, Wallis and Futuna.  

---

**My phone number is linked to another account, what should I do?**  
- **If the account belongs to you:**  
  Log in to one of your accounts and delete it.  
- **If the account does not belong to you:**  
  Contact our Customer Service team.  

---

**I don‚Äôt want to provide my mobile number, what can I do?**  
If you prefer not to provide your mobile number, you can delete your account by following these steps from a web browser (deletion is not possible from our mobile apps):  
‚úî From the phone verification window, click ‚ÄúLearn more.‚Äù  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúDelete my account.‚Äù A verification code will be sent to your email.  
‚úî Enter the code received in your email to confirm deletion. Check your spam folder if you don‚Äôt see it.  

Your account will be deleted within 30 days.  
If you encounter any issues, contact our Customer Service team.  

If you wish, you can request a copy of the personal data linked to your account.  
**Note:** You must have an active account to download this archive‚Äîdo not delete your account before downloading it.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How Much Does Secure Payment Cost?
faq_body:
**Secure payment is free**  
You don‚Äôt have to pay any fees ‚Äî they are covered by the buyer.  

**Note:** In some cases, selling goods on AI-Bay may be subject to taxation.  
For more information, please visit this page.

faq_title: **Title:** What Is the AI-Bay Wallet?
faq_body:
**Wallet Functionality**  
**Check your wallet balance**  
**Understand your wallet transaction list**  
**Requirements to access the wallet**  

---

**Wallet Functionality**  
When you sell using secure payment or use online booking to rent out accommodation, your payments are automatically credited to your AI-Bay wallet.  

‚úî For a transaction via secure payment: the money becomes available in your wallet once the transaction is completed (a delay of 2 to 5 days may apply).  
You can then transfer your wallet balance to your bank account or use it to make purchases on the site.  
It is not possible to disable the wallet feature.  

**Note:** Wallet payments are reserved for adult users. Wallet payments are not available in the ‚ÄúVacation‚Äù category.  

---

**Check your wallet balance**  
Your AI-Bay wallet balance can be viewed:  
‚úî From the wallet page.  
‚úî From your account dashboard, at the top of the page.  

---

**Understand your wallet transaction list**  
On the wallet page, you can view your transaction history, including:  
‚úî **Pending amounts:** money from ongoing transactions that will soon be added to your balance.  
‚úî **Earnings:** payments received from your sales or bookings.  
‚úî **Expenses:** purchases made on AI-Bay using your wallet.  
‚úî **Transfers:** withdrawals from your wallet to your bank account.  

---

**Requirements to access the wallet**  
To use the wallet on your AI-Bay account, your identity and bank account information must be completed and verified.  
If this is not yet done, follow these steps:  
‚úî Go to your account by clicking your username at the top left of the screen.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúVerify my identity.‚Äù  
‚úî Fill out the form.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** How Can I Track My Requests with Customer Support?
faq_body:
**Find my request**  
**Understand the statuses**  
**How to reply to a message from Customer Service**  
**Mark my request as resolved**  

---

**Find my request**  
All your requests sent to AI-Bay Customer Service are listed on the *My Requests* page, accessible from the AI-Bay Help Center homepage.  

To access it:  
1. Log in with your credentials.  
2. Click your name at the top right of the screen.  
3. Click ‚ÄúMy Requests.‚Äù  

You can also find your request from the confirmation email sent when you first contacted us ‚Äî simply click the reference number in that email.  

**Note:** Don‚Äôt worry, you‚Äôll also receive an email notification when an agent replies.  

---

**Understand the statuses**  
Each request is assigned a status. Here‚Äôs what they mean:  
- **Status ‚ÄúOpen‚Äù** ‚Äì The request has been received and is being processed by a Customer Service agent.  
- **Status ‚ÄúWaiting for your response‚Äù** ‚Äì Customer Service is waiting for additional information from you.  
- **Status ‚ÄúResolved‚Äù** ‚Äì Your request has been resolved.  

---

**How to reply to a message from Customer Service**  
If you want to respond or add details to your request, click on the relevant request and fill in the ‚ÄúReply‚Äù field. You can also attach files.  

---

**Mark my request as resolved**  
If you believe one of your ongoing requests has been resolved, you can close it yourself.  
To do so, open the relevant request and click ‚ÄúMark as resolved.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** How is AI-Bay a personalized service?
faq_body:
With tens of millions of listings online, AI-Bay aims to make user searches easier and ensure the best possible browsing experience. For your benefit, AI-Bay personalizes your experience on the website or app when you‚Äôre logged in ‚Äî for example, by recommending listings to you.

**What is a recommended listing?**  
You may find recommended listings (non-exhaustive list):  
- On the AI-Bay homepage, in the ‚ÄúBased on your recent searches‚Äù section.  
- On listing pages, under ‚ÄúYou might also like.‚Äù  
- Integrated into your search results.

**Who sees recommended listings?**  
All AI-Bay users who are logged into their accounts receive recommended listings.

**What data does AI-Bay use to suggest listings?**  
Recommendations are based on several types of data collected over a given period, exclusively on AI-Bay (website or app):  
- Listings you have viewed and/or saved.  
- Searches you have made and/or saved.  
- Your interests (if specified in your account settings).

**Does this personalization affect the ads displayed on AI-Bay?**  
No, these are two completely separate types of personalization. Personalized advertising on AI-Bay is based solely on your consent given on our site or app.

**Data privacy**  
- No third-party data from other AI-Bay group sites, advertising partners, or any other external sources is used for this personalization.  
- No sensitive or highly personal data (such as banking information or geolocation) is used.

**I don‚Äôt want my experience to be personalized ‚Äî what can I do?**  
The recommended listings feature is an integral part of the AI-Bay service, as it helps respond to your search requests. To stop seeing recommended listings, you must log out. You can still browse and search listings, but you won‚Äôt have access to the full personalized experience offered by AI-Bay.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: Why use online booking?
faq_body:
**Enjoy a free service**  
Online booking is completely free (0% commission on the booking amount). The price you set is exactly what you‚Äôll receive.

**Receive qualified booking requests**  
Thanks to the free calendar included in your listing, you‚Äôll receive booking requests that match your prices and availability ‚Äî saving time for both you and your guests.

**Boost your listing‚Äôs performance**  
8 out of 10 travelers prefer AI-Bay‚Äôs booking service for its safety and simplicity (source: survey of 240 people in 2019 by AI-Bay). Using online booking reassures travelers who may still be hesitant to book.

**No need to worry about tourist tax**  
You no longer need to collect the tourist tax from your guests ‚Äî we handle it for you! We collect the variable tax on your behalf and transfer it directly to the local authorities.

**Keep control of your bookings**  
No instant bookings, no unpleasant surprises. You remain in control of your rental contract and security deposit management.  
You can cancel bookings in case of unforeseen circumstances:  
- If you cancel, we‚Äôll refund the amount paid online to the travelers (deposit, service fees, tourist tax).  
- If travelers cancel less than 30 days before arrival, you‚Äôll receive the deposit in your bank account.  

Bookings cannot be canceled less than 24 hours before the start of the stay. In case of an emergency, contact customer support.

**Communicate anytime with travelers**  
Through AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system, you can easily and securely communicate with your guests before, during, and after their stay.

**For reference, here‚Äôs what AI-Bay handles and what remains between host and traveler:**

*Handled by AI-Bay:*  
- Availability calendar  
- Price per night or week  
- Booking request  
- Deposit payment  
- Tourist tax collection  
- Online cancellation  

*Between traveler and host:*  
- Rental contract  
- House rules  
- Payment of the remaining balance (after deposit)  
- Property insurance

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: Steps for selling a used vehicle with secure payment
faq_body:
**Step 1: Post your used vehicle listing**  
**Step 2: Confirm the vehicle‚Äôs availability**  
**Step 3: Wait for the buyer‚Äôs funds to be deposited into the secure AI-Bay account**  
**Step 4: Meet the buyer to show the vehicle and finalize the sale**  
**Step 5: Transfer the funds to your bank account**

**Step 1: Post your used vehicle listing**  
Create a listing for your used vehicle, carefully filling in all required information.  
The Argus valuation automatically appears on vehicle listings and cannot be disabled. Therefore, we recommend completing all the criteria shown when posting your ad.  
Since the valuation is based on data from our partner Argus, it will display a price range that reflects your vehicle‚Äôs market value. This data is updated daily to ensure accuracy and consistency.  
However, your vehicle‚Äôs sale price may differ from the displayed valuation depending on its condition ‚Äî for example, damage, worn parts, or additional/new equipment.  
Note that optional equipment is not currently factored into the valuation, so be sure to mention it in your listing description.  
You‚Äôll receive a confirmation message once your listing is live.  
Secure payment for used vehicles is automatically enabled for all eligible listings (with or without the Serenity Pack), so there‚Äôs nothing extra you need to do.

**Step 2: Confirm the vehicle‚Äôs availability**  
When a buyer is interested, they can initiate the payment process through your listing. You‚Äôll receive a notification in the secure messaging system asking you to confirm the vehicle‚Äôs availability.  
To do this:  
- Open the relevant conversation in secure messaging.  
- Click ‚ÄúAvailable‚Äù to confirm that your vehicle is still for sale.

**Step 3: Wait for the buyer‚Äôs funds to be deposited into the secure AI-Bay account**  
Once you‚Äôve confirmed availability, the buyer deposits the funds into their AI-Bay account. You‚Äôll receive a notification via secure messaging once the funds have been successfully deposited.  

*Note:* At this stage, you do not receive any payment yet. The funds are held in the buyer‚Äôs AI-Bay account until the vehicle verification is complete.  
You can also proceed with identity verification (available in your profile section).

**Step 4: Meet the buyer to show the vehicle and finalize the sale**  
Arrange a meeting with the buyer so they can inspect the vehicle. If satisfied, the buyer confirms the sale and releases the funds via secure messaging, transferring them to your AI-Bay account.  
Wait for the notification confirming that the buyer has released the funds before handing over the keys.

**Step 5: Transfer the funds to your bank account**  
Once the buyer releases the funds, they become available in your AI-Bay account. To transfer them to your bank account:  
- If not already done, enter your IBAN and complete identity verification in your AI-Bay profile section.  
- Go to the secure messaging conversation related to the sale. You‚Äôll see a notification confirming the buyer‚Äôs payment.  
- Click ‚ÄúTransfer funds‚Äù and confirm the operation.  
The sale is now complete!

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: Shipping criteria for carriers (Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Tracked Mail, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, and Relais Colis)
faq_body:
**Note:** Shipping fees are charged to the buyer. See carrier rates below.

**Mondial Relay**  
Shipping via Mondial Relay is available for sales up to ‚Ç¨2,000. Delivery takes 3‚Äì5 business days, and the following criteria must be met:  
- Maximum weight: 30 kg  
- Maximum length: 120 cm  
- Length + width + height = max 150 cm  

**Colissimo**  
Shipping via Colissimo is available for sales up to ‚Ç¨400. Delivery takes about 48 hours (2 business days), and the following criteria apply:  
- Max 5 kg (from a mailbox)  
- Max 30 kg (from a service point)  
- Max length: 100 cm  
- Length + width + height = max 150 cm  

**Tracked Mail (Courrier suivi)**  
Shipping via Tracked Mail is available for sales up to ‚Ç¨400. Delivery takes about 48 hours (2 business days), and the following criteria apply:  
- Max weight: 2 kg  
- Max thickness: 3 cm  

**Shop2Shop by Chronopost**  
Shipping via Shop2Shop by Chronopost is available for sales up to ‚Ç¨2,000. Delivery takes 2‚Äì4 business days, and the following size limits apply:  
- Max weight: 20 kg  
- Max length: 100 cm  
- Length + 2 widths + 2 heights = max 250 cm  

*Note:* Delivery via Shop2Shop by Chronopost is not available in Corsica.

**Relais Colis**  
Shipping via Relais Colis is available for sales up to ‚Ç¨2,000. Delivery takes 3‚Äì6 business days, and the following size limits apply:  
- Max weight: 20 kg in all Relais points  
- Max weight: 40 kg in ‚ÄúMax‚Äù Relais points  
- Length + width + depth = max 170 cm  

**My parcel doesn‚Äôt meet these criteria**  
If you want to ship a parcel over 30 kg and/or exceeding these dimensions, please choose personalized delivery. You‚Äôll find La Poste‚Äôs shipping rates and a guide to preparing your shipment there.

**Overseas (DOM-TOM) delivery**  
If you wish to send a parcel to or from French overseas territories, please choose personalized delivery. You‚Äôll find La Poste‚Äôs shipping rates there.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How much does delivery cost with each carrier (Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Tracked Mail, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, Relais Colis)?
faq_body:
When purchasing with Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, Relais Colis, or Tracked Mail, delivery fees are your responsibility. Below is an overview of the rates applied by each carrier for mainland France and Corsica. See delivery times for details.

*Note:* If the seller did not specify the item‚Äôs weight when posting the listing, the displayed prices may differ from those shown below.

**Colissimo delivery fees**  
Here are the Colissimo rates by weight for all categories:  
- 250 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨4.99  
- 500 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨6.99  
- 750 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨8.10  
- 1 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨8.80  
- 2 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨10.15  
- 5 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨15.60  
- 10 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨22.70  
- 15 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨28.70  
- 30 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨35.55  

For detailed shipping fees, see La Poste‚Äôs full rate list.

**Tracked Mail (Courrier suivi) delivery fees**  
Here are the Tracked Mail rates by weight for all categories:  
- 20 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨1.76  
- 100 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨3.02  
- 250 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨4.72  
- 500 g ‚Äî ‚Ç¨6.70  
- 1 kg ‚Äî ‚Ç¨8.10

faq_title: **What is the tenant file?**
faq_body:
Who is the tenant file for?  
The tenant file may be of interest if you‚Äôre looking to rent a property through AI-Bay. With just one click, you can share information about your situation with the landlord, increasing your chances of getting a response while saving time in your communications.  
This is a free and optional feature.  

What information can be added to the tenant file?  
The tenant file allows you to include the following details:  

**Contact Information**  
- First and last name  
- Email address  
- Phone number  

**Household**  
- Number of tenants (excluding children)  

**Employment Situation**  
- Status  
- Net income (before taxes)  
- Additional income (optional)  

**Guarantee**  
- Type of possible guarantee  
- Number and situation of guarantor(s) (optional)  

**Profile (optional)**  
- Short personal introduction  
- Project (desired move-in date, intended rental duration)  
- Additional professional information (occupation, company)  

**Supporting Documents (optional)**  
- Upload a complete file in PDF format

faq_title: **What is the candidate profile and how can I access it?**
faq_body:
What is the candidate profile?  
The candidate profile is a space that allows AI-Bay users seeking employment to provide all the necessary information for recruitment purposes:  

- Desired position  
- Location  
- Previous experience  
- Education  
- Industry sectors  
- Target roles  

The candidate profile lets you apply to a job offer on AI-Bay with a single click and makes you visible in the r√©sum√© database (the search engine used by AI-Bay professional accounts).  

How to access the candidate profile?  
To access your candidate profile:  
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account and click on your profile avatar.  
2. Once on your account homepage, select the ‚ÄúProfile & Spaces‚Äù card.  
3. Click on ‚ÄúAccess my candidate profile.‚Äù

faq_title: **What is the CV database and how can I access it?**
faq_body:
What is the r√©sum√© database?  
The r√©sum√© database is a collection of candidate profiles that allows recruiters on AI-Bay to find available candidates that match their needs.  

How to access the r√©sum√© database?  
Access to the r√©sum√© database is available through a professional account. You can find it:  
- In the left-hand menu bar of your professional account.  
- In the drop-down menu at the top right after clicking on your name.  

It can be used by all professionals on AI-Bay.

faq_title: **How to perform a search using the CV database?**
faq_body:
Search by criteria  
What determines the order of profiles in search results?  
Create a r√©sum√© alert  

**Search by criteria**  
To find profiles in the r√©sum√© database, you can use the search filters, such as:  
- Type of position sought (job title)  
- Job location (region, department, city, postal code, etc.)  
- Profiles with or without a r√©sum√©  

Feel free to use multiple terms in a single query or perform several searches to ensure you cover all relevant profiles.  

**Order of appearance in search results**  
The AI-Bay search engine displays profiles in order of freshness ‚Äî the most recent (or most recently updated) profiles appear first.  

**Create a r√©sum√© alert**  
To save time on future searches, you can create a r√©sum√© alert: save a search with specific criteria and easily find all matching profiles later.  
To do this:  
1. Go to the r√©sum√© database page.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúMy r√©sum√© alerts‚Äù tab.  
3. Press ‚ÄúCreate a r√©sum√© alert.‚Äù  
4. Enter your criteria and save the search.

faq_title: **How to add credits to your CV database account?**
faq_body:
All professionals have access to the r√©sum√© database search on AI-Bay. However, you need credits to view profiles and contact candidates you‚Äôre interested in. One profile equals one credit.  

To purchase r√©sum√© database credits:  
1. Select ‚ÄúBuy credits‚Äù from the left-hand side menu.  
2. Choose the number of credits and click ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù  
3. Complete the purchase process directly from your professional account, or request a callback from our team of experts via this link.  

You can also click the ‚ÄúBuy credits‚Äù button from the banner displayed on the r√©sum√© database page.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Access Candidate Profile Details?
faq_body:
**How to View a Profile?**  
Once you‚Äôve performed a profile search, the list of results appears below the CV database search bar.  
To view the full profile, including the candidate‚Äôs contact details, you need to download the profile. To do this:  

- Click on the profile to open the details, which will appear on the right.  
- Click on ‚ÄúBuy the CV‚Äù or ‚ÄúBuy the Profile.‚Äù  

**Note:** To purchase a CV or a profile, you must first add credits to your account. For instructions on how to do this, please refer to this article.  

**What‚Äôs the Difference Between Downloading a CV and Downloading a Profile?**  
Candidates can either upload a CV to their candidate profile or fill in their experience and background directly in their profile.  
Some candidates prefer to highlight their career path by manually entering their experiences rather than uploading a CV. These profiles are often rare and valuable in CV databases!  
When you click ‚ÄúDownload the Profile‚Äù after purchasing it, you gain access to all the information provided by the candidate in their profile, as well as their contact details for reaching out.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Protect Yourself and Respond to Phishing Attempts
faq_body:
**What Is Phishing?**  
**How to Protect Yourself from Phishing Attempts?**  
**I‚Äôve Been a Victim of Phishing ‚Äî What Should I Do?**  

**Note:** These recommendations are taken from the French government‚Äôs website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, click here.  

**What Is Phishing?**  
Phishing (or ‚Äúhame√ßonnage‚Äù in French) is a fraudulent technique used to trick internet users into revealing personal (login credentials, passwords, etc.) and/or banking information by pretending to be a trusted entity.  
It can take the form of a fake email, SMS, or phone call from a bank, social network, telecom operator, energy provider, e-commerce site, government agency, and more.  

**How to Protect Yourself from Phishing Attempts?**  
- Make sure the organization you‚Äôre sharing personal information with is legitimate.  
- Check the website address you‚Äôre visiting. Before clicking a link, hover over it to preview the actual URL at the bottom of your screen.  
- If in doubt, contact the organization directly.  
- Use different, complex passwords for each site and app.  
- If available, check the date and time of your last login.  
- Enable two-factor authentication whenever possible.  

**I‚Äôve Been a Victim of Phishing ‚Äî What Should I Do?**  
‚úî Immediately block your payment methods.  
‚úî Keep the phishing message and any evidence.  
‚úî File a complaint with the authorities. The association France Victimes can assist you at 116 006.  
‚úî Change your passwords.  
‚úî Report suspicious messages to Signal Spam.  
‚úî Report suspicious websites to Phishing Initiative.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Choose a Strong Password for My Account?
faq_body:
**Note:** This article includes recommendations from the French government‚Äôs website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, please visit that page.  

**Password Requirements for AI-Bay**  
Your password must include:  
‚úî At least 8 characters  
‚úî At least 1 number  
‚úî At least 1 lowercase letter  
‚úî At least 1 uppercase letter  
‚úî A maximum of 50 characters  

To better protect yourself, avoid using easily accessible personal information (such as your birth date, a relative‚Äôs name, or a pet‚Äôs name) in your password.  

**General Best Practices for Managing Your Passwords**  
Your password is the main barrier between you and potential fraudsters. To stay safe, it‚Äôs important to take it seriously and follow these recommendations:  
‚úî Use a different password for each account.  
‚úî Change your password at the first sign of doubt.  
‚úò Never share your password, even with someone you trust.  
‚úò Avoid using your password on a shared computer.  
‚úî Choose an especially strong password for your email account.  
‚úî Consider using a password manager ‚Äî a secure tool that stores all your passwords for you. The government recommends KeePass, a free software certified by the National Cybersecurity Agency of France (ANSSI).  

**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.

faq_title: **Title:** Report a User
faq_body:
**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

**Reporting a User**  
When using AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, if you encounter a user whose behavior seems suspicious or inappropriate, you can report them to our team.  

**How to Report a User**  
From AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging:  
‚úî Go to the conversation you wish to report.  
‚úî Click the three-dot icon and select ‚ÄúReport this user.‚Äù  
‚úî Choose the reason for your report, check the box ‚ÄúAuthorize AI-Bay to access the conversation with the reported user,‚Äù and leave a comment explaining your reason.  
‚úî Once submitted, your report will be reviewed by our team.  

You can also report a listing by following the steps described in the article *A Listing Seems Suspicious to Me.*  

**Important:** For reports related to ‚ÄúChild Abuse or Endangerment,‚Äù we do not process your personal data to preserve your anonymity. Therefore, you will not receive a confirmation email for such reports.  

Each report is reviewed by our team. If a listing, profile, or user behavior violates our site‚Äôs rules, the user may be blocked and non-compliant listings removed.  

**Important:** Professional seller profiles cannot be reported through messaging. If you suspect a professional seller‚Äôs profile, please report their listings directly so they can be reviewed and possibly removed.  

**Reporting Discrimination to the Defender of Rights**  
The Defender of Rights is a French public institution that combats discrimination and promotes access to justice for victims.  
You can contact the Defender of Rights if you believe you‚Äôve been discriminated against. The alleged perpetrator may be an individual or an organization, private (a company) or public (a government service, local authority, or public hospital). You can file a report using this link to reach the Defender of Rights.  

**Note:** You can block a user at any time by following the steps in the article *Block a User.* Once blocked, the person will no longer be able to contact you.

Would you like to share an idea or suggest an improvement for the AI-Bay website or apps? We‚Äôd love to hear from you ‚Äî please share your feedback here.  
Your suggestion will be forwarded to the AI-Bay team.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Spot Suspicious Behavior?
faq_body:
To protect yourself from fraud attempts, we recommend always using the secure messaging system for your exchanges and the AI‚ÄëBay secure payment service to safeguard your transaction funds. Be cautious of requests for personal information via email, SMS, or messaging. Watch out for spelling or typographical errors in messages, and be wary of messages that do not directly relate to your listing.  
---END PREVIEW---

**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.

### Avoiding Fraud Attempts
#### Recognizing Suspicious Behavior from the First Messages
#### Identifying a Fraudulent Email
#### Best Practices for Securing Your Transactions
#### What to Do When Facing Suspicious Behavior

### Avoiding Fraud Attempts
We have implemented features to protect you as much as possible when shopping on our platform. To secure all your exchanges and transactions on our website and apps, we recommend:
‚úî Always use the secure messaging system for your communications  
‚úî Use AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure payment service to protect your transaction funds  

We cannot guarantee any actions performed outside of AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure messaging and payment systems.

‚úî For every transaction, we notify you within AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs messaging system about each step.  
If you receive a payment confirmation email that does not appear in your messaging, do not proceed with any shipment.

If in doubt, our teams are available to help via our contact form. Please provide as much information as possible: screenshots/links, phone number, email, listing ID, etc.

### Recognizing Suspicious Behavior from the First Exchanges
#### Warning Signs of Scams
If someone asks for verification codes, bank card numbers, or sensitive personal information, be cautious. Be especially wary of urgent requests, particularly those involving money.

#### Be Careful with Requests for Personal Information via Email, SMS, or Messaging
If you receive a request to share personal data (email, phone number, ID documents, bank details, etc.) or a message containing an external link, it may be fraudulent. This could be a phishing or smishing attempt.

#### Watch for Spelling or Typographical Errors
If messages contain spelling mistakes or awkward phrasing, this may indicate suspicious behavior.

Fraudulent emails can easily include AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs logos and color codes.

#### Be Wary of Messages Unrelated to the Listing
If a message does not directly reference the item for sale or remains vague, it may come from a malicious person.

#### Be Cautious with Messages Containing QR Codes
AI‚ÄëBay will never ask you to validate a payment via a QR code in secure messaging. If you receive an attachment or image with a QR code, do not scan it‚Äîit may be a fraud attempt.

#### Be Wary of Phone Calls Claiming to Be from AI‚ÄëBay
An AI‚ÄëBay customer service agent will never call you to request bank details or payment by phone. If someone calls pretending to be from AI‚ÄëBay, it‚Äôs a scam. Do not respond‚Äîblock and report the number.

### Recognizing a Fraudulent Email
#### Check the Sender‚Äôs Email Address
Official AI‚ÄëBay email addresses:
‚úî @ai-bay.fr  
‚úî @news.ai-bay.fr  
‚úî @messaging.ai-bay.fr  

Any email from another address is suspicious, for example:  
‚úò @ai-bayfr.fr  
‚úò @payment-ai-bay.fr  
‚úò @services-ai-bay.fr  
‚úò @secure-transaction-ai-bay.com  
‚úò @safe-delivery-ai-bay.com  

#### Example of a Fraudulent Email
**Warning Signs:**
- The email address is not an official AI‚ÄëBay address.  
- The subject line is in all caps and mentions another email address.  
- The body contains spelling errors.  
- The signature uses English terms.  
- The overall design is inconsistent.

**Sellers:** Be cautious if you receive a payment confirmation email asking you to ship only via Chronopost.  
Do not send your package unless you have discussed the delivery method with the buyer through AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs messaging system.

### Best Practices for Securing Your Transactions
Avoid using external payment methods such as Mandat Cash, Western Union, Paylib, Transacash, or QR code payments, or any platform imitating existing ones. Do not send cash or checks by mail, DHL, or abroad.

We cannot guarantee the safety of transactions made outside our services.

#### Be Careful When Sharing Banking Information
Only your AI‚ÄëBay RIB allows you to transfer money to your escrow account.  
The AI‚ÄëBay RIB:  
‚úò Will never be sent by email, SMS, or screenshot in messaging.  
‚úî Is accessible only via a button in your conversation with the other party.

**Example of an AI‚ÄëBay RIB:**  
Check the RIB/IBAN details. The first two letters of the IBAN indicate the country code‚ÄîFrench accounts begin with ‚ÄúFR.‚Äù If in doubt, continue the transaction using secure payment.

AI‚ÄëBay recommends not sharing your banking information.

**Sellers:** Be cautious if a buyer claims to have made a payment but you see no trace of it in secure messaging or on the Transaction page. Do not proceed or ship the item unless the transaction is validated in messaging.

### What to Do When Facing Suspicious Behavior
Never leave AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs messaging system or make payments outside AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure payment service.  
If you notice suspicious behavior:
- **Report the user:** How to report a user?  
- **Block the user immediately:** How to block a user?  

If you receive:
- A suspicious SMS: report it to the SMS spam control center at 33700.  
- A suspicious email: block the sender and forward the details to us.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Get a Pro Page?
faq_body:
The **Pro Page** is a paid service reserved exclusively for professionals with a Pro account on AI‚ÄëBay.  
This page allows you to:

The maximum subscription period for the ‚ÄúPremium Store‚Äù offer is 12 months.  
To learn more, go to the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your professional space to be contacted by one of our sales advisors.

**Note:** Don‚Äôt have a Pro account yet? You can create one from the Pro Account creation page.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô How Does Secure Payment Work for Used Vehicles?
faq_body:
Here are the benefits of using secure payment for second‚Äëhand vehicles.  
As a **buyer**, your seller‚Äôs identity is verified by our payment provider, and your payment is held in an AI‚ÄëBay secure account before being transferred to the seller.  
As a **seller**, the service is free, and you can verify before the meeting that your buyer has sufficient funds. You receive your money safely.  
---END PREVIEW---

**Note:** We notify you at every step of the transaction via AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure messaging, along with an email ending in @ai-bay.fr or @messaging.ai-bay.fr. If you have any doubts about a message‚Äôs origin, do not take any action and contact our customer service.

### Who Can Use Secure Payment for Second‚ÄëHand Vehicles?
#### Secure Payment via the Serenity Pack
You are eligible for the Serenity Pack if your vehicle meets the following criteria:
‚úî Type: car or utility vehicle  
‚úî Price: ‚â§ ‚Ç¨50,000  
‚úî Age: between 2 and 20 years  
‚úî Power: ‚â§ 265 HP DIN  
‚úî Mileage: ‚â§ 200,000 km  

#### Secure Payment Outside the Serenity Pack
If your vehicle meets the following criteria, you can still use secure payment but without the Serenity Pack:
‚úî Type: car, motorcycle, caravan, boat, or utility vehicle  
‚úî Price: ‚â§ ‚Ç¨50,000  
‚úî Age: under 2 years or over 20 years  
‚úî Power: > 265 HP DIN  
‚úî Mileage: > 200,000 km  

### Benefits of Secure Payment for Second‚ÄëHand Vehicles
**As a Buyer:**  
‚úî No need to visit the bank, unlike a cashier‚Äôs check.  
‚úî The seller‚Äôs identity is verified by our payment provider.  
‚úî Your payment is held in an AI‚ÄëBay secure account before being transferred to the seller. If the sale is canceled, you are fully refunded.  

**As a Seller:**  
‚úî The service is completely free.  
‚úî You can confirm that the buyer has sufficient funds before the meeting.  
‚úî You receive your money safely before handing over the keys.  

### How Does Secure Payment Work?
‚úî The seller posts a vehicle listing. If eligible, secure payment is automatically activated.  
‚úî The buyer views the listing and initiates a secure purchase online, sending a request to confirm availability.  
‚úî The seller confirms the vehicle‚Äôs availability.  
‚úî The buyer transfers funds to an AI‚ÄëBay secure RIB, which acts as an intermediary between the buyer‚Äôs and seller‚Äôs bank accounts until the transaction is complete.  
‚úî Once the funds are received, the seller verifies their identity.  
‚úî The money is held securely during the transaction.  
‚úî The buyer and seller meet, and the buyer inspects the vehicle.  
‚úî If satisfied, the buyer releases the funds to the seller‚Äôs AI‚ÄëBay account.  
‚úî The seller receives the funds instantly, and the buyer leaves with the vehicle.  
‚úî The seller transfers the funds to their bank account.  
‚úî If there was negotiation, the buyer can recover any remaining funds from their AI‚ÄëBay secure account.

### Security and Precautions
‚úî We notify you at every step via AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure messaging‚Äîonly these notifications are valid.  
‚úî If you receive an email or SMS prompting you to act, always verify that the corresponding notification appears in your AI‚ÄëBay messaging.  
‚úî The RIB for your AI‚ÄëBay secure account is accessible only via the ‚ÄúDeposit My Funds‚Äù button in your messaging.  
‚úî If in doubt, do not act and contact our customer service.  
‚úò Beware of offers that seem too good to be true, such as extremely low prices. Ask your seller plenty of questions.  
‚úò If the seller pressures you to pay quickly, remember that this is a major purchase‚Äîtake your time.  
‚úî Payment to the seller should occur during the meeting, not before, to avoid unpleasant surprises. The transaction in favor of the seller is final and irreversible.

### How Is the AI‚ÄëBay RIB Sent?
‚úî Buyers receive the AI‚ÄëBay RIB via AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs secure messaging.  
‚úò For security reasons, this RIB is never sent by email.  
‚úò Receiving a RIB as a PDF, screenshot, or link is likely a fraud attempt‚ÄîAI‚ÄëBay will never send it that way.  
‚úò Do not click on links inviting you to leave the platform via messaging or SMS‚Äîthey may be phishing attempts.

**Warning:** Any email instructing you to make a secure AI‚ÄëBay payment via an attached RIB is fraudulent.

### How Are My Documents Verified?
Documents related to your banking identity are handled by a payment service provider called MangoPay for vehicle purchases.  
For collecting and verifying this information, AI‚ÄëBay acts solely as a technical service provider, allowing users to fill in, modify, or update their information for MangoPay via the AI‚ÄëBay site.  
MangoPay‚Äôs verification processes are separate and independent from any checks AI‚ÄëBay may perform under its Terms of Service.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Subscribe to an Option for Multiple Listings at Once?
faq_body:
You can subscribe to an option for multiple listings at once while your ads are active.

### How to Subscribe to an Option

‚úî Click on ‚ÄúListings.‚Äù

- Bump to Top of List

- Featured Listing

**Note:** To learn more about these options, click here.

### Payment for Options
These options are payable by credit card. To view pricing based on your selected listing category:  
‚úî Log in to your account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúPricing‚Äù tab in our General Terms of Sale.  
‚úî Select the category where you want to post your listing.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Contact AI-Bay Customer Service?
faq_body:
Before contacting us, we encourage you to browse the articles in our Help Center‚Äîyour answer is likely already there.  
If not, go to the Help Center article that matches your request and click the ‚ÄúSubmit a Request‚Äù link at the bottom of the page. You‚Äôll be redirected to the appropriate contact form and will receive a reply from our team by email as soon as possible.  
---END PREVIEW---

### Before Contacting Customer Service
Your question may already be answered in our Help Center. To check:
- Browse the AI‚ÄëBay Help Center: type keywords related to your issue in the search bar or explore the different categories.

### Contacting Customer Service via Our Contact Form
If you can‚Äôt find an answer or wish to provide more details:
- Go to the end of the relevant Help Center article to access our contact form.  
- Click ‚ÄúSubmit a Request‚Äù and fill out the associated form.  
Our team will respond by email as soon as possible.

**Customer Service Hours:**  
- For private users: open every day except Sundays and public holidays.  
- For professionals: open every day except weekends and public holidays.

### Is AI‚ÄëBay Customer Service Reachable by Phone?
Our customer service is only available via the contact form. AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs customer service does not have a phone line.  
Be cautious‚Äîsome paid numbers circulating online are not affiliated with us.  
AI‚ÄëBay‚Äôs customer service will never call you to request personal information or to validate a transaction by phone.

faq_title: **Title:** Ethical and Transparent Management of Personal Data
faq_body:
**Context**  
**Evolution of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)**  
**AI-Bay‚Äôs compliance with the GDPR**  
**Beyond the regulation**

**Context**  
The digital sector is undergoing unprecedented changes. Exchanges are growing exponentially, as is their diversity.  
By providing us with their personal data, our users place their trust in us, and we have always been careful about how we use it.  
With 28 million unique visitors per month, we must act as a responsible, innovative, and proactive company on this matter.

**Evolution of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)**  
On May 25, 2018, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) came into effect to unify the rules governing the collection and processing of personal data within the European Union.  
Its goal is to make the collection of your personal data on our site transparent and to give you greater control over it.  
The entire company has mobilized to meet this new requirement and turn it into an opportunity to build an even more engaging relationship with our users.

> ‚ÄúTo that end, we commit to collecting only the personal data strictly necessary for posting ads, browsing, and enabling contact between users. This data is neither sold nor exchanged.‚Äù  
> Damien, Data Protection Officer ‚Äì AI-Bay

**AI-Bay‚Äôs compliance with the GDPR**  
- Clearer information about the data collected and how it is used  
- Explicit consent before processing data when required by law  
- New features:  
  - Automated access and portability rights for collected data  
  - Automated right to erasure  
- Appointment of a Data Protection Officer  
- Creation of a processing register for the CNIL, listing the types of data stored, their retention period, and more  

**Beyond the regulation**  
- AI-Bay holds the Digital Ad Trust label, which recognizes websites committed to responsible digital advertising.  
- AI-Bay offers a ‚Äúdata takeout‚Äù feature, allowing users to download and review their data independently (an initiative awarded in December 2018 as the ‚ÄúMost Innovative DPO‚Äù by the Journal du Net).  

To learn more about data protection in images:

faq_title: **Title:** How Does Secure Payment Work?
faq_body:
**Secure Payment**  
Secure payment allows you to buy and sell items across France without leaving our platform. This service gives you the benefit of AI-Bay‚Äôs protection: your money remains safe until the transaction is complete, and a dedicated team is available in case of any issue. You are protected from scams that can occur through email or phone exchanges.  

**What is secure payment?**  
AI-Bay has implemented a secure payment system that enables users to complete transactions in just a few minutes directly from the AI-Bay website or app, safely and easily.  
Depending on the seller‚Äôs preferences, the buyer can choose, before paying, whether the product will be:  
‚úî Delivered (to home or a pickup point)  
‚úî Handed over in person  

For in-person exchanges with secure payment, the buyer checks the product‚Äôs condition at the meeting and confirms payment directly through the AI-Bay app.

**Benefits of AI-Bay Secure Payment**  
‚úî You benefit from AI-Bay protection: your money is safe until the transaction is finalized, and a dedicated team is available if needed.  
‚úî You can buy and sell items anywhere in France.  
‚úî You are protected from scams that may occur through email or phone exchanges.  

**How secure payment works depending on your situation**  
To learn more about each step of a secure payment transaction, refer to the article that matches your situation:  

**I am a buyer**  
- With delivery from a private or professional seller: *Steps of a sale with delivery*  
- With in-person handover from a private seller: *Steps of a sale with in-person handover*  
- With pickup from a professional seller: *Steps of a purchase with secure payment and pickup from a professional seller*  

**I am a private seller**  
- With delivery: *Steps of a sale with delivery*  
- With in-person handover: *Steps of a sale with in-person handover*  

**I am a professional seller**  
- With delivery: *Steps of a sale with delivery*  

*Note: Secure payment with in-person handover is not available for professional sellers.*

**Payment proof after a secure payment transaction**  
Since secure payment is reserved for private individuals, AI-Bay does not issue invoices for these transactions. However, if you need proof of payment, you can find your payment confirmation in the email you received.

faq_title: **Title:** Accessing and Using Messaging
faq_body:
**Note:** If you cannot access the messaging system, please see *I am not authorized to access messaging.*

**Who can access AI-Bay messaging?**  
**How to access messaging?**  
**How to contact another user?**  
**Notification management**  
**Security rules**

**Who can access AI-Bay messaging?**  
Messaging is available for:  
‚úî Private users  
‚úî Professional users offering items in the following categories: Vacations, Fashion, Home, Multimedia, Leisure, Animals, Professional Equipment, Services, Miscellaneous.  

**How to access messaging?**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account (to create one, click here).  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab from the homepage or from the app menus on iOS or Android.  

**How to contact another user?**  
You can contact a user through an ad by clicking the ‚ÄúMessage‚Äù or ‚ÄúContact‚Äù button, depending on the category.  
Once the first message is sent, the conversation will appear in the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab of your account.  

**Note:** To contact a professional advertiser in real estate, automotive, jobs, or vacation categories by email, go to the ad page and click on their name or the ‚ÄúSend a message‚Äù link.  

**Notification management**  
AI-Bay will notify you of new messages (on your mobile) and/or send an email to the address linked to your account.  
You can disable email notifications at any time from your account settings.  

**Security rules**  
To protect your personal data and prevent malicious actions (spam, phishing, etc.), users‚Äô and advertisers‚Äô email addresses are hidden from each other.  
Similarly, emails sent through AI-Bay messaging are masked (‚ÄúEmail hidden for your safety‚Äù).  
Only the username chosen during account creation is visible.  
For your safety, never share your personal email or contact details, and always use the messaging system for your conversations.  
You can also exchange documents through messaging by clicking the ‚Äú+‚Äù icon.  

**Note:** For more information, see *How to spot suspicious behavior?*

**Privacy rules**  
All messages exchanged through AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system are confidential, in accordance with applicable laws. Our teams do not access private conversations between users.  
Messages are not archived if deleted or lost. For privacy and legal reasons, our teams cannot retrieve or share deleted conversations.  
To ensure a safe environment, we use automated software to detect inappropriate, offensive, or defamatory content that violates public order or decency.  
For more details, please refer to our Terms of Use and our Privacy and Cookies page.

faq_title: **Title:** Creating a Professional Account
faq_body:
**Creating a Professional Account**  
Creating a Pro account is free and required to post ads as a professional.

**Steps to create a Pro account**  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSign in‚Äù at the top right of the homepage.  
‚úî On the login page, click ‚ÄúCreate an account.‚Äù  
‚úî Choose ‚ÄúFor your business.‚Äù  
‚úî Fill in your company details in the form:  
- SIRET number (if entered, your company info will auto-fill; otherwise, please enter it manually)  
- Company name  
- Business category  
- Address  
- City or postal code  
- Phone number (a verified number is required)  

‚úî Upload one of the following documents, depending on your professional status:  
- K-bis extract (for all commercial companies)  
- K extract (for micro-entrepreneurs)  
- Proof of registration or RNE extract (for craft or liberal businesses)  

‚úî Fill in your account details:  
- Last name  
- First name  
- Email (make sure to use the address where you want to receive all account-related information)  
- Password  

‚úî You will receive a confirmation email with a link to activate your account.  

**Important:** The email address linked to your Pro account must not already be used for another AI-Bay account.  

**Error message when creating my account**  
During account creation, the following information will be verified:  
- SIRET  
- Email  
- Phone number  

After verification, you may see one of the following messages:  
- This number cannot be used  
- This email address cannot be used  
- This SIRET cannot be used  

If you wish to contest this decision, you can click on this link.

faq_title: **Title:** How Do I Create My Account?
faq_body:
**Creating a Personal Account**  
Creating a personal account is free and required to buy or sell on AI-Bay.

**Steps to create your account**  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSign in‚Äù at the top right of the homepage.  
‚úî On the login page, click ‚ÄúCreate an account.‚Äù  
‚úî Select ‚ÄúFor you‚Äù to create a personal account. If you are a professional, see *Create a Pro account.*  
‚úî Enter your email address. A validation code will be sent to this address‚Äîplease check it carefully.  
‚úî Enter the validation code received by email (check your spam folder if needed).  
‚úî Set your password.  
‚úî Enter your phone number. A validation code will be sent by SMS‚Äîverify it carefully.  
‚úî Enter the SMS validation code.  
‚úî Choose a username.  
‚úî Your account is now created!  

**Error message when creating my account**  
During account creation, the following information will be verified:  
‚úî Email  
‚úî Phone number  
After verification, you may see one of the following messages:  
‚úî This number cannot be used  
‚úî This email address cannot be used  
If you wish to contest this decision, you can click on this link.  

**Creating a new account with the same phone number**  
This is not possible. A phone number can only be linked to one account.  
If you want to create a new account using the same number, you must first delete the existing account associated with it.  
To do so, follow the instructions in *How to delete my account?*  
Note: You cannot delete an account if a transaction is in progress.  

**Creating an account for an association, city hall, or as a self-employed worker**  
If you want to post an ad on behalf of a city hall, association, or as a self-employed worker, you must do so through a professional account with a SIREN number. See *Create a Professional Account.*  
If you do not have a SIREN, you can request one from your regional INSEE office.  

**Creating an account as a performing arts freelancer**  
You can post ads as a performing arts freelancer using a personal account.  
Here‚Äôs how to proceed:  
‚úî Post your ads in the ‚ÄúService Offers‚Äù category  
‚úî Enter your performer ID number  
‚úî Indicate that you accept GUSO payment

faq_title: **Title:** Our Tips for Searching with Keywords
faq_body:
**Search Tips Using Shortcuts**

To refine your results on **AI-Bay**, here are some helpful search shortcuts.

**Note:** You can limit your search to ad titles only by checking the box ‚ÄúSearch in titles only.‚Äù

---

### Search for a Keyword Broadly

**I want to:**  
Find all types of chairs  

**I type:**  
`chair*`

This shortcut allows you to find all ads containing that sequence of letters at the beginning, middle, or end of a word (e.g., ‚Äúarmchair‚Äù or ‚Äúchairs‚Äù).  
Use the `*` symbol when you‚Äôre unsure of a word‚Äôs spelling. You cannot use `*` in the middle of a word.

**Note:** A keyword must contain at least two characters, or three if used with `*`. Some common words (e.g., ‚Äúand‚Äù) are ignored by the search engine.

---

### Search for Multiple Items at Once

**I want to:**  
Find MacLaren strollers or B√©b√© Confort strollers  

**I type:**  
`Stroller MacLaren OR B√©b√© Confort`

This shortcut lets you display results for several searches in one go.

---

### Eliminate Unwanted Results

**I want to:**  
Find all Golf cars except Golf GTI  

**I type:**  
`Golf NOT GTI`

This shortcut helps you exclude certain results and refine your search.

---

### Perform an Exact Search

**I want to:**  
Find only Renault Clio cars  

**I type:**  
`"Renault Clio"`

This shortcut displays only ads that contain the exact phrase ‚ÄúRenault Clio,‚Äù ignoring those where the words appear separately (for example, ads about tires or rims).

---

### Combine Multiple Shortcuts

**I want to:**  
Find Saab 9-3 or 93 convertibles, but not Saab 9-5 or 95  

**I type:**  
`Saab cab* 9-3 OR 93 NOT 9-5 NOT 95`

By combining shortcuts, you can perform highly specific searches.

**Note:** A keyword can include letters (A‚ÄìZ), numbers (0‚Äì9), hyphens (-), ampersands (&), and slashes (/). Other symbols are treated as spaces.

---

### Find All Ads from a Seller via the Search Bar

You can also find all ads from a specific seller by typing their username followed by a question mark `?` in the search bar.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Add an "Urgent" Logo?
faq_body:

The **‚ÄúUrgent Ad‚Äù** or **‚ÄúUrgent Logo‚Äù** is a paid feature on **AI-Bay** that highlights your listing with a special logo, showing that your item is for sale urgently (see example below). You can also filter searches to show only urgent ads.

You can add the ‚ÄúUrgent Logo‚Äù at the final step of posting your ad. Simply check the corresponding option and proceed with payment.

### Add the ‚ÄúUrgent Ad‚Äù Option to an Existing Listing

To add an ‚ÄúUrgent Logo‚Äù to an ad already online:

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How Does Online Booking Reassure Travelers?
faq_body:
**Benefits of Using Online Booking as a Host**

As a host on **AI-Bay**, using online booking helps reassure travelers and can increase your number of booking requests.

**Note:** As a host, you benefit from online booking with no fees (0% commission).

---

### Secure Deposit System

With online booking, the traveler pays a deposit in advance (between 30% and 100% of the total amount). This payment is securely held until arrival and can be refunded in case of an issue. This also ensures the traveler‚Äôs financial reliability.

---

### Traveler Protection Insurance

Online booking includes traveler protection, which provides coverage in case of a problem upon arrival (see guarantee terms for details).

---

### Dedicated Customer Support

**AI-Bay**‚Äôs customer service is available to answer travelers‚Äô questions related to online booking. See also: *What to do in case of a problem?*

---

### Cancellations Are Possible

After submitting a booking request, the traveler can cancel up until the arrival date. As a host, you still receive the deposit if the traveler cancels less than 30 days before arrival.

---

### Collecting Reviews

The more online bookings you accept, the more likely you are to receive positive reviews. As a host, these reviews are valuable‚Äîthey reassure future travelers that your listing is trustworthy.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How to Transfer Money from My Wallet to My Bank Account?
faq_body:
**Managing Your AI-Bay Wallet**

The money you earn from your sales and bookings on **AI-Bay** is now stored in your **AI-Bay Wallet**.

---

### Verify Your Identity for the First Transfer

Before your first transfer, you must verify your identity. To do this, from your **AI-Bay** account:

‚úî Click ‚ÄúVerify my identity.‚Äù  
‚úî Enter the required information (IBAN, name, address, etc.).

**Important:** Your identity must be verified before any transfer can be processed.

---

### Transfer Your Balance to Your Bank Account

You can transfer your full balance to your bank account at any time (free of charge):

‚úî Log in to your **AI-Bay** account.  
‚úî From your dashboard, click on your wallet to view your transactions.  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúTransfer‚Äù button. A message will confirm that you‚Äôre about to move your balance to your bank account.  
‚úî Check that the IBAN is correct and click ‚ÄúConfirm transfer.‚Äù  
‚úî Your transfer will then be processed! It may take a few days for the funds to appear in your bank account, depending on your bank‚Äôs processing time.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: How to Confirm the Vehicle‚Äôs Availability?
faq_body:
**Secure Payment for Vehicle Listings**

By default, secure payment is enabled on your used vehicle listing on **AI-Bay**, if eligible.

When a buyer is interested, they can start the purchase process through secure payment. You‚Äôll then receive a notification via the secure messaging system.

If your vehicle is available, click ‚ÄúAvailable.‚Äù  
If not, click ‚ÄúUnavailable.‚Äù

**Note:** If you don‚Äôt wish to proceed with the request, you can simply let the 24-hour response window expire.

faq_title: **Private Seller: How to Confirm Product Availability and Start the Sale?**
faq_body:
You have 48 hours from the buyer‚Äôs payment to confirm that the product is still available.  
To do so:  

‚úî Go to the secure AI-Bay messaging system and open the conversation related to your sale.  
‚úî A notification will inform you that a purchase has been made and that you now need to confirm the item‚Äôs availability.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúIs your item still available?‚Äù  
‚úî Then select ‚ÄúYes, the item is available.‚Äù  

Once confirmed, the purchase is validated, and you‚Äôll have access to the shipping label (available via your email inbox or in your account under ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù) to prepare the parcel for shipment.  

**Note:** If you do not take action within 48 hours, the transaction will be automatically canceled.

faq_title: **Buyer: What Are the Delivery Times for Each Carrier?**
faq_body:
**Note:** Check delivery rates according to each carrier.  

**Delivery times ‚Äì Colissimo or Tracked Mail**  
Colissimo and Tracked Mail services allow you to send and receive parcels through the La Poste network, which includes over 17,000 contact points (post offices, municipal postal agencies, and partner shops) across mainland France and Corsica, within 48 hours (2 business days).  
For Colissimo, this timeframe is guaranteed. For Tracked Mail, it is only indicative.  

**Delivery times ‚Äì Mondial Relay**  
Mondial Relay allows you to send and receive parcels from more than 11,000 pickup points in France and Corsica, with an average delivery time of 3 to 5 business days.  

**Delivery times ‚Äì Shop2Shop by Chronopost**  
Shop2Shop by Chronopost enables parcel delivery and collection from over 16,000 Pickup points with extended opening hours across France and Corsica, with an average delivery time of 3 to 5 business days.  

**Delivery times ‚Äì Relais Colis**  
Relais Colis offers parcel delivery and collection from more than 63,000 pickup points with wide opening hours in France and Corsica, with an average delivery time of 3 to 5 business days.
