faq_title: **How to Fill Out My Candidate Profile?**
faq_body:
**Why complete my candidate profile?**  
**How to add a CV?**  
**How to add my contact details?**  
**How to enhance my candidate profile?**  

**Why complete my candidate profile?**  
Your candidate profile serves several purposes:  

- It makes you visible to recruiters in the CV database, allowing them to find candidates that match their open positions.  
- It enables one-click applications ‚Äî all your profile data automatically fills in your applications on AI-Bay.  

For these reasons, and to maximize your chances, it‚Äôs important to complete your candidate profile as fully as possible and keep it updated when needed.  

**Note:** Keeping your candidate profile up to date increases your chances of being selected and contacted by recruiters looking for active candidates.  

**How to add a CV?**  
From your candidate profile page, drag and drop your CV into the ‚ÄúMy CV‚Äù section, or click the ‚ÄúAdd my CV‚Äù button and select the appropriate file.  

**Note:** The CV must be in PDF or Word format and must not exceed 2.5 MB.  

**How to add my contact details?**  
From your candidate profile, go to the ‚ÄúMy candidate contact details‚Äù section and click ‚ÄúEdit.‚Äù You can then enter your email address and phone number so recruiters can contact you if they‚Äôre interested in your profile.  

**How to enhance my candidate profile?**  
By adding details about your professional experience and education, you can make your profile stand out and attract more recruiters.  
You can include information such as:  
- Desired job roles  
- Target industries  
- Previous work experience  
- Completed training or education

faq_title: **How to Protect Yourself and Respond to Identity Theft**
faq_body:
**What is identity theft?**  
**How to protect yourself from identity theft?**  
**My identity has been stolen ‚Äî what should I do?**  

**Note:** These recommendations are based on information from the French government website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more details, click here.  
If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

**What is identity theft?**  
Identity theft is a criminal offense involving the use of someone‚Äôs personal information without their consent to commit fraudulent acts.  
In practice, cybercriminals may obtain this information through lost or stolen identity documents, phishing messages, hacking of online accounts or devices, or breaches of websites where such data was stored.  
Depending on the information obtained, fraudsters may impersonate the victim to commit various offenses such as opening bank accounts, posting fake ads, or renting vehicles.  

**How to protect yourself from identity theft?**  
‚úî Verify the authenticity of any organization requesting your personal information.  
‚úî Be cautious about who you communicate with online or by phone.  
‚úî Check the privacy settings of your personal data.  
‚úî Regularly review your bank statements.  
‚úî Keep your personal, banking, and identity documents in a safe place.  
‚úî Destroy any documents containing personal information before discarding them.  
‚úî Use strong, unique passwords for each site and app.  
‚úî Enable two-factor authentication.  
‚úò Do not open suspicious messages or attachments, and never click on links they contain.  
‚úî Regularly update your devices and their software or apps.  

**My identity has been stolen ‚Äî what should I do?**  
‚úî Keep all available evidence.  
‚úî Report the identity theft directly to the platform where it occurred.  
‚úî File a complaint with the authorities. The association *France Victimes* can assist you at 116 006.  
‚úî Immediately notify all banks or financial institutions where you hold accounts.  
‚úî Cancel and renew your identity documents.  
‚úî Provide a sworn statement to any organization accusing you, explaining that you are not responsible for the fraudulent acts.  
‚úî Contact the Banque de France to report the incident and check whether any loans or accounts have been opened in your name.  
‚úî Contact the *Info Escroqueries* helpline (0 805 805 817) of the Ministry of the Interior for guidance on your next steps.

faq_title: **Title:** How to exclude a keyword from a search?
faq_body:
To better refine your search, you can exclude specific terms so that they don‚Äôt appear in your list of results.  
To do this, type your search followed by the word **NOT** in uppercase and the term you want to exclude.  
For example, if you‚Äôre looking for a stool but want to exclude all bar stools, type in the AI-Bay search bar:  
**stool NOT bar**  

You can use **NOT** multiple times in the same search to narrow down your results even further. For example:  
**stool NOT bar NOT tall**  

**Note:** For more search tips, check out the article *Our keyword search advice*.

faq_title: **Title:** How to report a scam or attempted fraud?
faq_body:
**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnosis and consult government recommendations on the website [17cyber.gouv.fr](https://17cyber.gouv.fr).

**Report a user from a conversation**  
**Report a user from a listing**  
**Report a listing**

Would you like to report a scam, a fraud attempt, suspicious behavior, or a counterfeit item? Here‚Äôs how to proceed.

**Report a user from a conversation**  
‚úî Go to the conversation you want to report.  
‚úî From your browser, click the three-dot icon and select ‚ÄúReport this user,‚Äù then leave a comment explaining the reason for your report.  
‚úî From your mobile device, tap ‚ÄúMore,‚Äù then ‚ÄúReport this user,‚Äù and leave a comment with more details.  
‚úî Choose the reason for your report and, if you wish, check the box ‚ÄúAllow AI-Bay to access the conversation with the reported user.‚Äù

**Report a user from a listing**  
‚úî Go to the relevant listing.  
‚úî Click on the user‚Äôs name.  
‚úî Click the three-dot icon at the top right of your screen.  
‚úî Select ‚ÄúReport this user,‚Äù choose a reason from the list, and leave a comment with more details.

**Report a listing**  
‚úî Log in to your account.  
‚úî At the bottom of the listing, click ‚ÄúReport this listing.‚Äù  
‚úî Choose the reason for your report and leave a comment with more details.

Once your report has been submitted, you‚Äôll receive a message confirming that it has been received. All reports are reviewed by our team as quickly as possible, and appropriate measures are taken to maintain the integrity of our site.

**Important:** For reports related to ‚ÄúChild abuse or endangerment,‚Äù we do not process your personal data to preserve your anonymity. You will not receive a confirmation email for this type of report.

Any listing that violates our posting rules will be removed.

**Note:** You can block a user at any time by following the steps in the article *Block a user*. Once blocked, they will no longer be able to contact you.

faq_title: **Title:** My account is blocked ‚Äî what should I do?
faq_body:
To understand why your account has been blocked, we recommend reviewing our Posting Rules, Terms of Use, or Code of Conduct. We block accounts that do not comply with these conditions. You can contest the blocking of your account by sending a request to our customer service team.

**Why can my account be blocked?**  
To ensure the safety of all AI-Bay users, we may block your account if we detect suspicious behavior or activity that violates our Posting Rules, Terms of Use, or Code of Conduct.  
Here are some non-exhaustive examples:

- **Inappropriate behavior:** discriminatory attitude, insults, threats.  
- **Fraud attempt:** suspicious activity toward other users, scam attempts.  
- **Prohibited content:** sale of illegal products or services.

**How can I contest the blocking of my account?**  
If you believe your account was blocked by mistake, you can send an unblocking request to our team.

**Important:** Unblocking your account is never a paid service. If you receive a message or call asking you to pay to unblock your AI-Bay account, it‚Äôs a scam. Do not respond and report the message or phone number.

**What if my account has been hacked?**  
If you no longer have access to your account because it was hacked, please refer to the article *My account seems to have been hacked, what should I do?*

**Warning:** The AI-Bay team will never contact you by phone about your account being blocked or to offer to unblock it. If you receive such a call, do not respond. For more information, see our article *How to recognize suspicious behavior?*

faq_title: **Title:** I‚Äôm not authorized to post an ad
faq_body:
**Attention:** If you‚Äôre unable to post a listing from your Android mobile device, please update your app to the latest version.

**Note:** This article is for users who no longer have access to posting listings. If you can still post but your listing was rejected, see *My listing was rejected, what should I do?*

After attempting to post a listing, you received a message stating that you are not authorized to post. Why is this happening, and how can you fix it?

**Why can‚Äôt I post a listing anymore?**  
To ensure the safety of all AI-Bay users, we may block listing submissions when we detect suspicious or non-compliant behavior or activity that violates our Posting Rules or Terms of Use.  
Posting may be blocked for several reasons:

- **Suspicious activity or behavior:** when we detect actions that compromise the security of AI-Bay and its users.  
- **Spam:** duplicate listings are not allowed on AI-Bay, though users may post identical listings in different regions.  
- **Inappropriate content:** AI-Bay is a public platform, and we may block any account that posts content that could offend users, in accordance with our Posting Rules.

**How to fix the issue?**  
We invite you to send a request to our customer service team. Our staff will respond as soon as possible.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: How to make a secure vehicle payment on AI-Bay?
faq_body:
**When should the buyer pay the seller?**  
**Are all conditions met to complete the transaction?**  
**How to release the funds?**  
**How to ensure the secure payment is completed?**  
**Security**

**Attention:** We notify you at every step of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, along with an email ending in @ai-bay.com or @messaging.ai-bay.com. If in doubt, do not take any action and contact our customer service.

**When should the buyer pay the seller?**  
This step should take place during the in-person meeting when the vehicle is handed over, after the buyer has inspected it.

**Are all conditions met to complete the transaction?**  
You‚Äôre ready to proceed if:

**As a buyer:**  
- My funds have arrived in my AI-Bay account (I received a confirmation in AI-Bay messaging).  
- I‚Äôm with the seller.  
- I‚Äôve inspected the vehicle and I‚Äôm satisfied.  
- I‚Äôm in front of the vehicle and ready to take it once the transaction is complete.  
- The vehicle transfer certificate is properly filled out.

**As a seller:**  
- The buyer‚Äôs funds have arrived in my AI-Bay account (I received a confirmation in AI-Bay messaging).  
- I‚Äôm with the buyer.  
- I‚Äôm ready to let the buyer take the vehicle once the transaction is complete.  
- I just need to transfer the funds to my bank account.

**How to release the funds?**  
The buyer controls when to release the funds and transfer them to the seller.

**As a buyer:**  
If the vehicle meets your expectations after inspection:  
- Go to AI-Bay messaging.  
- Open your conversation with the seller.  
- Click ‚ÄúPay.‚Äù  
- Verify the amount, click ‚ÄúValidate,‚Äù then ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù

**As a seller:**  
Simply wait for the transaction confirmation message in your AI-Bay messaging.

**Attention:** Always verify that the amount received matches the expected amount.

**How to ensure the secure payment is completed?**  
Both buyer and seller receive a message in their AI-Bay conversation confirming that the transaction was successful.

**As a seller:**  
The sale is complete! You can hand over the vehicle to the buyer.  
You can then request the transfer of funds to your bank account. For this step, your identity must be verified.

**As a buyer:**  
You can now drive away with your new vehicle.

**Security**  
We notify you at every stage of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system. Only these notifications are valid.  
If you receive an email asking you to take action or confirming an action, always verify that you also received the corresponding notification in your AI-Bay messaging.  
If in doubt, do not take any action and contact our customer service.

**How are my documents verified?**  
Documents related to your banking identity are handled by a payment service provider called MangoPay for vehicle purchases.  
For collecting and verifying this information, AI-Bay acts solely as a technical service provider, allowing users to fill in, modify, and/or update their information provided to MangoPay via the AI-Bay website.  
The checks performed by MangoPay are separate and independent from any checks AI-Bay may perform as part of your use of the AI-Bay platform and its services, in accordance with AI-Bay‚Äôs Terms and Conditions.

faq_title: **Private Seller: Steps for a Sale with Secure Payment and Delivery**
faq_body:
To sell using secure payment and delivery, start by selecting the delivery method when posting your listing. Once your listing is online, a buyer can make an online payment. Then, confirm the product‚Äôs availability and send the package. After the buyer confirms receipt and that the item matches the description, you‚Äôll receive your payment directly in your AI-Bay wallet.  
---END PREVIEW---

**Step 1:** Post a listing and choose the delivery method  
**Step 2:** A buyer makes the payment  
**Step 3:** Confirm the product‚Äôs availability  
**Step 4:** Send the package  
**Step 5:** The buyer confirms receipt  
**Step 6:** The buyer confirms the product‚Äôs condition  
**Step 7:** Receive your payment  

**Step 1: Post a listing and choose the delivery method**  
Follow the steps described in ‚ÄúHow to post a listing?‚Äù. Delivery is enabled by default.  

Select one or more delivery methods by clicking ‚ÄúEdit delivery methods‚Äù:  

**Note:** For shipments via Tracked Mail, Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or Relais Colis, delivery costs are paid by the buyer ‚Äî you pay nothing.  

- Tracked Mail: up to 2 kg  
- Mondial Relay: up to 30 kg  
- Colissimo: up to 30 kg  
- Shop2Shop by Chronopost: up to 20 kg  
- Relais Colis: up to 40 kg in ‚ÄúMax‚Äù Relays and 20 kg in other Relays  
- Other: choose your own delivery method (you‚Äôll need to pay shipping costs upfront).  

**Step 2: A buyer makes the payment**  
Once your listing is online, a buyer can:  
- Purchase the item directly.  
- Make an offer suggesting a new price.  

You can also propose a new price to a buyer. See ‚ÄúPrivate seller: how to make an offer to a buyer?‚Äù.  
Once the buyer completes payment, you‚Äôll receive a purchase confirmation via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  

**Step 3: Confirm the product‚Äôs availability**  
After payment is confirmed, you have 48 hours to confirm the product‚Äôs availability. After that, the transaction is automatically canceled.  
See ‚ÄúPrivate seller: how to confirm product availability and start the sale?‚Äù.  

**Step 4: Send the package**  
After confirming availability, you have 72 hours to ship the package. Beyond that, the transaction will be canceled. See ‚ÄúPrivate seller: how to send the package?‚Äù.  
‚úî Download and print the shipping label. See ‚ÄúPrivate seller: how to get the shipping label?‚Äù.  
‚úî Attach it to the package.  
‚úî Drop off the package at a pickup point, relay, or mailbox (depending on the carrier). You won‚Äôt have to pay anything.  
‚úî Confirm shipment via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  

**Step 5: The buyer confirms receipt**  
The buyer has 15 days from shipment to confirm receipt of the package.  

**Step 6: The buyer confirms the product‚Äôs condition**  
After receiving the package, the buyer has 3 additional days to confirm that the product matches the description. This step releases the sale funds to you.  

**Note:** If the buyer doesn‚Äôt respond within 3 days, the sale amount is automatically transferred to you.  

**Step 7: Receive your payment**  
The sale is finalized, and your payment is released. You can view it in your AI-Bay wallet.  
See ‚ÄúPrivate seller: when will I receive my payment?‚Äù.  

**Note:** Regardless of the buyer‚Äôs payment method, you‚Äôll receive the full amount once the transaction is complete.

faq_title: **How to Manage My Listings?**
faq_body:
**Access your listings dashboard**  
Manage your listings effectively in three steps:  

1. Log in to your account and go to the ‚ÄúListings‚Äù page (daily login is recommended).  
2. Identify which listings need attention ‚Äî start with those automatically flagged (based on their stats) in the summary at the top (e.g., listings to update).  
3. Decide the best action for each listing. Recommended actions appear in blue, but you can choose any other action as needed.  

**Features of the listings dashboard**  

| Feature | Description |  
|----------|--------------|  
| **Listing health summary** | Shows the number of active listings and your optimization score (percentage of listings considered optimized), the number of listings to boost, to edit, and already optimized. |  
| **Search engine** | Filter listings by category, location, required action, age, or keyword. |  
| **Overview of your listings** | Displays each listing‚Äôs status (optimized, to boost, to edit), along with key stats: views, favorites, messages received, and phone number clicks. Includes shortcuts to promotion options. |  
| **Detailed performance view** | When you click ‚ÄúView all charts,‚Äù you can see performance trends over 2 months, 1 year, or the entire listing lifetime: search visibility, number of views, times favorited, and phone number clicks. |

faq_title: **How Much Does the Online Vacation Rental Booking Service Cost?**
faq_body:
**For hosts**  
The online booking service for vacation rental listings is free for hosts.  
AI-Bay does not charge any commission on your bookings. Our goal is to make your transactions with travelers safer.  

**For travelers**  
When booking, travelers pay a service fee that covers the operational costs of the platform.  
As of December 1, 2024, this service fee is 14% of the total rental amount (excluding local taxes).  
These fees are collected by our trusted third-party payment partner, Adyen, once the booking is confirmed.  

However, AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is the only team authorized to handle identity verification and payment-related inquiries for users.  
Therefore, please do not contact Adyen directly, as they are not able to respond to AI-Bay user requests.  

**Note:** For any booking made through a Locasun listing, please refer directly to the information provided via the link here.

faq_title: **Buyer: What Payment Methods Are Accepted?**
faq_body:
For transactions made through secure payment, the accepted payment methods are:  

- Payment card  
- AI-Bay wallet  
- Apple Pay  
- Payment in 3 or 4 installments by credit card  

**Can I combine two payment methods?**  
Yes, you can. For example, if your AI-Bay wallet balance isn‚Äôt enough to cover the full purchase amount, you can complete the payment with a credit card.  

**Payment card**  
Accepted cards include valid:  
- Carte Bancaire  
- Visa  
- Mastercard  

**AI-Bay wallet**  
‚úî You can use the money earned from your AI-Bay sales to make purchases through your AI-Bay wallet.  

**Note:** Wallet funds cannot be used for vacation rental bookings.  

See our article ‚ÄúHow to pay on AI-Bay using my wallet balance?‚Äù for more details.  

**Apple Pay**  
To make your purchases easier, you can pay directly via Apple Pay. This allows you to confirm your card payment securely without leaving the app, using Touch ID or Face ID.  

Eligible devices:  
‚úî iPhone with Face ID or Touch ID (except iPhone 5s)  
‚úî iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad, or iPad mini models with Touch ID or Face ID  

Accepted cards:  
‚úî Carte Bancaire  
‚úî Visa  
‚úî Mastercard  

**Note:** If you have other card types in your Apple Pay wallet, they cannot be used for AI-Bay transactions.  

**Payment in 3 or 4 installments by credit card**  
You can pay in several installments using your Visa or Mastercard.  
For more details, see:  
- ‚ÄúHow does payment in 3 or 4 installments by card work?‚Äù  
- ‚ÄúHow to pay in 3 or 4 installments by card?‚Äù  

**Payments outside our platform: stay cautious**  
To benefit from AI-Bay‚Äôs protection, always use our secure payment system, which safeguards your money until the transaction is complete. Secure payment is also available for in-person exchanges.  

If you choose not to use AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment, be extra careful with your contacts and watch for suspicious behavior. AI-Bay cannot protect you from fraudulent transactions made outside the platform.  

Resources to help you stay safe:  
- Identify suspicious behavior  
- Our tools and tips for protection  
- How to report or block a user

faq_title: **Buyer: How Much Does Secure Payment Cost?**
faq_body:
When using secure payment, you pay the following fees:  
‚úî The product price, set by the seller.  
‚úî Delivery fees, which vary depending on the carrier (see ‚ÄúBuyer: how much does delivery cost for each carrier?‚Äù).  
‚úî Service fees, up to 4% of the purchase price, with a minimum of ‚Ç¨0.99.  

**Note:** See also ‚ÄúPrivate seller: how much does secure payment cost?‚Äù

faq_title: **Is creating a Pro account mandatory?**
faq_body:
Creating a Pro Account is free and mandatory for professionals who wish to post listings.  
To browse listings, no registration is required.  

You may be considered a professional in the following cases:  
- You sell items purchased with the intent to resell them, not for personal use.  
- You sell items you have created yourself.  
- You regularly sell a large number of items.  
- Your sales generate profits and provide a substantial income.  

If you are unsure whether you qualify as a professional or a private individual, we encourage you to review the relevant legal and regulatory provisions to help determine your status.

faq_title: **I received a suspicious message, call, or text ‚Äî what should I do?**
faq_body:
Note: If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

Recognizing a suspicious message  
Responding to a suspicious message  
Suspicious calls and SMS  
Messages and Emails  

I was a victim of a phone or SMS scam  

**Recognizing a suspicious message**  
Be cautious if a buyer contacts you and:  
X Requests all your personal details.  
X Proposes payment via Mandat Cash, PayPal, Paylib, Transcash, or Western Union, for example.  
X Mentions being temporarily abroad.  
X Asks for confidential information (payslips, tax returns, ID documents).  
X Invites you to communicate outside the AI-Bay messaging system.  

**Responding to a suspicious message**  
**Suspicious calls and SMS**  
We recommend not responding if you receive a suspicious SMS from a user asking you to contact them by email.  
In general, never share personal or banking information by phone or SMS. Be cautious of urgent requests‚Äîif someone pressures you to act quickly, especially regarding payments or personal data, it‚Äôs likely a scam attempt.  
You can safely delete such messages.  

AI-Bay will never call you to request banking information or payment. If you receive such a call, do not respond‚Äîit‚Äôs a fraud attempt.  

**Important:** We cannot filter phone calls or SMS messages that occur outside our platform.  
We encourage you to report them directly to the national SMS spam center via 33700 or the website 33700.fr.  

**Messages and Emails**  
Always use AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system to communicate with potential buyers.  
If you receive a suspicious message or email:  
X Do not reply or click any links.  
‚úî Report it on 33700.fr (anti-spam platform)  
‚úî Block the user.  
‚úî Report the user.  

**Note:** Email addresses like "contact-xxxxxxxxx@messagerie.ai-bay.fr" (where x represents a series of numbers and letters) correspond to users communicating through our messaging tool. These addresses are anonymized for security and to prevent spam.  

**I was a victim of a phone or SMS scam**  
We‚Äôre sorry for the situation you‚Äôre facing. If you‚Äôve been a victim of this type of scam, we recommend visiting cybermalveillance.gouv.fr, where you can get assistance to file a complaint or report the incident.  

You can also contact our team so we can block the phishing attempt by providing the following information:  
‚úî The phone number(s) from which the malicious SMS originated.  
‚úî The email address of the fraudulent user‚Äôs account.  
‚úî The link to the listing related to the SMS.  
‚úî A copy/paste of the fraudulent website address included in the SMS.  
‚úî Any other details that could help us identify the scammer.

faq_title: **How can I contact a seller?**
faq_body:
**Important:** We cannot guarantee any actions taken outside AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system and secure payment service. For more information about platform safety, visit our Trust and Safety section.  

There are two ways to contact a seller: by phone or through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  

To contact a seller, follow these steps:  
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Click ‚ÄúSend a message‚Äù or ‚ÄúView number‚Äù from the listing page.  

**Note:** A seller may choose not to share their phone number. In that case, you can only contact them via message.  

If you‚Äôre contacting a private seller and want to view all your conversations across devices:  
1. Log in to your account.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúMessages.‚Äù  
3. Select the relevant listing to continue your conversation.  

Conversations between private users take place exclusively through AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system. For security reasons, email addresses remain anonymous. If you or your contact share an email address through the chat, it will not be displayed.  

For more tips on safe communication, see our article ‚ÄúHow to Spot Suspicious Behavior?‚Äù.  

**Note:** To contact a professional seller in the Real Estate, Automotive, Jobs, or Vacation categories, go to the listing and click ‚ÄúSend a message.‚Äù Further communication will continue via email. Messaging is not available for professionals in these categories.

faq_title: **What are cookies used for?**
faq_body:
Cookies are small files installed on your computer that allow our system to remember the listings you‚Äôve saved and the automatic searches you‚Äôve set up.  
Cookies are completely anonymous and contain no personal information.  

**Disabling cookies from the web**  
‚úî Go to our AI-Bay Privacy Policy page.  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúYour Rights‚Äù tab, then ‚ÄúHow to exercise your rights?‚Äù  
‚úî At the end of the section, click the link ‚ÄúYou can also manage your cookie preferences by clicking here.‚Äù  
‚úî You‚Äôll then be able to adjust your authorization settings in the pop-up window.  

**Disabling cookies from the AI-Bay app**  
‚úî Go to the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù page.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúLegal Information,‚Äù then ‚ÄúPrivacy.‚Äù  
‚úî You can manage your permissions by toggling the buttons: green means tracking is enabled, red means it‚Äôs disabled.  

**Note:** You can accept or refuse tracking by our various partners in detail by clicking ‚ÄúView partners.‚Äù  
Please note that if you disable cookies, some services offered on our site may not function properly.

faq_title: **How can I move my listing to the top of the list?**
faq_body:
**What is the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option?**  
**Subscribing to the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option**  
**Payment for the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option**  

**What is the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option?**  
This feature automatically bumps your listing to the top of search results on the website and app, as if it had just been posted.  

There are four ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù options:  

| Option | Description |  
|---------|--------------|  
| **Move my listing to the top immediately** | Your listing is instantly moved to the top of the results, as if newly posted. |  
| **Move my listing to the top daily for 7 days** | Your listing is moved to the top every day for 7 consecutive days at the same time you subscribed. You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email upon subscription and another on the 8th day when the option expires. |  
| **Move my listing to the top daily for 30 days** | Your listing is moved to the top every day for 30 consecutive days at the same time you subscribed. You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email upon subscription, reminders on the 8th, 15th, and 22nd days, and a final email the day before expiration (29th day). |  
| **Move my listing to the top weekly for 60 days** | Your listing is moved to the top once a week for the remaining duration of your listing (60 days) on the anniversary date of posting. |  

**Subscribing to the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option**  
You can subscribe to these options when posting, renewing, or editing your listing.  

To move a listing to the top:  
‚úî Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúListings.‚Äù  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSell faster‚Äù or select the listing and click ‚ÄúTop of the List Subscription.‚Äù  

**Payment for the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option**  
These options are payable by credit card.  

To check pricing (depending on the selected category):  
‚úî Log in to your account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúPricing‚Äù tab in our Terms of Sale.  
‚úî Select the category where you want to post your listing.  

The publication duration of your listing remains unchanged.

faq_title: **Buyer: How can I pay on AI-Bay using the money in my wallet?**
faq_body:
The money you receive from your sales or reservations on AI-Bay is now credited to your AI-Bay wallet. You can use this balance at any time to make new transactions on AI-Bay.  

**Note:** Identity verification is required to use your wallet as a payment method or to transfer funds to your bank account.  

**Using your wallet to make a purchase via secure payment**  
‚úî On the listing you‚Äôre interested in, click the ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù button.  
‚úî Choose a delivery method (shipping or in-person handover).  
‚úî The available payment options will appear. Select the wallet. For consumer goods purchases, if your wallet balance isn‚Äôt sufficient, you can complete the payment using another method.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay‚Äù to finalize the transaction. Your wallet balance will automatically update afterward.  

**When the wallet doesn‚Äôt appear among payment options**  
The wallet will not appear as a payment option in the following cases:  
X You haven‚Äôt completed identity verification.  
X The seller cannot receive funds through their wallet.  
X The transaction is a donation (‚Ç¨0), even if delivery fees apply.  
X The purchase involves a paid option to boost a listing.  
X The seller is a professional.

faq_title: **Private Seller: Can the product I send be insured?**
faq_body:
AI-Bay does not offer insurance for items shipped through the secure payment system. However, for shipments via Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or Relais Colis, you may be eligible for a fixed compensation if the carrier officially declares your parcel lost or damaged on their website.  

**Mondial Relay, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, and Relais Colis**  
Fixed compensation conditions in case of loss or damage:  
- For transactions under ‚Ç¨400: reimbursement of the item‚Äôs price  
- For transactions between ‚Ç¨400 and ‚Ç¨2000: reimbursement up to ‚Ç¨400  

**Colissimo**  
Fixed compensation in case of loss or damage is up to ‚Ç¨23 per kilogram.  

**Requesting additional insurance from the carrier**  
If you want better protection for valuable items, you can purchase insurance directly from the carrier.  
In this case, your parcel must be sent as a personalized shipment (even if you choose Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or Relais Colis). To do this:  
‚úî First, estimate the insured shipping cost on the carrier‚Äôs website.  
‚úî When posting your listing on AI-Bay, select ‚ÄúOther delivery methods‚Äù and enter the shipping cost.  
‚úî The buyer completes the purchase via secure payment (including shipping fees).  
‚úî You then ship the parcel through the carrier‚Äôs website, paying the shipping costs upfront (these will be reimbursed once you receive the transaction payment).

faq_title: **Buyer: Can I update my delivery address after my order has been confirmed?**
faq_body:
It‚Äôs not possible to change the delivery address once the order has been confirmed. If you truly cannot go to the selected address:  
‚úî Notify the seller before they ship the parcel.  
‚úî Ask the seller to cancel the transaction.  
‚úî Place your order again, making sure to enter the correct delivery address.

faq_title: **How can I report commercial solicitation?**
faq_body:
If you receive a message that appears to be a solicitation from a real estate professional, you can report it as follows:  
‚úî Click the icon or ‚ÄúMore,‚Äù then select ‚ÄúReport this user.‚Äù  
‚úî Choose the reason ‚ÄúCommercial spam or solicitation‚Äù and, if you wish, check the box ‚ÄúAllow AI-Bay to access the conversation with the reported user.‚Äù  

You can also report it by clicking the ‚ÄúReport solicitation‚Äù link in the automatic message that appears when a solicitation attempt is suspected.  

Once your report is submitted, our team will review it. By reporting such messages, you help improve the experience for all AI-Bay users.  

**Note:** After reporting, you can also block the user. They will no longer be able to contact you.  

You can also report spam calls or text messages to **33 700**:  
- To report a call, send an SMS with ‚Äúspam vocal‚Äù + the caller‚Äôs number.  
- To report a text message, forward it directly to 33 700.  
You may also file a complaint with the CNIL using the provided link.

faq_title: **How can I edit my rental application file?**
faq_body:
You can update the information in your rental application file as follows:  

1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Go to your account homepage by clicking your name (top right).  
3. Click ‚ÄúProfile & Spaces.‚Äù  
4. Click ‚ÄúAccess my rental file.‚Äù  
5. Click the ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù button in the section you want to update.  

**Note:** Any changes you make to your rental file will be visible to all landlords to whom you have previously sent your application.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I make my candidate profile visible to recruiters?
faq_body:
Change the Visibility Status of Your Candidate Profile  
To make your candidate profile visible in the CV database:  

If you haven‚Äôt already, create your candidate profile by clicking ‚ÄúCreate my candidate profile.‚Äù  
Once your profile is created, activate its visibility by clicking the ‚ÄúVisible profile‚Äù button located at the top right of the page. If the button is green, your profile is visible to recruiters. If it‚Äôs gray, visibility is turned off.  

Who can access my candidate profile?  
When your profile is visible, recruiters to whom you send your application ‚Äî as well as all other professional AI-Bay accounts ‚Äî can access your profile and download it to view its details.  
When your profile is invisible, only the recruiters to whom you send your application can access your candidate profile.

faq_title: **Title:** How to protect yourself and respond to delivery scams
faq_body:
What Is a Delivery Scam?  
I received a suspicious delivery message ‚Äî what should I do?  
I‚Äôm a victim of a delivery scam ‚Äî what should I do?  

Note: These recommendations are taken from the French government website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, click here.  
If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

What is a delivery scam?  
This type of scam falls under the category of cybercrime known as phishing, which involves impersonating a well-known brand or organization to trick victims into revealing personal or confidential information.  
In the case of parcel delivery scams, victims receive a message (email or SMS) that appears to come from delivery companies such as La Poste, Colissimo, DPD, Chronopost, UPS, etc. The message then redirects to a fraudulent website where personal information may be requested ‚Äî such as your name, postal or email address, or phone number.  

I received a suspicious delivery message ‚Äî what should I do?  
First, know that legitimate delivery companies will never ask you to make a payment by SMS or email to receive a parcel.  
If in doubt:  
- Contact the delivery company directly to confirm the message you received.  
- Do not open suspicious messages or attachments, and never click on the links they contain.  
- Hover your mouse over any suspicious link (without clicking) to see the real address and verify its authenticity.  
- If you clicked on a link, check the website address in your browser. If it doesn‚Äôt exactly match the official site, it‚Äôs likely fraudulent.  
- Report any suspicious email or website to Signal Spam. For SMS messages, report them to the 33700 platform or by texting 33 700.  
- Report phishing website addresses to Phishing Initiative, which will block and request removal of the fraudulent site.  
- Also report suspicious messages and websites to the delivery companies whose identities have been impersonated.  
- Report the scam attempt on the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs platform: Internet-signalement.gouv.fr.  

I‚Äôm a victim of a delivery scam ‚Äî what should I do?  
- Contact the legitimate delivery company to confirm the scam.  
- Immediately block your payment method with your bank.  
- Keep the message and the malicious website address as evidence.  
- If you notice fraudulent charges on your bank card, report them on the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs Perceval platform.  
- File a complaint with the authorities.  
- Contact your bank to request reimbursement.  
- For advice, contact the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs Info Escroqueries helpline at 0 805 805 817.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I secure my purchases on AI-Bay?
faq_body:
Note: This article includes recommendations partly taken from the French government website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, click here.  

Using Secure Payment  
AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system allows you to carry out simple and safe transactions between individuals directly through your messaging. It‚Äôs the safest way to make your purchases.  
By using secure payment, you benefit from AI-Bay‚Äôs protection, which keeps your money safe until the transaction is completed.  
If you prefer to meet sellers in person, note that secure payment can also be used for face-to-face transactions through the in-person handover system.  

If You Don‚Äôt Want to Use Secure Payment  
If you choose not to use AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment, be especially cautious about who you‚Äôre dealing with and watch for suspicious behavior. AI-Bay cannot protect you from fraudulent transactions made outside the platform.  

Here are a few things to keep in mind:  
‚úî Be wary of offers that seem too good to be true.  
‚úî Check the seller‚Äôs profile ‚Äî the ‚Äúrecommended profile‚Äù badge and rating can help you assess their reliability.  
‚úò Never send cash or checks by mail or courier abroad, and avoid external payment methods such as Mandat Cash or Western Union.  
‚úò Do not share personal information (bank details, ID documents, etc.).  

Note: If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: how to make an offer to a buyer?
faq_body:
Who Can I Make an Offer To?  
How to Make an Offer  
Can I Modify an Offer?  
Can I Make an Offer to Multiple Buyers for the Same Listing?  
Can I Cancel an Offer from a Buyer?  

Who can I make an offer to?  
As a seller, you can send an offer to users who:  
‚úî Have added your item to their favorites and opted to receive notifications.  
‚úî Have started a conversation with you through secure messaging.  

How to make an offer  
When a potential buyer shows interest in your item, offering a better price might convince them to complete the purchase.  
To make an offer:  
‚úî Go to secure messaging and select the relevant conversation.  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúMake an offer‚Äù button.  
‚úî Enter the price you wish to propose.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù  
The buyer then has 48 hours to accept or decline the offer. They can also make a counteroffer after rejecting yours.  

Note: You cannot cancel an offer you‚Äôve sent. However, it will automatically expire after 48 hours if the buyer takes no action (neither accepts, rejects, nor counters the offer).  

Can I modify an offer?  
It‚Äôs not possible to modify an offer. If your first offer wasn‚Äôt accepted, you can send a new one, which will replace the previous offer.  

Warning: You cannot cancel an offer that has already been accepted.  

Can I make an offer to multiple buyers for the same listing?  
Yes, you can send offers to several different buyers for the same listing.  
As long as no buyer has completed payment, negotiations can continue freely. Ongoing negotiations do not block direct purchases or other offers.  

Can I cancel an offer from a buyer?  
If you receive an offer from a buyer that doesn‚Äôt suit you, you can:  
‚úî Go to the conversation with that buyer and click ‚ÄúDecline offer.‚Äù  
‚úî If you don‚Äôt confirm the availability of your product, the offer will automatically expire after 48 hours.  
After that, you can make a new offer to the buyer if you wish.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: steps for completing a sale with secure payment and in-person handover
faq_body:
Step 1: Post a Listing  
Step 2: A Buyer Makes Payment  
Step 3: Confirm Product Availability  
Step 4: Arrange a Meeting with the Buyer  
Step 5: The Buyer Checks the Product  
Step 6: Receive Your Payment  

Step 1: Post a Listing  
Follow the steps described in ‚ÄúHow to Post a Listing?‚Äù to put your product up for sale on AI-Bay.  
In-person handover is automatically enabled, as is delivery.  

If you want to offer only in-person handover, click ‚ÄúEdit delivery options‚Äù and uncheck all boxes. Delivery will then be disabled for your listing.  

Step 2: A Buyer Makes Payment  
Once your listing is online, a buyer can:  
- Purchase the item directly.  
- Make you an offer suggesting a new price.  

You can also propose a new price to a buyer. See ‚ÄúPrivate Seller: How to Make an Offer to a Buyer?‚Äù  
Once the buyer completes payment, you‚Äôll receive a purchase confirmation via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging.  

Step 3: Confirm Product Availability  
To validate the purchase, you have 48 hours from the buyer‚Äôs payment to confirm the product‚Äôs availability. After that, the transaction is automatically canceled.  
See ‚ÄúPrivate Seller: How to Confirm Product Availability and Trigger the Sale?‚Äù  

Important: If the in-person handover does not occur within 30 days after confirming product availability, the transaction amount will automatically be transferred to you. Before this deadline, either you or the buyer can cancel the transaction at any time via your messaging or transaction details.  

Step 4: Arrange a Meeting with the Buyer  
Once the purchase is confirmed, it‚Äôs time to hand over the item to its new owner. Communicate with the buyer through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging to arrange a meeting.  

Note: On the day of the meeting, make sure your phone is charged and connected to the internet to complete the final steps of the sale.  

Step 5: The Buyer Checks the Product  
On the meeting day, the buyer verifies that the product matches the description and triggers the payment through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging.  

Warning: Wait until you receive confirmation that the buyer has triggered your payment via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging before handing over the item.  

Step 6: Receive Your Payment  
You‚Äôll receive the payment in your AI-Bay wallet.  

Note: Regardless of the payment method chosen by the buyer, you‚Äôll receive the full amount once the transaction is finalized. It may take 2 to 5 days for the funds to appear in your wallet.

faq_title: **Host: How to Set the Minimum Number of Nights?**
faq_body:
To better manage your booking calendar, you can set a minimum number of nights for your guests‚Äô vacation reservations.  

**When posting your listing**  
- Log in to your account and click on ‚ÄúPost an ad.‚Äù  
- Fill in all the required information for your listing.  
- In the section ‚ÄúWhat is your price?‚Äù, choose the ‚ÄúPer night‚Äù pricing option and select the minimum stay duration (between 1 and 15 nights).  

**After posting your listing**  
- Go to your list of ads.  
- Click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button for the relevant listing.  
- Then select ‚ÄúPrice and availability settings.‚Äù  
- You can then adjust the minimum stay duration.  

**Note:** If you want to set a minimum stay longer than 7 nights, switch your calendar to nightly mode. See also: *How to manage prices and availability with the new calendar?*

faq_title: **How to Change How Listings Are Displayed in Search Results?**
faq_body:
**When can the display of listings be changed?**  
You can modify how listings appear in the search results:  

- From the mobile app (iOS or Android).  
- For all search categories except Jobs and Vacations (on Android), and Jobs, Real Estate, and Vehicles (on iOS).  

**How to change the display**  
- Perform a search.  
- In the list of filters, select ‚ÄúView.‚Äù  
- You can then choose between list view or gallery view.

faq_title: **üöô Seller: How to Use Secure Payment When Selling My Vehicle?**
faq_body:
**Using secure payment with the Serenity Pack**  
You are eligible for the Serenity Pack if your vehicle meets the following criteria:  
‚úî The vehicle must be a car or a utility vehicle.  
‚úî The price must be ‚Ç¨50,000 or less.  
‚úî The vehicle‚Äôs age must be between 2 and 20 years.  
‚úî The DIN power must be 265 hp or less.  
‚úî The mileage must be 200,000 km or less.  

**Using secure payment without the Serenity Pack**  
If your vehicle meets the following criteria, you can still use secure payment, but the Serenity Pack will not be available:  
‚úî The vehicle can be a car, motorcycle, caravan, boat, or utility vehicle.  
‚úî The price must be ‚Ç¨50,000 or less.  
‚úî The vehicle‚Äôs age is under 2 years or over 20 years.  
‚úî The DIN power is greater than 265 hp.  
‚úî The mileage is over 200,000 km.  

**How to activate secure payment for my vehicle listing?**  
If your vehicle qualifies for secure payment (with or without the Serenity Pack), it will be automatically activated for your listing. No additional action is required.  

To learn more: üöô *How does secure payment work for used vehicles?*

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: How Much Does Secure Payment for Vehicles Cost?**
faq_body:
**I am a seller**  
Secure payment is completely free for the seller.  

**I am a buyer**  
When purchasing a vehicle using secure payment, the buyer pays:  

**With the Serenity Pack**  
‚úî The price of the vehicle  
‚úî The Mechanical Breakdown Warranty fee (optional) with secure payment  

- 3-month warranty: ‚Ç¨139 (‚Ç¨119.01 for the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty + ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee)  
- 6-month warranty: ‚Ç¨259 (‚Ç¨239.01 for the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty + ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee)  
- 12-month warranty: ‚Ç¨399 (‚Ç¨379.01 for the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty + ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee)  
- No warranty: ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee  

**Without the Serenity Pack**  
‚úî The price of the vehicle  
‚úî A ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee  

**Note:** If the transaction is not completed, no fees will be charged.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Use the Contact Form on Your Pro Page?
faq_body:
The contact form available on your Pro Page allows users to reach you directly, without going through a listing.  
You can change the email address used by this contact form to receive messages at your preferred address. By default, we use the one linked to your account.  
Users must fill in the fields Name, Phone, and Email to send you a message.  
You‚Äôll receive an email containing the prospect‚Äôs information, allowing you to contact them directly.  

If you want to show or hide the contact form on your Pro Page, follow these simple steps:  

1. Log in to your professional account  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your Professional Space  
3. Click on the ‚ÄúContact Form‚Äù section  
4. Check or uncheck the ‚ÄúEmail Contact Form‚Äù box  

- When the box is checked, the contact form is visible on your Pro Page  
- When the box is unchecked, the contact form is hidden from your Pro Page  

Finally, save your changes.  
Your updates will appear on your page within a few minutes.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: The Steps of a Purchase with Secure Payment and Delivery
faq_body:
Step 1: Search and select a listing  
Step 2: Buy the item or make an offer  
Step 3: Enter delivery details  
Step 4: Proceed to payment  
Step 5: The seller confirms item availability and ships it  
Step 6: Receive your package  
Step 7: Check the item‚Äôs condition  

**Step 1: Search and select a listing**  
‚úî From the homepage, search for the item you‚Äôre interested in. If needed, check our tips in the ‚ÄúSearch and Browse Listings‚Äù section.  
‚úî Once you‚Äôve found the right item, make sure the ‚ÄúDelivery available‚Äù badge appears on the listing. If not, it means you can‚Äôt use secure payment and delivery for that item.  

**Step 2: Buy the item or make an offer**  

*Make an offer*  
‚úî Send an initial message to the seller.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúMake an offer.‚Äù  
‚úî Propose a price and send your offer.  

Note: See the article *Buyer: How to make an offer to the seller?* for more details.  

*Buy the item or bundle directly*  
From a listing, click ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù or create your bundle, then click ‚ÄúBuy the bundle.‚Äù  

Note: See *Buyer: How bundle purchases work* for more information.  

**Step 3: Enter delivery details**  
‚úî Choose the nearest pickup point or your delivery address. If the seller offers multiple delivery options, select the one that suits you best.  
‚úî Enter your first and last name.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay‚Äù to move to the next step.  

Note: See *Buyer: How much does delivery cost depending on the carrier (Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Tracked Mail)?* for more details. For other delivery methods, fees are set by the seller.  

**Step 4: Proceed to payment**  
The total amount to pay will appear:  
‚úî Choose your payment method  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay‚Äù  

Note: Some purchases may require authentication through your banking app. Learn more in *Understanding the DSP2 regulation securing online transactions.*  

**Step 5: The seller confirms availability and ships the item**  
After your purchase, the seller has 48 hours to confirm availability and 6 days to ship the package to your chosen address.  

**Step 6: Receive your package**  
The carrier will notify you when your package is delivered (to a pickup point or your home). From the secure messaging system, confirm receipt within 15 days after shipment; otherwise, the package will be automatically marked as received.  

**Step 7: Check the item‚Äôs condition**  
Now check your package‚Äôs contents. The next steps depend on the type of seller:  

- *Purchase from a private seller:* Confirm the item‚Äôs condition via messaging. If you don‚Äôt act within 3 days, the transaction will automatically complete, and the seller will receive payment. You can then recommend the seller by leaving a review.  
- *Purchase from a professional seller:* You have 14 days to withdraw if the product doesn‚Äôt meet your expectations. If there‚Äôs an issue with your order, follow the steps outlined in the related article.  

Note: If the received product or bundle doesn‚Äôt match the listing, see *Buyer: What to do if the received product doesn‚Äôt match the listing?*

faq_title: **Title:** What Are the Cancellation Conditions for Stays?
faq_body:
Note: AI-Bay‚Äôs cancellation conditions do not apply to Locasun bookings. For details about Locasun stay cancellations, please click here.  

**Cancellation by the host**  
The host can cancel the booking up to 24 hours before the start of the stay.  
The deposit, service fees, and tourist tax will be refunded to the traveler within 48 hours of cancellation.  
For more details: *Host: How to cancel a booking?*  

**Cancellation by the traveler**  
- If the traveler cancels more than 30 days before the start of the stay, the full amount paid via AI-Bay‚Äôs online payment will be refunded.  
- If the traveler cancels less than 30 days before the start of the stay, only the tourist tax will be refunded.  

Note: For more information, see *Traveler: How to cancel my stay?*  

**Exceptional cancellation**  
*How it works*  
A traveler may receive an exceptional refund if unavoidable circumstances beyond their control occur.  
They must refer to the list of valid circumstances below and contact Customer Service (selecting ‚ÄúRequest for exceptional cancellation‚Äù) no later than 48 hours before the start of the stay, providing supporting documentation.  
AI-Bay will review each request individually and reserves the right to accept or decline it.  
If the cancellation request is approved by AI-Bay, the deposit, service fees, and tourist tax will be refunded within 48 hours of cancellation.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: It is not possible to cancel a booking on the day the stay begins (except under the Mutuaide guarantee).  

If both parties agree to cancel, the host can cancel up to 24 hours before the stay. For more details, see our articles on cancellation conditions for hosts and travelers.  

**Valid reasons for exceptional cancellation**  
The following situations may qualify for exceptional cancellation (proof required):  
- Pandemics as defined by the WHO, natural disasters, civil wars, major political instability, or acts of terrorism preventing travel to or from the destination or making it unsafe to host travelers.  
- Travel restrictions imposed by government, law enforcement, or military authorities that prevent travel to or from the accommodation.  
- Events making the accommodation unavailable or requiring technical or human intervention (e.g., major repairs, water damage, fire, gas leaks).  

**Reasons not considered exceptional**  
Exceptional cancellation does not apply to:  
- Closed beaches or restaurants  
- Personal concerns  
- Illness (including COVID-19), etc.

faq_title: **Title:** The Online Booking Service for Travelers
faq_body:
As a traveler, you can now book your vacation rental with peace of mind by selecting your travel dates and booking online. You can find stays on AI-Bay offered by both private hosts and professionals.  

**1 - Start by searching for your property**  
Find all vacation rentals under the ‚ÄúVacations‚Äù category. You‚Äôll find:  
- Rentals from private hosts  
- Rentals from professionals  
- Hotels  

Refine your search using filters such as location, travel dates, number of guests, or amenities like a pool.  

Note: Hosts appearing first in search results are those who regularly use the online booking service and are more likely to accept your request.  

**2 - Book your stay**  
Once you‚Äôve found your vacation rental and selected your dates, you can proceed with your booking.  
To finalize your booking through online reservation, complete the payment process.  

If you booked with:  

- *A private host on AI-Bay:*  
You pay only the deposit online through AI-Bay. You can message your host anytime via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging. The host has 72 hours to confirm your booking. Once confirmed, your payment is held securely and automatically transferred to the host 48 hours after your arrival.  
For certain payment amounts, the host (private individuals only) must provide identity verification (ID or passport) to our payment provider, Adyen. This ensures a safe and verified booking experience.  

- *A Locasun host:*  
You pay the full amount online.  

- *A hotel:*  
Follow the instructions on the hotel‚Äôs website.  

See all booking steps in *How to book my vacation?*  

**3 - Guaranteed safe travel**  
When booking online with private hosts through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment, your stay is protected:  
- Any booking accepted after June 30 is covered by Mutuaide. To benefit from the guarantee, contact Mutuaide (available 24/7) on your arrival day or by noon the next day if you arrived after 8 p.m. See guarantee details.  
If an issue arises upon arrival:  
- The deposit refund is processed within 48 hours.  
- The insurer helps you find alternative accommodation nearby.  
- The insurer covers up to three hotel nights if needed, within the guaranteed amount.  

Note: You can view your Locasun bookings directly on locasun.fr and hotel bookings on the hotel‚Äôs website.  

**4 - Track my booking**  
If you booked with:  
- *A private host on AI-Bay:*  
Find all your bookings in your account under the ‚ÄúVacation Bookings‚Äù tab. You can message your host anytime via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging about services or payment details.  
- *A Locasun host:*  
View your bookings directly on locasun.fr.  
- *A hotel:*  
View your bookings directly on the hotel‚Äôs website.  

**5 - Arrival at the property**  
If you booked with:  
- *A private host on AI-Bay:*  
Upon arrival, pay the remaining balance according to the payment terms agreed with your host.  
- *A Locasun host:*  
For Locasun bookings, full payment has already been made.  
- *A hotel:*  
Follow the hotel‚Äôs payment terms.  

**6 - End of stay**  
If you booked with:  
- *A private host on AI-Bay:*  
After your stay, don‚Äôt forget to recommend your host (for private bookings only). See *Traveler: How to recommend a host?*  
- *A Locasun host or hotel:*  
Refer to the emails you received for follow-up details.

faq_title: **Title:** My Listing Was Rejected ‚Äî What Should I Do?
faq_body:
**Understanding the reason for rejection**  
**What to do after your listing is refused**  

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If you‚Äôre unable to post a listing from your smartphone or tablet, make sure your AI-Bay app is updated to the latest version.  

**Understanding the reason for rejection**  
After submitting your listing, you received an email from our team explaining the refusal.  
Please review the posting rules specific to your listing‚Äôs category to understand why it was rejected.  

Here are the main reasons for refusal:  
- **Your listing doesn‚Äôt comply with animal regulations**  
  Posting in the ‚ÄúAnimals‚Äù category is regulated, especially for dogs and cats. Learn more:  
  - How to post a listing for an animal?  
  - What are the criteria for posting a dog or cat listing?  
  - Posting rules  

- **You already have a similar active listing**  
  Having multiple identical active listings is not allowed. Make sure each listing is unique to avoid confusion. Photos, text, and titles must differ for each one.  

- **You are considered a professional seller**  
  If your activity from a private account resembles that of a professional seller, we may remove your listings.  
  See *Are you a private individual or a professional?*  

- **The listing can only be posted from a professional account**  
  Some activities (like job offers) are reserved for professional accounts.  
  If you wish to open a Pro account, click here after logging out of your private AI-Bay account.  

- **The listing was posted in the wrong category**  
  If you received a rejection email for this reason, review our posting rules and correct your listing. You can click on the relevant category to see the applicable rules.  

- **The product you‚Äôre trying to sell is not allowed**  
  This means the product or service you‚Äôre offering is prohibited on our site. See *Prohibited products.*  

**What to do after your listing is refused**  
To fix the issue, simply repost your listing, ensuring it complies with the posting rules. For guidance, see *What rules must my listing follow?*  

Note: If you selected a paid option to boost a listing that was refused, you will not be charged.

faq_title: **Title:** My messages aren‚Äôt reaching the people I‚Äôm contacting
faq_body:
If your messages aren‚Äôt reaching the other person, several explanations are possible:

**You‚Äôve been blocked by the other user**  
In cases of inappropriate exchanges, a user can block another. In this situation, you‚Äôll still have access to the messaging system, but your contact will no longer receive your messages.

**Your messages contain unauthorized information**  
To ensure user safety, unsuitable content (spam, solicitation, etc.) may be hidden from the messaging system or prevent a message from being sent.  
See the code of conduct that applies to all your exchanges on **AI-Bay**.

faq_title: **Title:** What is a Pro account?
faq_body:
The **Pro Account** is a secure, personal space where you can post and manage your listings.

Your Pro Account gives you access to a dedicated interface where you can view all your active listings and their statistics at a glance:

- The number of times your listing appears in search results  
- The number of views your listing receives  
- The number of times your listing is added to favorites  
- The number of messages received related to the listing  
- The number of clicks to display your phone number  

From this interface, you can also edit your listings or apply the same paid promotion option to several listings at once.

Finally, with the Pro Account, you can use our simplified payment solution through credit purchases (credit card payment only) on **AI-Bay**.

faq_title: **Title:** I think an ad looks suspicious ‚Äî what should I do?
faq_body:
**Spotting suspicious listings**

Be cautious if the price of a listing seems unusually low.

We encourage you to stay alert if a seller contacts you and:

- Requests all your personal details  
- Suggests payment via Mandat Cash, PayPal, or Western Union, for example  
- Claims to be temporarily abroad  
- Asks for confidential information (pay slips, tax returns, ID documents)  
- Invites you to communicate outside the site‚Äôs messaging system  

Also, be wary of sellers claiming to use a delivery service that supposedly partners with **AI-Bay**.

For transactions using secure payment, we only offer delivery through:  
‚úî Mondial Relay  
‚úî Colissimo  
‚úî Shop2Shop by Chronopost  
‚úî Courrier Suivi  
‚úî Relais Colis  

**How to respond to a suspicious listing**  
If a listing on the site seems suspicious or doesn‚Äôt follow posting rules:  
‚úî Do not reply.  
‚úî Do not send any payment before verifying that it‚Äôs not a scam.  
‚úî Feel free to report the listing by clicking the ‚ÄúReport abuse‚Äù button at the bottom of the listing page. This process is anonymous. The listing will then be reviewed by our team and removed if it‚Äôs found to be fraudulent or non-compliant.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I feature my ad (‚ÄúTop of the list‚Äù)?
faq_body:
**What is the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option?**  
**Subscribing to the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option**  
**Paying for the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option**

**What is the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option?**  
The ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option highlights your listing in a special placement within the search results list and/or in a separate section to the right of the results, for 7 or 30 days. This placement is marked with a ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù logo.  
The display of your listing in this area is random and depends on the number of other listings using the same option.

**Subscribing to the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option**  
You can subscribe to this option when posting, renewing, or editing your listing.  
To make your listing ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù:  
‚úî Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúListings.‚Äù  
‚úî Check the listing you want to promote and click ‚ÄúFeatured.‚Äù  
At least one photo is required on your listing to use the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option.

*Note:* This service is not available for Requests, Job Offers, Ticketing, Events, or Private Lessons categories.

**Paying for the ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù option**  
This option is payable by credit card.  
To check the price of this option (depending on the selected category):  
‚úî Log in to your account using your email and password  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúPrices‚Äù tab in our Terms and Conditions of Sale  
‚úî Select the category where you want to post your listing on **AI-Bay**

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: how to sell and ship a bundle?
faq_body:
**Steps for selling in bundles**  
**What to do if one or more items in the bundle are unavailable**  
**Delivery conditions for a bundle purchase**  
**Can I disable bundle purchases for my profile?**  
**How do bundle discounts work?**  
**How to activate bundle discounts**

**Steps for selling in bundles**  
‚úî When a buyer purchases several of your items as a bundle, you‚Äôll be notified via secure messaging.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúIs the order available?‚Äù  
‚úî You can then view the contents of the bundle and check that all items are available.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúConfirm availability.‚Äù  
‚úî The purchase is then validated, and you can proceed with shipping or hand delivery following the usual steps.  
See: *Private seller: how to send my parcel?* and *Private seller: steps for a sale with secure payment and hand delivery.*

*Note:* Bundle discounts are automatically applied when the buyer adds items to their selection (only for paid items, excluding donations). To modify this setting, see ‚ÄúHow to activate bundle discounts.‚Äù The buyer can also make an offer on bundles, with or without active discounts.

**What to do if one or more items in the bundle are unavailable**  
If one or more items in the bundle are unavailable:  
‚úî When a buyer purchases several of your items as a bundle, you‚Äôll be notified via secure messaging.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúIs the order available?‚Äù  
‚úî You can then view the bundle and check item availability.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúCancel sale,‚Äù then confirm by selecting ‚ÄúYes, cancel sale.‚Äù  
‚úî Specify the reason for canceling the buyer‚Äôs order.  
‚úî Communicate with the buyer via messaging to explain which items are unavailable (and remember to remove your listing if necessary).  

The buyer can then create a new bundle and make a new purchase.

*Note:* It‚Äôs not possible to modify a bundle. If even one item is unavailable, you must cancel the entire sale. Partial refunds are also not possible for bundles ‚Äî cancel the sale and start a new transaction instead.

**Delivery conditions for a bundle purchase**  
‚úî All items in the bundle must be packed in a single parcel that meets the chosen carrier‚Äôs shipping requirements. You‚Äôll receive one shipping label for the entire bundle.  
‚úî Items must have at least one delivery method selected to be eligible: choose a carrier among Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop, or hand delivery.  
‚úî Bundle purchases are not compatible with personalized delivery or Courrier Suivi.  
‚úî Weight and size limits depend on the carrier; please review these before shipping.  
‚úî The delivery fee applied is based on the heaviest item in the bundle. We recommend weighing your items when posting your listings.

**Can I disable bundle purchases for my profile?**  
If your listings are eligible for bundle purchases, this feature is automatically enabled. It cannot be disabled.

**How do bundle discounts work?**  
When selling in bundles, you can offer different discounts depending on the number of items selected by the buyer. This helps attract more buyers and sell faster while preparing only one parcel.  
Donations and ‚Ç¨0 items added to a bundle are not included in the discount calculation.  
There are three discount tiers based on the number of items: 2 items, 3 items, and 5 or more items. You cannot create additional tiers (e.g., a 4-item bundle).  
By default, the following discount percentages apply:  
- 2 items: 5%  
- 3 items: 10%  
- 5 or more items: 20%  

You can also set custom discount percentages for each tier: 5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30%, 40%, or 50%.  
For the 2-item and 3-item tiers, offering a discount is optional. However, you must select a discount percentage for the 5+ item tier.

**How to activate bundle discounts**  
This feature must be manually activated in your account settings:

*Via the mobile app:*  
‚úî Go to ‚ÄúMy Account.‚Äù  
‚úî Under ‚ÄúSettings,‚Äù click ‚ÄúBundle Discounts.‚Äù  
‚úî Toggle the switch next to ‚ÄúBundle Discounts‚Äù to activate.  
‚úî Select from the dropdown menu the discount to apply for each tier (2 items, 3 items, and 5+ items). You can choose not to apply a discount for the 2-item and 3-item tiers. Changes are saved automatically and will apply to your next bundle sales.  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúBundle Discounts‚Äù button again to deactivate the option.

*Via the website:*  
‚úî Go to ‚ÄúMy Account,‚Äù then click ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù  
‚úî Scroll down to the ‚ÄúDiscounts‚Äù section.  
‚úî Click the switch on the left of the ‚ÄúBundle Discounts‚Äù box to activate.  
‚úî Select from the dropdown menu the discount to apply for each tier (2 items, 3 items, and 5+ items). Changes are saved automatically and will apply to your next bundle sales.  
‚úî Click the switch again to deactivate.

*Note:*  
Bundle purchases are not available for items in the ‚ÄúWines and Gastronomy‚Äù category on **AI-Bay**.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: Where Can I Find My Transaction Number?
faq_body:
The transaction number is visible from your AI-Bay account:

Log in to your account using your email and password.  
Click on ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù from your account homepage.  
You will then see a list of your transactions (only the last 50 are displayed). Click on the one you‚Äôre interested in.  
Find your transaction number in the ‚ÄúTransaction Number‚Äù section. You can easily copy it by clicking ‚ÄúCopy to clipboard.‚Äù

Note: To help us process your requests more efficiently, please provide the transaction number whenever you contact customer service regarding a transaction made through secure payment.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: What Is the Deadline to Ship My Package?
faq_body:
When making a purchase using secure payment and delivery, as a seller you have 3 days to confirm the product‚Äôs availability.  
Once confirmed, you then have 6 days to ship the package. If you do not send it within this timeframe, the transaction will be automatically canceled.

faq_title: **Title:** How Do I Send My Rental Application to a Property Owner?
faq_body:
If you‚Äôre interested in a rental listing, you can contact the landlord by sending your tenant file as follows:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Go to the property listing that interests you.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend a message.‚Äù  

‚úî Type your message.  
‚úî You can attach your tenant file by checking the corresponding box. If you haven‚Äôt completed it yet, click ‚ÄúComplete your tenant file‚Äù first.  

‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù  
‚úî Your message will then be sent to the landlord along with your tenant file!  

Note: From your account, you can manage access to your tenant profile at any time and revoke access for a specific landlord.

Who can I send my tenant file to?  
Currently, you can only send your tenant file to professional landlords and private landlords who have completed their KYC verification. KYC (Know Your Customer) is an identity verification process that helps secure private landlord activity on the site.  
As this feature is still being rolled out, only some private landlords currently have access and can receive your documents.

faq_title: **Title:** How Do I Delete My Candidate Profile?
faq_body:
From the candidate profile page, you can delete part of the information you‚Äôve entered by going to the relevant section.  
You can also delete your entire profile:

Scroll to the bottom of your candidate profile page.  
Click the red ‚ÄúDelete my profile‚Äù button.  
Confirm the deletion.  

Once your profile is deleted, all data will be permanently lost.

Note: You can also choose to hide your profile from the resume database while keeping all your data on AI-Bay.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Protect Yourself and Respond to Credit Card Fraud
faq_body:
What is credit card fraud?  
How can you protect yourself from credit card fraud?  
My card was used by someone else ‚Äî what should I do?

Note: These recommendations are taken from the French government website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, click here.  
If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on the site 17cyber.gouv.fr.

What is credit card fraud?  
Credit card fraud refers to the unauthorized use of someone‚Äôs card details without their knowledge, even though they still physically possess their card.  
Identifying the exact source of such fraud can be difficult. Fraudsters may obtain card details through various methods: phishing messages prompting victims to share their information, hacking an online account where card details are stored (e-commerce, social networks, etc.), compromising a victim‚Äôs device (computer, phone, etc.), or exploiting a data breach from a website where the victim previously entered their card details.

How can you protect yourself from credit card fraud?  
X Never share your banking details via messaging, phone, or the Internet (unless through a certified organization).  
‚úî Keep your credit card safe.  
‚úî Regularly check your bank account.  
X Do not save your card details and remove them from sites you no longer use.  
‚úî Verify the reputation of websites before making purchases.  
‚úî Use secure payment methods.  
X Do not open suspicious messages or attachments, and never click on links they contain.  
‚úî Use strong, unique passwords for each site and app.  
‚úî Enable two-factor authentication.  
‚úî Regularly update your devices and their software or apps.  
X Avoid connecting through public computers or Wi-Fi networks.

My card was used by someone else ‚Äî what should I do?  
‚úî Immediately block your credit card.  
‚úî Contact your bank as soon as possible to request a refund for any fraudulent charges.  
‚úî Report the fraud to the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs Perceval platform.  
‚úî File a complaint with the authorities.  
‚úî Ensure none of your online accounts have been compromised, and change your passwords.  
‚úî Update your devices to fix any potential security vulnerabilities.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I keep my conversations secure through AI-Bay messaging?
faq_body:
Always use AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system when communicating with potential buyers or sellers.  
AI-Bay messaging offers the following safety advantages:  
‚úî It allows you to exchange messages without sharing personal information (phone number, email address, etc.).  
‚úî It enables secure transactions directly on the site through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system.  
‚úî If you encounter inappropriate behavior, you can block and/or report the user.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If you choose to communicate outside of AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging, AI-Bay will not be able to assist you in case of fraud attempts.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I pause my listing?
faq_body:
You can pause your listing if you are temporarily unavailable and do not wish to be contacted about one or more of your ads.  

**Pause a listing**  
To do so:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account from your computer and go to your dashboard.  
‚úî Open the ‚ÄúListings‚Äù section.  
‚úî From the list, select the active listing you want to pause and click ‚ÄúPause.‚Äù  
‚úî A confirmation message will appear.  

Your listing will no longer be visible to AI-Bay users. You will not receive contact requests or purchase offers while it is paused.  
There is no time limit for pausing a listing ‚Äî you must manually reactivate it when ready.  
You can reactivate your listing anytime by following the same steps from your dashboard.  

**Note:** You cannot edit the details of a paused listing.  

**Pause multiple listings at once**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account from your computer and go to your dashboard.  
‚úî Open the ‚ÄúListings‚Äù section.  
‚úî From the list, select up to 30 listings you wish to pause.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPause.‚Äù  
‚úî A confirmation message will appear.  

**Pausing a boosted listing or one with an ongoing transaction**  
The duration of a listing or any paid option remains unchanged, whether the listing is paused or not.  
For example, a 7-day ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù subscription remains valid for 7 calendar days, even if the listing is paused during that period.  
If a transaction is already in progress on a paused listing, it will continue, and the conversation in the messaging system will remain active.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: The steps for purchasing with secure payment and in-person handover
faq_body:
**Step 1:** Search and select a listing  
**Step 2:** Choose in-person handover  
**Step 3:** Proceed with payment  
**Step 4:** The seller confirms item availability and you arrange a meeting  
**Step 5:** Trigger payment face-to-face  

**Step 1: Search and select a listing**  
‚úî From the AI-Bay homepage, search for the item you‚Äôre interested in. If needed, check our ‚ÄúSearch and Browse Listings‚Äù section for tips.  
‚úî From the results, choose the listing you want. In-person handover with secure payment is available for all categories listed on this page.  

**Step 2: Choose in-person handover**  
Two scenarios are possible: the seller may have enabled delivery or only in-person handover. See ‚ÄúBuyer: Steps for a Secure Payment and Delivery Purchase.‚Äù  

*If the listing offers delivery*  
If the ‚ÄúDelivery available‚Äù badge appears, the seller also offers delivery.  
In this case, click ‚ÄúBuy,‚Äù then select ‚ÄúIn-person handover‚Äù from the delivery options.  

*If the listing does not offer delivery*  
If there is no ‚ÄúDelivery available‚Äù badge, in-person handover is the only option.  
‚úî From the listing, click ‚ÄúBuy.‚Äù  
‚úî A message will confirm that the exchange will take place in person.  

**Step 3: Proceed with payment**  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúStep 2/2: Pay.‚Äù  
‚úî Enter your card details.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay.‚Äù  

**Note:** Your money is not immediately transferred to the seller. You will trigger the payment through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging on the day of the meeting.  

**Step 4: The seller confirms availability and you arrange a meeting**  
After your purchase, the seller has 48 hours to confirm the item‚Äôs availability. Then, communicate to agree on a meeting time.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If the in-person handover does not occur within 30 days after the seller confirms availability, the transaction amount will automatically be released to the seller.
