Before this deadline, only the seller can cancel the transaction via your messaging or the transaction details page.  

**Step 5: Trigger payment face-to-face**  
On the day of the meeting, bring your mobile phone.  
‚úî Check that the item matches the description.  
‚úî Open AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging on your phone.  
‚úî Go to the conversation related to the transaction.  
‚úî If everything is correct, click ‚ÄúTrigger payment.‚Äù  
‚úî The seller will be notified that the transaction is complete and will hand over the item.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: If you realize the item is not as described after triggering payment, AI-Bay‚Äôs team will no longer be able to intervene (see Article 3.5 of our Terms of Use). In that case, only an amicable resolution with the seller is possible. Please be cautious and verify the item before confirming payment.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How can I sync my booking calendar?
faq_body:
You can synchronize your AI-Bay booking calendar with your Abritel or Airbnb calendar to keep your schedule up to date. This helps you better manage reservations across different platforms.  

To do this:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account and click on your profile.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúListings.‚Äù  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button for the listing you want to manage.  
‚úî Then select ‚ÄúPricing and Availability Settings.‚Äù  
‚úî You can import a calendar using an .ics link (available from Airbnb or Abritel).  
‚úî Confirm by clicking ‚ÄúImport Calendar.‚Äù  

**Note:** You can only synchronize one calendar at a time.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: Secure payment is enabled, but I don‚Äôt want to use this option ‚Äî what can I do?
faq_body:
If your vehicle is eligible for secure payment, it will automatically be activated on your listing, which will display a corresponding badge.  
Secure payment (whether through the Serenity Pack or without it) cannot be disabled on your listing. However, it remains an optional service ‚Äî you can still agree with the buyer to use another payment method.  

**Note:** Using secure payment ensures a safe transaction and protects you from potential fraud attempts. Learn more.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Follow a Seller?
faq_body:
To follow one or more sellers and receive alerts when they post new listings, here are the different methods:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî You can find the ‚ÄúFollow‚Äù button on:  
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ The listing page  
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ The user‚Äôs profile or business page  
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ The list of users who follow you  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúFollow‚Äù button.  

**Why follow a seller?**  
Following a user allows you to see all listings from the sellers you follow in the ‚ÄúMy Favorites‚Äù tab. You can also receive an email and a notification whenever a member you follow posts a new listing.  

**How to find the people I follow and those who follow me?**  
To see the people you follow:  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù and then ‚ÄúListings from my followed sellers.‚Äù  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúView my followed sellers.‚Äù  
OR  
‚úî On your profile, click on ‚ÄúYou follow X members.‚Äù  

You can unfollow a seller at any time by clicking ‚ÄúFollowing‚Äù on their profile page.  

To see the people who follow you:  
‚úî On your profile, click on ‚ÄúFollowed by X members.‚Äù  
You‚Äôll have access to the list of members who follow you, and you can remove a user from this list or follow them back.  

**Find a seller‚Äôs listings using the search bar**  
You can also find a seller‚Äôs listings by typing their username followed by a question mark ‚Äú?‚Äù in the search bar.

faq_title: **Title:** Traveler: How Do I Book My Vacation?
faq_body:
**Searching for a vacation rental**  
On AI-Bay, you can search for your next vacation destination as follows:  

1. Select the ‚ÄúVacations‚Äù category.  
2. Enter your destination.  
3. Choose your travel dates and other criteria such as number of guests, price, and whether pets are allowed.  
4. Click ‚ÄúSearch.‚Äù  

You‚Äôll find two types of listings:  
- With online booking enabled  
- With online booking disabled (no ‚ÄúOnline Payment‚Äù badge displayed)  

*Note: Not all vacation rental listings are available for online booking. For more information, click here.*  

**If the host has enabled online booking:**  
Simply click on ‚ÄúProceed to Payment.‚Äù  

The listing is posted by a private individual on AI-Bay.  
As part of AI-Bay‚Äôs booking service, you can make your payment by providing your first and last name and your phone number.  

The payment amount includes:  
- The rental price: as set by the host.  
- Service fees: covering platform operation and included insurance (click here for details).  
- Tourist tax: collected on behalf of the host (click here for details).  

You‚Äôll first pay the deposit set by the host, and the remaining balance will be paid on-site.  

**If the listing is posted by Locasun (an AI-Bay brand):**  
1. Select your travel dates.  
2. Enter the booking holder‚Äôs details.  
3. Add the number and details of all participants.  
4. Confirm your booking by paying with a credit card.  

A booking confirmation email (including the rental contract) will be sent to you. Thirty-five days before departure, the remaining balance will be charged to your card, and you‚Äôll receive your check-in voucher by email. This voucher includes all necessary information such as the address and contact number of the person on-site.  

For Locasun vacation rentals, you can also pay with holiday vouchers. To do so, pay by card to secure your booking, then send your vouchers to:  
**AI-Bay - Booking Service  
40 rue de la station  
95130 FRANCONVILLE**  
Once your vouchers are received, your card will be refunded for the corresponding amount.  

For more information, please contact Locasun customer service.  

**Waiting for host confirmation**  
For AI-Bay‚Äôs online booking service, the host has 72 hours to accept or decline your booking request. Once confirmed, you‚Äôll receive a confirmation email.  
If the host hasn‚Äôt enabled online booking, please contact them directly.  

*Note: No payment is charged before the host confirms the booking.*  

You can always contact the host by phone or through AI-Bay‚Äôs messaging system to ask any questions.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: How Is Payment for Used Vehicles Kept Secure?
faq_body:
**Important:** We notify you at every stage of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, accompanied by an email ending in **@ai-bay.fr** or **@messagerie.ai-bay.fr**. If you have any doubts, do not take any action and contact our customer service.  

**As a buyer**  
- The identity of your seller is verified by our payment provider.  
- You only release the funds to the seller at the very end, during the in-person handover of the vehicle, after verifying the vehicle and receiving all necessary documents.  

**As a seller**  
- Before your meeting, you can confirm that the buyer has sufficient funds for the purchase.  
- You receive your payment securely before handing over the keys to your vehicle.  

For more details: *How to make a secure vehicle payment on AI-Bay?*  

**Information via secure messaging**  
We notify you at every step of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system. Only these notifications are valid.  
If you receive an email asking you to take action or confirming an action, always check that you‚Äôve received the corresponding notification in your AI-Bay secure messages.  
If in doubt, do not take any action and contact our customer service.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How Can I Track My Package?
faq_body:
**For deliveries via Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or Relais Colis**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Go to the ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù tab.  
‚úî Select the transaction you‚Äôre interested in. The transaction details will appear.  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúTrack Package‚Äù button.  

**For other delivery methods**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Go to the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab.  
‚úî Select the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî If the seller entered the tracking number when confirming shipment, an automatic message will appear ‚Äî click ‚ÄúTrack Package.‚Äù  
‚úî If no message appears, ask the seller for tracking details via secure messaging and enter them on the carrier‚Äôs website:  

- Lettre, Colissimo, or Chronopost  
- UPS  
- TNT

faq_title: **Title:** What Do the Deposit and Remaining Balance Mean in a Vacation Rental Booking?
faq_body:
**Deposit**  
A deposit refers to a portion of the total cost of the stay.  
With the booking service, the deposit is paid online by the traveler to secure their vacation rental on AI-Bay.  

The deposit amount is set by the host when posting their listing. It can range from 30% to 100% of the total booking amount, depending on the host‚Äôs rental conditions.  
The traveler pays the deposit at the time of booking.  

*Note:* The deposit is transferred to the host‚Äôs wallet 48 hours after the traveler‚Äôs arrival at the rental property, or in case of a traveler‚Äôs cancellation within the month preceding the stay, according to the cancellation policy.  

**Remaining balance**  
The remaining balance is the amount not paid online by the traveler during the booking request. It equals the total booking amount minus the deposit already paid online.  

The balance can be paid using any payment method accepted by the host.  
The traveler must pay the remaining balance upon arrival at the rental property, in exchange for access to the accommodation.  

*Note:* If your stay is managed by Locasun (a brand of the AI-Bay group), please refer to the information available by clicking here.

faq_title: **Title:** My account seems to have been hacked ‚Äî what should I do?
faq_body:
**How to Know if My Account Has Been Hacked?**  
**Steps to Follow Depending on Your Situation**  
**What to Do After a Hacking Incident**  
**How to Prevent Future Account Hacks**

*Note:* For more information, please visit the government website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on 17cyber.gouv.fr.

---

### How to Know if My Account Has Been Hacked
Your account may have been compromised if:  
‚úî You received a password change/reset email that you did not request.  
‚úî You received a recent login notification from an unusual location.  
‚úî You can no longer log in with your usual credentials.  
‚úî You notice listings or transactions on your account that you did not create.

---

### Steps to Follow Depending on Your Situation

**Important:** Remember to change the password of your email account. In most hacking cases, the email account is the first to be compromised, which can then lead to your AI-Bay account being hacked as well.

---

#### I Still Have Access to My Hacked Account
If you still have access to your AI-Bay account but suspect it has been hacked, change your password immediately and secure your account.

To do this:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Go to the *Login and Security* section, then to *Password*.  
‚úî Enter a new password along with your current one, and check the box to log out of all other devices.  
‚úî Click *Change My Password* to confirm.  

You will receive a confirmation email once your password has been updated.

**Important:** Next, follow the steps in the *Two-Step Verification* section to strengthen your account security. Each time you log in, a verification code will be sent to you by email or SMS to confirm your identity and protect against hacking attempts.

---

#### I No Longer Have Access to My Hacked Account
If you can no longer log in because your account has been hacked, our support team is here to help.  
Please contact us by clicking *Submit a Request* at the bottom of this page.  

You can then ask our customer service to either:  
‚úî Restore access to your account  
‚úî Delete your hacked account so you can create a new one  

---

### Steps to Restore Access to My Account
If your account was temporarily blocked as a precaution due to suspected fraudulent activity, you can unblock it yourself:  
‚úî Go to the AI-Bay website or app and try to log in. A message will appear: ‚ÄúYour account has been temporarily blocked.‚Äù  
‚úî Click *Unblock My Account*.  
‚úî Click *Start Verification*.  
‚úî Enter the code sent to your email address or phone number.

---

### What to Do After a Hacking Incident
**Change your email password**  
To stay safe, change your email password and choose a strong one.

**Remove automatic email forwarding**  
If someone gained access to your email, they may have set up automatic forwarding to another address.  
To prevent this, delete all automatic forwarding rules.  
Instructions are available for:  
- Gmail  
- Microsoft  
- Orange  

**Check that you don‚Äôt reuse the same password elsewhere**  
If your AI-Bay password is used on other sites, change it immediately. A hacker with your password could try to access your other accounts.

---

### How to Prevent Future Account Hacks
‚úî Use a unique, complex password with at least 8 characters, including a number, a letter, and a special character.  
‚úî Enable two-factor authentication.  
‚úî Use different passwords for each website.  
‚úî Regularly install security updates.  
‚úò Never share sensitive information via chat, phone, or email.  
‚úò Do not open suspicious messages or attachments, and never click on unknown links.  
‚úò Avoid logging in from public Wi-Fi networks.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I subscribe to multiple options at the same time for the same listing?
faq_body:
You can subscribe to multiple options at once while your listing is active.

### To subscribe to several options:
‚úî Log in to your personal AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on *Listings*.  
‚úî Select the listing and click *Sell Faster* or *Manage My Bookings* (for listings in the *Vacation* category).  
‚úî Choose the options you want to activate.

*Note:* Only options that are not already active for your listing will appear on the management page.

---

### Payment for Options
These options can be paid for by credit card.  

To check the pricing of options based on the selected listing category:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on the *Pricing* tab in our Terms and Conditions of Sale.  
‚úî Select the category in which you want to post your listing.

faq_title: **Title:** How should I respond to cyberbullying on AI-Bay?
faq_body:
If you‚Äôre reading this article, you may have had a negative experience on our platform. This page gathers resources to help you stay safe and protect yourself from such behavior.

---

### What Is Cyberbullying or Online Harassment?
Cyberbullying refers to repeated malicious actions online, whether public or private, such as intimidation, insults, threats, rumors, or sharing compromising content.  
The consequences can be severe for victims, both mentally and physically, especially among young people. It is a criminal offense punishable by law.  

AI-Bay does not tolerate harassment, discrimination, or hate speech of any kind on its platform.

---

### How to Protect Yourself from Cyberbullying
**Check your privacy settings**  
Your personal data is protected on AI-Bay and not shared with other users. You can choose to display your phone number in your listings. To further protect your account, we recommend enabling two-step verification.

**Be cautious when sharing personal or sensitive information**  
AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system allows you to communicate and complete transactions without sharing personal data. If you choose to meet in person, be careful about what information you share.

**Verify the accuracy of information you receive**  
Some messages may contain false or misleading information. Malicious individuals may impersonate AI-Bay or other institutions to steal your data or money.

---

### What to Do If You Are a Victim of Online Harassment
If you experience harassment on our platform, we‚Äôre here to help. Your safety while buying and selling on AI-Bay is our top priority.

Here‚Äôs what to do:  
‚úò Do not respond to harassing messages or comments ‚Äî engaging may worsen the situation.  
‚úî Keep evidence of inappropriate exchanges. Take screenshots and save any information about the harasser in case you need to file a complaint.  
‚úî Report and block the harasser directly through the secure messaging system. Click *More* or the three dots next to the user‚Äôs name, then select *Report this user* and *Block this user*.  

Our moderation team will be notified and will take appropriate action.

**Important:** If you or someone you know is in danger, contact local authorities immediately.  
You can also call **3018**, available 7 days a week from 9 a.m. to 11 p.m. (free and confidential). This national helpline offers support and advice for anyone facing cyberbullying or digital abuse.  
For more information, consult the government‚Äôs cyberbullying information page.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How does bulk purchasing work?
faq_body:
*Note:* Discounts on bundles are available only if the seller has enabled this feature.

---

### Steps to Buy a Bundle
Buying in bundles is only available for listings from the same seller.

To purchase a bundle:  
‚úî Go to a listing or the seller‚Äôs page.  
‚úî Click *Create a Bundle* from the listing or seller page.  
‚úî Select the items you want to buy by clicking *Add*.  
‚úî If the seller has enabled the option, you‚Äôll automatically receive a discount based on the number of items added. Donations and free items (‚Ç¨0) are not included in the discount calculation.  
‚úî Once your bundle is ready, click *Buy the Bundle*.  
‚úî Choose your delivery method (Mondial Relay, Colissimo, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or in-person pickup).  
‚úî Select your payment method ‚Äî via wallet or credit card. Payment in 3 or 4 installments is available for bundles over ‚Ç¨150.  
‚úî Complete the payment. A confirmation message will appear.  
‚úî The seller will be notified that you wish to buy multiple items as a bundle. They can confirm availability or cancel the purchase.  
‚úî If all items are available, your purchase is confirmed and follows the usual transaction process.

See also:  
- *Buyer: Steps for a Secure Payment and Delivery*  
- *Buyer: Steps for a Secure Payment and In-Person Pickup*

---

### Making an Offer on a Bundle
You can negotiate the price of a bundle by clicking *Make an Offer* while creating it.  
You may make an offer even if an automatic discount is already applied. Your offer must be at least 60% of the bundle‚Äôs total price (with or without discount).  
The seller can accept or reject your offer, and you can continue discussing via messaging to agree on a final price before payment.

---

### Delivery Fees for Bundles
Delivery fees are determined by the carrier‚Äôs pricing tier based on the total weight of the items.

---

### If One or More Items Are Unavailable
If one or more items in the bundle are unavailable, the seller must cancel the purchase. You can then message the seller to check which items are still available and create a new bundle.

---

### Will I Receive One or Multiple Packages?
All items in the bundle will be shipped together in a single package.

---

### What If the Bundle Received Doesn‚Äôt Match Expectations?
See *Buyer: What to Do If the Product (or Bundle) Received Doesn‚Äôt Match the Listing?*

---

### How Are Bundle Discounts Applied?
The seller must enable the bundle discount feature. It applies to the total price of the items according to the following default tiers:  
- 2 items: 5% discount  
- 3 items: 10% discount  
- 5 items: 20% discount  

Sellers can adjust the discount percentage for each tier (2, 3, or 5 items) between 5% and 50%.  
Discounts may therefore vary depending on the seller and the number of items selected.  
You can also make an offer on a bundle that already includes automatic discounts.

---

### How to Cancel My Bundle Order
**If the seller hasn‚Äôt confirmed availability:**  
You can cancel your purchase from the transaction details page in your AI-Bay account.

**If the seller has already confirmed availability:**  
You must contact the seller directly to request cancellation.

In both cases, cancellation will automatically trigger a refund.

*Note:* Bundle purchases are not available for items in the *Wine and Gastronomy* category.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How can I request a security deposit from a traveler?
faq_body:
As a host, you can request a security deposit from the traveler in addition to the booking price.

To do this:  
‚úî Specify the amount of the requested deposit in your listing description, along with the preferred payment method. The deposit is separate from the booking amount and is not managed by AI-Bay.  
‚úî Communicate with the traveler about how the deposit will be paid and refunded. We recommend requesting the deposit only upon the traveler‚Äôs arrival at the property.

faq_title: **Title:** What supporting documents can I add to my rental application?
faq_body:
To provide more information to landlords, you can add supporting documents to your tenant file.  
Here is the list of accepted documents. To upload them, first combine the selected files into a single PDF (maximum size: 50 MB):

**Proof of identity (valid and current) ‚Äî one of the following:**
- French or foreign ID card (with photo, front and back)  
- French or foreign passport (with photo)  
- French or foreign driver‚Äôs license (with photo)  
- Temporary residence permit  
- Resident card  
- EU or EEA member state ID card  

**Proof of address ‚Äî one of the following:**
- Last 3 rent receipts or a certificate from the previous landlord (or their representative) confirming that rent and charges are up to date  
- A sworn statement from the host confirming that the applicant resides at their address  
- Certificate of domicile election  
- Most recent property tax notice or, if applicable, proof of ownership of the main residence  

**Proof of employment or professional status:**
- Employment or internship contract  
- Student card or current year‚Äôs enrollment certificate  
- Copy of professional license (for self-employed professionals)  
- Copy of Insee identification certificate showing registration numbers (for freelancers)  
- Original D1 extract from the trade register (less than 3 months old, for artisans)  
- K or K-bis extract from the commercial register (less than 3 months old, for businesses)  
- Any recent document proving professional activity (for other cases)  

**Proof of income:**
- Last 3 payslips  
- Proof of internship allowance payments  
- Last 2 financial statements or a certificate of income for the current year issued by an accountant (for self-employed individuals)  
- Proof of payment of allowances, pensions, social or family benefits, or proof of entitlement issued by the paying organization (for the last 3 months)  
- Property ownership title or most recent property tax notice  
- Scholarship award notice (for scholarship students)  
- Proof of rental income, annuities, or investment income  
- Housing aid simulation certificate issued by Caf, MSA, or the tenant  
- Most recent or previous tax notice (or non-taxation notice)  

**Proof of guarantor:**
- Documents from the guarantor(s) equivalent to those required from the tenant.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: I don‚Äôt have time to pick up my parcel ‚Äî what should I do?
faq_body:
If you cannot collect your parcel yourself within the timeframe set by the carrier, you can authorize someone else to pick it up for you. Here are the conditions depending on the carrier.

**Colissimo or tracked mail**

*For occasional use*  
Would you like someone to collect a parcel or letter for you from a pickup point?  
‚úî Refer to the back of the delivery notice left in your mailbox or the email notifying you of the parcel‚Äôs availability, and fill in the designated section.  
‚úî Give this document to the authorized person along with your ID. They must also present their own ID to collect the item.  

*For regular use*  
‚úî Postal services allow you to set up a permanent authorization valid for up to 5 years. For more information, visit the La Poste website.  

**Mondial Relay**  
‚úî If you want someone else to collect your parcel, they must go to the pickup point with their original ID (no photocopies accepted) and your ID. No written authorization is required.  

**Shop2Shop by Chronopost**  
‚úî If you cannot collect the parcel yourself, you can authorize someone of your choice to do so on your behalf. They must present your ID and a written authorization to collect the parcel.  

The parcel is kept at the pickup point for a minimum of 7 calendar days and up to 14 days depending on the service chosen (you will be informed of the exact period by email from your carrier). After this period, it will be returned to the seller.  

**Note:** If the parcel has not yet been shipped, the seller can still cancel the transaction.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: Steps for purchasing a used vehicle with secure payment
faq_body:
**Step 1:** Choose a vehicle eligible for secure payment  
**Step 2:** Check the vehicle‚Äôs availability  
**Step 3:** Select the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty that suits you (only for listings eligible for the Serenity Pack)  
**Step 4:** Confirm your purchase details  
**Step 5:** Enter your personal information  
**Step 6:** Deposit your funds into your secure AI-Bay account  
**Step 7:** Inspect the vehicle in person and confirm the transfer of funds  

---

**Step 1: Choose a vehicle eligible for secure payment**  
From the list of online listings, select the used vehicle that suits you. When a listing is eligible for secure payment, the ‚ÄúSerenity Pack‚Äù or ‚ÄúSecure Payment‚Äù badge will appear.  

**Step 2: Check the vehicle‚Äôs availability**  
To start the purchase process via secure payment:  
‚úî From the listing or chat, click ‚ÄúReserve.‚Äù  
‚úî You‚Äôll be redirected to a page explaining how secure payment works, or to the Serenity Pack details page if applicable. At the bottom, click ‚ÄúReserve my vehicle.‚Äù  
‚úî A message will be sent to the seller asking them to confirm the vehicle‚Äôs availability.  

*Note:* Feel free to contact the seller beforehand through the secure chat to ask for additional information.  

**Step 3: Choose the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty (for Serenity Pack listings only)**  
Once the seller confirms availability, you can select your warranty duration:  
‚úî From the chat, click ‚ÄúChoose my warranty.‚Äù  
‚úî A page will explain the Mechanical Breakdown Warranty and let you choose the duration (3, 6, or 12 months).  

*Note:* If you don‚Äôt want the warranty, click ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to insure my car.‚Äù In that case, a ‚Ç¨19.99 service fee applies.  

**Step 4: Confirm your purchase details**  
A summary of your purchase will appear. Review the information and click ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù  

*Note:* If you left the process after selecting your warranty, you can resume it from your chat by clicking ‚ÄúDeposit my funds,‚Äù which will take you back to the summary page.  

**Step 5: Enter your personal information**  
To finalize your purchase request and create your secure AI-Bay account, you‚Äôll need to provide your first and last name.  

*Note:* If your name is already saved in your AI-Bay profile, this step will be skipped, and your secure account will be created automatically.  

**Step 6: Deposit your funds into your secure AI-Bay account**  
Once your purchase is confirmed, you can deposit the funds into your secure AI-Bay account:  
‚úî You can access your secure account‚Äôs bank details (RIB) right after confirming your purchase or later via the chat by clicking ‚ÄúDeposit my funds.‚Äù  
‚úî Log in to your bank account and add this RIB as a beneficiary.  
‚úî Make the transfer for the vehicle‚Äôs amount.  
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a notification once your transfer has arrived in your secure AI-Bay account (usually within 1‚Äì3 business days).  

The AI-Bay RIB acts as an intermediary between you and the seller. You can cancel at any time and have your funds returned to your bank account. If you negotiate a new price, you can also recover the remaining balance after payment and transfer it back to your account.  

**Warning:** If you receive a RIB by email or SMS, it‚Äôs a fraud attempt. AI-Bay will never send you this information by email‚Äîit‚Äôs only accessible via a button in your chat.  

**Step 7: Inspect the vehicle in person and confirm the transfer of funds**  
Arrange a meeting with the seller and carefully inspect the vehicle. Once you‚Äôre satisfied, confirm the transfer of funds to the seller:  
‚úî Go to your chat with the seller in the secure messaging system.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay.‚Äù  
‚úî A payment summary will appear. Check the amount and click ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù You can manually adjust the amount if you negotiated a new price. Any remaining funds can be returned to your bank account afterward.  
‚úî By clicking ‚ÄúConfirm,‚Äù the funds are transferred to the seller.  

**Warning:** This action is irreversible. Once the funds are transferred, they cannot be recovered.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: Where can I find a summary of my sales?
faq_body:
To view information about your recent sales:

1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Go to ‚ÄúTransactions.‚Äù  
3. Select the ‚ÄúSales‚Äù tab.  

You‚Äôll then see a list of your 50 most recent transactions completed through secure payment (either by delivery or in-person exchange). You can also find the transaction number associated with each sale.

faq_title: **Title:** How to protect yourself and respond to fake bank transfer orders (FOVI)
faq_body:
**What is a fake bank transfer order scam?**  
**How can you protect yourself from fake transfer orders?**  
**What should you do if you‚Äôre a victim of fraudulent transfers?**  

*Note:* These recommendations are based on information from the French government‚Äôs cybermalveillance.gouv.fr website. For more details, click here.  
If you believe you‚Äôre a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult official recommendations on 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

---

**What is a fake bank transfer order scam?**  
A fake transfer order scam (FOVI) is a type of fraud where the victim is manipulated‚Äîthrough persuasion, threats, or pressure‚Äîinto making an unplanned transfer of funds.  
Sometimes presented as an ‚Äúurgent and confidential‚Äù request from a company executive, it‚Äôs also known as a ‚ÄúCEO fraud.‚Äù  

Variants include:  
- Impersonating a supplier to provide new bank details (a fake RIB) for payment.  
- Impersonating an employee to request a change in the bank account where their salary is paid.  

The fraudster‚Äôs bank account is often located abroad. These scams are typically carried out via phone calls and/or emails and can target any type of organization.  

---

**How to protect yourself from fake transfer orders:**  
- Use strong, unique passwords for each website and app.  
- Enable two-factor authentication.  
- Limit the publication of information that could identify or contact people authorized to make transfers.  
- Educate staff who may handle transfer requests about phishing risks.  
- Always verify the authenticity of organizations providing bank details for payments.  

---

**If you‚Äôre a victim of fraudulent transfers:**  
‚úî Identify the fraudulent transactions.  
‚úî Immediately alert your bank and request a recall of the funds.  
‚úî Ask for the transfer to be suspended.  
‚úî Keep all evidence.  
‚úî If the fraud involved a hacked email account, change its password immediately.  
‚úî File a police report.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I show or hide my phone number?
faq_body:
If you want to show or hide your phone number on your listing, follow this very simple procedure:

1. Log in to your account.  
2. Create a new listing or edit an existing one.  
3. Use the dedicated button to enable or disable the ‚ÄúHide number‚Äù option.  

If the toggle appears orange, your number will be hidden from all users viewing your listing.

**Note:** To ensure safe interactions and avoid unpleasant surprises, it‚Äôs no longer possible to display your phone number on listings in the following consumer goods categories: Fashion, Home & Garden, Family, Electronics, and Leisure. However, you can still share it through the secure messaging system if you trust the person you‚Äôre communicating with.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: Why and how should I verify my identity?
faq_body:
Identity verification is required to transfer your funds to your bank account.

**When can I verify my identity?**  
**Steps to follow**  
**Which document is suitable for identity verification?**

### When can I verify my identity?
You can verify your identity as soon as the buyer‚Äôs funds have arrived in your AI-Bay account. This is a security measure designed to protect our community.

### Steps to follow
Here‚Äôs how to verify your identity:

1. Log in to your AI-Bay account and click on ‚ÄúHome.‚Äù  
2. Click the ‚ÄúVerify my identity‚Äù button located in the banner at the top of your page.  
3. Fill in your identity details:  
   - Postal address  
   - Select the type of document you‚Äôll provide for verification: both sides of your ID card or your passport.  
   - Click ‚ÄúAdd my ID document‚Äù and upload a photo of your ID.  
   - Enter the IBAN where you want your funds to be transferred (if not already done).  
4. Click ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù

**Note:** Identity verification usually takes about 24 business hours.

### Which document is suitable for identity verification?
Accepted identity documents are:

- National ID card  
- Passport  

To ensure your document is processed correctly by our payment partner, please make sure your photo meets the following requirements:

- The document must be valid and in the same name you used on the service (ID cards issued after January 2, 2004, are valid for 15 years unless issued to a minor).  
- The photo must be clear, without glare or blur.  
- All four corners of the document must be visible.  
- For ID cards, send both front and back sides.

You‚Äôll receive a message once your identity has been successfully verified.

**Note:** If your name was misspelled, you can correct it during the identity verification process.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How can I get the shipping label?
faq_body:
**Find your shipping label via your email**  
**Find your shipping label via your AI-Bay account**  
**I can‚Äôt find my shipping label ‚Äî what should I do?**  
**I don‚Äôt have a printer ‚Äî what should I do?**

Once the buyer has made the payment and you‚Äôve confirmed the item‚Äôs availability, you have 72 hours to drop off your package. After that, the transaction will be canceled. To do this, you‚Äôll need the shipping label to attach to your parcel.

### Download the shipping label via secure messaging
1. Confirm the item‚Äôs availability.  
2. A pop-up window will appear saying ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs time to prepare your item!‚Äù  
3. Click ‚ÄúGet my shipping label.‚Äù  
4. The download will start automatically.

### Download the shipping label via your email
1. Go to the email inbox linked to your AI-Bay account.  
2. You should have received an email titled ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt wait to send your item [Listing Title].‚Äù Check your spam or junk folder if you can‚Äôt find it.  
3. Click ‚ÄúDownload the shipping label.‚Äù

### Find the shipping label via your AI-Bay account
**From the website:**
1. Log in and click your username at the top right to access your account homepage.  
2. Click ‚ÄúTransactions.‚Äù  
3. Go to the ‚ÄúSales‚Äù tab and select the sale you want to ship.  
4. In the ‚ÄúDelivery‚Äù section, click ‚ÄúDownload the shipping label.‚Äù

**From the mobile app:**
1. Tap ‚ÄúMy Account,‚Äù then ‚ÄúTransactions.‚Äù  
2. Go to the ‚ÄúSales‚Äù tab and select the sale you want to ship.  
3. In the ‚ÄúDelivery‚Äù section, tap ‚ÄúDownload the shipping label.‚Äù

### I can‚Äôt find my shipping label ‚Äî what should I do?
If the buyer‚Äôs or seller‚Äôs address is incomplete, incorrect, or not recognized by La Poste, the shipping label won‚Äôt be available. The following issues can prevent label generation:

- Special characters, including accents or umlauts  
- Apartment or building numbers  
- Residence names  

If this happens, we recommend canceling the transaction and asking the buyer to start again.

**Note:** To check if an address is recognized by La Poste, use the verification tool available on their website.

### I don‚Äôt have a printer ‚Äî what should I do?
The carrier Mondial Relay allows you to print your shipping label directly at a pickup point. Simply present the QR code you received by email at a participating location. The email containing the QR code is sent about 30 minutes after the purchase is confirmed.

To find pickup points offering in-store printing:

1. Visit the link to find your Mondial Relay pickup point.  
2. Enter the destination postal code.  
3. Select a location marked ‚ÄúPrinting available at pickup point.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** Which categories are eligible for secure payment and delivery?
faq_body:
**Note:** Secure payment is also available for selling used vehicles. For more details, check the ‚ÄúVehicles‚Äù section.

Secure payment is available for both private individuals and professionals who want to post a listing and sell in any category with delivery options via Colissimo and Courrier Suivi, in-person handover, or Click & Collect.  
For carriers such as Mondial Relay, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, and Relais Colis, secure payment is available in all categories except Antiques.

**Note:** By using secure payment, you benefit from AI-Bay‚Äôs protection ‚Äî your money remains safe until the transaction is completed, and a dedicated support team is available in case of any issues.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: Can I use my credits to pay with secure payment?
faq_body:
AI-Bay credits cannot be used for secure payment. The only accepted payment methods are detailed in this article.

**Note:** For more information on how to buy and use AI-Bay credits, please refer to our article ‚ÄúHow to purchase and spend AI-Bay credits.‚Äù

faq_title: **Traveler: Can a host refuse a booking request?**
faq_body:
As soon as a traveler sends a booking request, the host has 72 hours to accept or decline it. After this period, the booking request will be automatically rejected.  
To check the status of your booking, click on **Vacation Booking** and view the different statuses (upcoming, completed, or canceled).  

**Note:** If your stay is managed by Locasun (a brand of the AI-Bay group), our advisors will forward your request to the residence to confirm the accommodation‚Äôs availability. If the accommodation is unavailable, our advisors will contact you to suggest an alternative.

faq_title: **How to reply to a message?**
faq_body:
To reply to a message and view all your conversations with individuals and professionals across all your devices:  
‚úî Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on **Messages**.  
‚úî Select the conversation you wish to continue.  

You‚Äôll receive a copy of your exchanges by email and a notification on your mobile device.  
If a message remains unanswered, you‚Äôll receive a reminder within the conversation and a notification. This feature cannot be disabled.  
AI-Bay messaging also allows you to send and receive attachments.  

**Note:** For professionals, messaging is available only for listings in the following categories: leisure, fashion, home, services, professional equipment, vacations, and multimedia.

faq_title: **How to identify a fraudulent message pretending to be from AI-Bay?**
faq_body:
**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website [17cyber.gouv.fr](https://www.17cyber.gouv.fr).  

---

### Main signs of a fraud attempt via a fake AI-Bay message

- Request for personal information  
- Phone call claiming to be from AI-Bay services  
- Request to contact a premium-rate number  
- Offer of a discounted option  
- Request to participate in a survey  
- Request for card payment outside the AI-Bay platform  
- Suggestion to use payment methods outside AI-Bay such as Paylib, Western Union, Transa Cash, QR code, or bank transfer  

---

### Other details to watch for  
**What to do if you receive a fraudulent message?**

If you‚Äôve received a message claiming to be from AI-Bay and you‚Äôre unsure of its authenticity, here are some tips to identify fraud attempts.  

**Note:** See the page *How to spot suspicious behavior* for more information.  

---

### Main signs of a fraud attempt via a fake AI-Bay message

If the message or email you received matches any of the following, it‚Äôs very likely a scam:  

**Request for personal information**  
AI-Bay will never ask for your personal data by email, phone, or SMS (login, password, bank details, etc.). If you receive an email claiming your account is suspended or requesting personal information for security or posting reasons, be cautious ‚Äî it‚Äôs a phishing attempt.  

**Phone call from AI-Bay services**  
If someone calls pretending to be from AI-Bay to process a payment, it‚Äôs a scam. AI-Bay customer service will never ask for your banking details or payment over the phone. Do not respond ‚Äî block and report the number.  

**Request to contact a premium-rate number**  
AI-Bay will never ask you to call a premium-rate number to reach a seller. If you receive a message asking you to do so (for example, to listen to a voicemail about your listing), ignore it ‚Äî it‚Äôs a scam.  

**Offer of a discounted option**  
Be cautious if you receive a message offering a special deal on an option pack.  

**Request to participate in a survey**  
If you‚Äôre invited to take part in a survey with a promised gift, stay alert ‚Äî these are not conducted by our teams.  

**Request for card payment outside the AI-Bay platform**  
No action on AI-Bay requires card payment outside the platform.  

**Suggestion to use payment methods outside AI-Bay**  
No action on AI-Bay requires payment through external services like Paylib, Western Union, Transa Cash, QR code, or bank transfer.  

---

### Additional details to check
Signs that a message is not from AI-Bay:  
‚úò Spelling or grammar mistakes  
‚úò An email address different from @ai-bay.fr, @news.ai-bay.fr, or @messaging.ai-bay.fr  
‚úò A link redirecting to a site without a security icon in your browser‚Äôs address bar  

Conversely, reliable indicators include:  
‚úî The presence of the AI-Bay logo in the email preview  

---

### What to do if you receive a fraudulent message?
If you think you‚Äôve received a fake AI-Bay message:  
‚úò Do not send any information or reply.  
‚úî Contact our team and provide:  
- The sender‚Äôs email address  
- The potential fraudulent website linked in the message

faq_title: **How to save a search?**
faq_body:
A saved search allows you to record your search criteria, view listings that match them, and receive alerts by email and/or notification if you wish.  
By logging into your account, you can access all your saved searches across all your devices. You can save up to 50 searches from your account.  

To save a search on the AI-Bay website:  
‚úî Log in to your account.  
‚úî Enter the category of the item, service, or job you‚Äôre looking for, along with the relevant filters. Add one or more keywords and select the desired location(s).  
‚úî Run the search.  
‚úî Click **Save Search** on the floating button at the bottom of your screen.  

Once saved, you can find your search in the **My Searches** tab. You can modify or delete it anytime from this section.  

**Get notified of new listings**  
If you want to be alerted when new listings matching your search are published, you can enable:  
- App notifications  
- Email notifications

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: Best practices for purchasing a used vehicle**
faq_body:
**Note:** Find all government advice for safely buying a used vehicle on this page.  

---

### Searching for a used vehicle
**Set your budget**  
Make sure you know the market value of the vehicle you‚Äôre interested in.  

AI-Bay helps you with the ‚ÄúRight Price by L‚ÄôArgus‚Äù estimate range displayed on each private seller‚Äôs vehicle listing. The ‚ÄúArgus Value‚Äù is based on the new vehicle catalog price and provides an average market value for a mid-year registered vehicle with standard mileage.  

Check the vehicle‚Äôs history by requesting technical inspection reports, maintenance records, and repair invoices.  

AI-Bay provides Autoviza history reports directly in the vehicle listing through its partner NGC DATA. If unavailable, you can request it from the seller by clicking **Request History Report**.  

Take your time when choosing a used vehicle ‚Äî such a significant purchase requires careful research and consideration.  

---

### Test-driving and inspecting a used vehicle before purchase
A test drive is essential ‚Äî never buy a vehicle without driving it first.  
Inspect the vehicle in daylight, when it‚Äôs dry, and from all possible angles.  
Ideally, the first start should be done when the engine is cold.  
Ask the seller plenty of questions: How was the vehicle used? Why are you selling it? Has it ever been in an accident or repaired?  

Find the full checklist of things to verify during a test drive on the AI-Bay used vehicle buyer‚Äôs checklist.  

---

### Things to check at the time of sale
Verify the seller‚Äôs identity by asking for an ID or passport.  
The following documents must be provided to the buyer at the time of sale:  
- The certificate of transfer  
- The maintenance logbook and invoices  
- The registration certificate  
- The administrative status certificate  
- The technical inspection report  

Choose the payment method that suits you best: check, bank check, cash, or AI-Bay secure payment.  

Find more details in the article *How does secure payment work for used vehicles?*  

You can negotiate the price ‚Äî this is possible with AI-Bay secure payment.  
To protect your vehicle, you can subscribe to the mechanical breakdown warranty, available as part of the Serenity Pack with secure payment. More information is available on this page.  

Don‚Äôt forget to insure your vehicle appropriately ‚Äî all motor vehicles (even those not in use) must at least have third-party liability insurance.  

---

### Vehicle registration
The buyer has one month to register the vehicle in their name. Within 15 days of the sale, the seller must declare the transfer. The buyer must have the transfer code (provided by the seller) to register the vehicle.  

**Note:** Find all information about vehicle registration on the official ANTS government website.

faq_title: **Title:** Safety Tips for Families
faq_body:
Note: For more information, please refer to the complete guide for families available on cybermalveillance.gouv.fr.

Note: If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on 17cyber.gouv.fr.

**Preventive Measures for Parents**

1. **Protect your accounts with strong passwords**  
To reduce risks and prevent hacking of your various online accounts, we recommend using long, complex, and unique passwords for each of your devices and services. If you have any doubts‚Äîor simply as a precaution‚Äîdon‚Äôt hesitate to change them and enable two-factor authentication whenever possible to strengthen your security.  
Finally, use a password manager to store them safely.

2. **Keep all your devices updated**  
Accept security updates on all your devices (computers, tablets, mobile phones, connected objects, etc.) as soon as they are available to fix vulnerabilities and protect yourself.  
We also recommend regularly checking in your device and software settings that updates are properly applied, and enabling automatic download and installation if possible.  
Always download updates only from official websites to avoid downloading malware.  
See also: *How to update your app?*

3. **Use antivirus software**  
We recommend installing antivirus protection on all your devices (computer, tablet, mobile phone, etc.). There are many free and paid options depending on your needs and desired level of protection.  
Regularly check that your antivirus software is up to date and perform full scans to ensure your system is not infected.

4. **Be cautious when shopping online**  
Cybercriminals are increasingly creative in their attempts to deceive you: phishing messages via SMS, email, or phone, fake promotional offers (discounts, gifts, etc.), fake e-commerce sites (especially around holidays), fake ‚Äúofficial‚Äù websites, fake delivery services, or fake order confirmations.  
Their goal: to steal your personal or banking data, trick you into paying for goods you‚Äôll never receive, call premium-rate numbers, or subscribe to paid services without your consent.  
To avoid such fraud, always check the website address where you make your payment‚Äîsometimes a single character difference can indicate a fake site.  
Use the most secure payment methods and never use external payment systems (such as Money Order, Western Union, etc.).  
See: *How to secure my purchases on AI-Bay?*

5. **Beware of suspicious messages**  
Your first reflex should be not to click on any links you receive. If you get an unexpected or alarming message, hover your mouse over the link to see the full URL‚Äîit may be a phishing attempt.  
See: *A message or SMS seems suspicious‚Äîwhat should I do?*

6. **Avoid public or unknown Wi-Fi networks**  
Outside your home, prefer using your mobile data connection (3G, 4G, or 5G) instead of public Wi-Fi. If you must use public Wi-Fi, carefully verify the network name and never perform sensitive actions (credit card payments, checking bank accounts, entering confidential information, etc.).

---

**How to Talk About Cybersecurity with Your Children**

1. **Raise awareness about risks**  
Children are exposed to digital tools daily but often unaware of the risks (cyberbullying, data theft, account hacking, etc.). It‚Äôs important to educate them and help them develop good habits from an early age.

2. **Monitor the content children access**  
Just like adults, children can encounter shocking or illegal content: hate speech, terrorist propaganda, child exploitation, etc. Supervising minors‚Äô internet use is therefore essential.

3. **Report inappropriate behavior**  
Cyberbullying, insults, defamation, corruption of minors, or incitement to commit crimes‚Äîif you encounter illegal content online, report it on the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs website: www.internet-signalement.gouv.fr.  
You can also find information on these risks at 3018.

4. **Make children aware of punishable behavior**  
Young people may feel anonymous online and act without realizing the consequences. However, the internet is not a lawless space, and absolute anonymity does not exist.  
Just like in the real world, laws apply online. Depending on the offense, individuals can face fines of several thousand euros or even imprisonment.

---

**Important:** The use of our platform is prohibited for minors. As a parent or legal guardian, if a minor under your responsibility has created an account on AI-Bay, please help them delete it.

faq_title: **Title:** Traveler: Can the Host Ask Me for a Security Deposit?
faq_body:
AI-Bay does not yet allow including a security deposit or guarantee in the online booking payment. However, the host may request a deposit to ensure compliance with house rules. This deposit must be paid separately from your online booking, using the payment method chosen by the host.

We recommend paying the deposit only upon arrival at the property. In case of any issue upon arrival, AI-Bay guarantees a full refund of the amount paid through the online booking, but cannot guarantee reimbursement of the deposit by the host.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: When Will I Receive Payment for My Booking?
faq_body:
**How is the payment for a booking divided?**

For each booking, the traveler pays a portion as a deposit (between 30% and 100% of the total price, determined by the host when posting the listing), and the remaining balance upon arrival using the payment method chosen by the host.

**Receiving the deposit**  
When you post your vacation rental listing, you set the deposit amount to be paid by the traveler. This can range from 30% to 100% of the total booking amount.

*Tip:* Choosing a 100% deposit ensures a fully secure online transaction.

Online booking builds trust between the host and the traveler. To guarantee the traveler‚Äôs accommodation and the host‚Äôs payment, the deposit process occurs in two steps:

- Upon acceptance of the booking request: the deposit is charged to the traveler‚Äôs account. Your funds are then secured by AI-Bay. On your wallet page, the deposit appears under ‚ÄúUpcoming amounts‚Äù but is not yet available in your wallet.  
- 48 hours after the travelers arrive: the deposit amount is transferred to your AI-Bay wallet. You can then transfer it to your bank account or use it for purchases or bookings on AI-Bay.

**Receiving the remaining balance**  
The deposit covers only part of the booking price. The remaining balance must be paid by the traveler upon arrival.  
AI-Bay does not handle this part of the payment. You can arrange directly with the traveler to choose the appropriate payment method (cash, bank transfer, etc.).

*Note:* If you requested a 100% deposit, no additional payment is required.

The tourist tax is included in the traveler‚Äôs online payment and is automatically transferred by AI-Bay to the relevant municipalities.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How Does Payment in 3 or 4 Installments by Credit Card Work?
faq_body:
**Which purchases are eligible for payment in 3 or 4 installments by credit card?**  
**Does paying in installments involve additional fees?**  
**What do I need to pay in 3 or 4 installments?**  
**How are the installments distributed?**  
**What happens in case of cancellation?**  
**How can I contact the payment provider (Oney)?**

**Eligible purchases**  
Payment in installments is available for all categories except Wine & Gastronomy.  
- 3-installment payment: available for amounts between ‚Ç¨150 and ‚Ç¨199, and ‚Ç¨200 to ‚Ç¨2000.  
- 4-installment payment: available for amounts between ‚Ç¨200 and ‚Ç¨2000.  

*Note:* Payment in installments is not available for amounts below ‚Ç¨150 or above ‚Ç¨2000.

**Are there additional fees?**  
Yes, installment payments include financing costs:  
- **3 installments:** 1.64% of the total amount.  
  Example: For a ‚Ç¨150 purchase, you pay ‚Ç¨52.46 upfront, then 2 monthly payments of ‚Ç¨50. Fixed APR: 22.08%. Financing cost: ‚Ç¨2.46 (max ‚Ç¨25).  
- **4 installments:** 2.46% of the total amount.  
  Example: For a ‚Ç¨400 purchase, you pay ‚Ç¨109.84 upfront, then 3 monthly payments of ‚Ç¨100. Fixed APR: 22.22%. Financing cost: ‚Ç¨9.84 (max ‚Ç¨50).  

*Note:* The total amount includes the item price, delivery fees, and AI-Bay protection fees.

**Requirements for installment payment**  
To use this feature:  
‚úî Your user profile must be complete (name, surname, date of birth, postal address, and IBAN).  
‚úî You must reside in France.  
‚úî You need a Visa or Mastercard credit card.  
No additional documents are required.  
The card must be valid for at least 4 months after purchase. Cards with systematic authorization (Electron, Maestro, Nickel), e-cards, Indigo, and American Express are not accepted.

**Installment schedule**  
For eligible listings, you can view the payment schedule provided by our partner Oney (also sent by email after purchase).  

- **3 installments:**  
  - Upfront payment: 1/3 of total amount (including delivery) + financing cost, paid on purchase day.  
  - 1st installment: 1/3 of total amount, 30 days later.  
  - 2nd installment: 1/3 of total amount, 60 days later.  

- **4 installments:**  
  - Upfront payment: 1/4 of total amount (including delivery) + financing cost, paid on purchase day.  
  - 1st installment: 1/4 of total amount, 30 days later.  
  - 2nd installment: 1/4 of total amount, 60 days later.  
  - 3rd installment: 1/4 of total amount, 90 days later.  

**In case of cancellation**  
If the transaction is canceled after the first payment, the payment provider refunds the amounts already paid (within 4 days after cancellation, plus standard bank processing time). Future installments are automatically canceled.

**Contacting the payment provider (Oney)**  
For any questions about your payment or installments, contact Oney at: serviceclient-oney@oney.fr.

faq_title: **Title:** Rental Application: Our Security Tips for Sharing Your Supporting Documents
faq_body:
To help you prove your situation and reassure landlords, you can now add documents to your tenant file.  
Here are our security tips for sharing these documents safely.

*Note:* Sharing supporting documents is the tenant‚Äôs responsibility. Be cautious to prevent fraudulent use.

**Share your tenant file only with trusted landlords**  
Before sharing your tenant file, make sure you‚Äôre dealing with a trustworthy landlord. Here are some indicators of a reliable one:  
- A professional landlord (real estate agency) with a detailed profile and multiple listings.  
- A landlord account with positive reviews.  
- Several varied listings.  
- Serious and consistent communication through the secure messaging system.  

Be especially cautious if:  
- The listing seems suspicious (very low price, overly professional photos‚Äî‚Äútoo good to be true‚Äù).  
- The landlord asks to communicate outside the secure messaging system.  
- The landlord‚Äôs AI-Bay account was created very recently (you can check this by clicking their username).

*Note:* If you later have doubts about a landlord, you can revoke their access to your tenant file at any time from your account.

**Hide sensitive information on your documents**  
To reduce the risk of identity theft, hide sensitive details that landlords don‚Äôt need: passport number, ID number, social security number, employee ID, tax number, etc.  
You can use the ‚Äúredact‚Äù function in your PDF reader or any image editor.

*Note:* To prevent fraudulent use, your documents are automatically watermarked with ‚ÄúTenant File.‚Äù

**Who can I share my attachments with?**  
*Note:* You can only share your tenant file attachments with verified landlords.

You can send your attachments to verified private or professional landlords.  
You cannot send them to unverified private landlords* or unverified professional landlords**.  
*Your documents cannot be sent to a private landlord who has not verified their identity.*  
**Your documents can only be sent to professional landlords with verified and established AI-Bay accounts.**

When sending your file, you‚Äôll see the landlord‚Äôs verification status:  
- If verified, you‚Äôll see the option ‚Äú‚ñ¢ Attach my complete file‚Äù when sending your first message and in your secure messaging.  
- If not verified, you‚Äôll only see the option ‚Äú‚ñ¢ Attach my file without supporting documents.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: When Will I Receive My Payment?
faq_body:
For an online sale using AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system, the payment will be transferred to your wallet once the transaction is completed.  
For security reasons, the buyer‚Äôs money is held safely until the transaction is finalized. Your funds are released and visible in your AI-Bay wallet as soon as the buyer confirms that everything is fine with the received item.  

---

**Steps for receiving payment**  
**Sale with secure payment and delivery**  
**Sale with secure payment and in-person handover**  
**Why is my payment blocked?**

---

### Steps for receiving payment

**Sale with secure payment and delivery**  
Your funds are released and visible in your AI-Bay wallet once the buyer confirms that the item is as expected.  
If the buyer does not confirm the item‚Äôs condition (and does not report any issue), the payment will automatically be transferred to your wallet 3 days after delivery confirmation.  
If the buyer does not confirm receipt at all, the parcel is automatically considered received 15 days after the shipping date.  
You can then transfer your wallet balance to your bank account or reuse it on AI-Bay for other purchases or vacation bookings.  

**Note:** If the buyer reports a problem (package not received, damaged, or not as described), the funds are held until the issue is resolved.  

---

**Sale with secure payment and in-person handover**  
On the day of the meeting, the buyer checks the product and triggers the payment directly through the secure chat. Make sure to wait for payment confirmation before handing over the item.  
Once the payment is triggered, it takes about 48 hours for the funds to appear in your AI-Bay wallet.  

---

### Why is my payment blocked?  
AI-Bay uses a payment service provider called Adyen to manage user payments.  
The payment balance can only be released once Adyen has verified the documents confirming your identity and bank details.  
If Adyen cannot verify the provided information, it cannot transfer the pending balance.  
Adyen is solely authorized to decide whether to hold or release a transaction‚Äôs funds‚ÄîAI-Bay has no control over this decision.  

However, AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is the only point of contact for any questions related to identity verification or payment of user sales.  
Therefore, please do not contact Adyen directly, as they cannot respond to AI-Bay users.  

For more information, you can consult the User Payment Information Notice for Adyen‚Äôs Secure Payment Service.  

**Note:** AI-Bay never holds users‚Äô funds at any time.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How Should I Pack My Parcel?
faq_body:
To send a package, you only need two things:

- A protective package (of your choice)  
- A shipping label to print and attach to the parcel  

Here are some tips for packaging your item before shipping:

- Take photos of the product before packing to prove its condition in case of damage.  
- Use packaging that fits the product‚Äôs size.  
- Make sure the item is well protected from shocks, dust, and moisture.  
- Attach the shipping label so that the barcode is clearly visible.  

**Note:** Depending on the chosen carrier, your parcel must meet specific weight and size requirements. Check the packaging criteria for each carrier in this article.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How Can I Make an Offer to the Seller?
faq_body:
If you‚Äôre interested in an item, you can negotiate its price through the secure chat. To do so:

‚úî Send an initial message to the seller.  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúMake an offer‚Äù button that appears after your first message.  
‚úî Enter the price you‚Äôd like to propose and click ‚ÄúSend your offer.‚Äù  
*Tip:* Include a short message with your offer to make communication easier.  
‚úî The seller then has 48 hours to accept or decline your offer. They can also make a counteroffer after rejecting yours.  
‚úî Once your offer is accepted, you have 48 hours to complete the payment. If you don‚Äôt pay within that time, the offer will expire.  

**Note:** You cannot cancel an offer yourself. However, it will automatically expire after 48 hours if the seller takes no action (neither accepts nor counters).  

---

### Additional information about the offer process
‚úî A seller can now receive multiple offers simultaneously and make as many offers as they wish, allowing them to choose the one that suits them best.  
‚úî You can also make several offers to the same seller without creating a new transaction.  
If this feature isn‚Äôt available in your AI-Bay mobile app, we recommend updating it.

faq_title: **Title:** Protecting Yourself and Responding to Cyber Blackmail
faq_body:
### What is cyber blackmail?  
### How to protect yourself from cyber blackmail?  
### My identity has been stolen ‚Äî what should I do?  

**Note:** These recommendations come from the French government‚Äôs website cybermalveillance.gouv.fr. For more information, please consult that article.  
If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and access official recommendations on the site 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

---

### What is cyber blackmail?  
Cyber blackmail involving alleged computer or webcam hacking is a type of scam designed to make you believe your devices have been compromised.  
It usually comes in the form of an email from someone claiming to be a hacker.  
This ‚Äúhacker‚Äù claims to have taken control of the victim‚Äôs computer after visiting an adult website and to have recorded compromising videos using the webcam.  
They threaten to share these videos with the victim‚Äôs personal or professional contacts unless a ransom is paid.  
The ransom, often ranging from a few hundred to several thousand euros, is usually requested in cryptocurrency (typically Bitcoin) or prepaid vouchers (PCS).  
Sometimes, to make the threat more convincing, the scammers send the message from the victim‚Äôs own email address or reveal one of their passwords.  

---

### How to protect yourself from cyber blackmail?  
‚úî Regularly update your devices, software, and apps.  
‚úî Use antivirus protection.  
‚úò Avoid unsafe or illegal websites.  
‚úî Use strong, unique passwords for each site and app.  
‚úò Do not open suspicious messages or attachments, and never click on links they contain.  
‚úî Cover your webcam when not in use.  

---

### My identity has been stolen ‚Äî what should I do?  
‚úî Stay calm. You likely have nothing truly compromising to worry about.  
‚úò Do not reply. Responding confirms your email address is active and that you‚Äôve read the message.  
‚úò Do not pay the ransom. If you already have, contact your bank to try to cancel the transaction.  
‚úî Keep all evidence.  
‚úî Change your passwords immediately.  
‚úî File a report with the authorities.

faq_title: **Title:** I Received an Email Offering to Pay by Bank Transfer (RIB)
faq_body:
**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and access government recommendations on the site 17cyber.gouv.fr.  

---

### Who is concerned by the AI-Bay bank details (RIB)?  
‚úî Only buyers of used vehicles are required to make a transfer using AI-Bay‚Äôs RIB.  
‚úî For all other transactions, secure payment is always made by credit card.  

---

### How is the AI-Bay RIB sent?  
‚úî Buyers of used vehicles receive the AI-Bay RIB through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  
‚úò For security reasons, this RIB is never sent by email.  
‚úò Receiving a RIB outside the AI-Bay platform ‚Äî as a PDF, screenshot, or via a link that takes you off-site ‚Äî is likely a fraud attempt. Be cautious: AI-Bay will never send your RIB this way.  
‚úò Do not click on links sent via messages or SMS, as they may be phishing attempts.  

**Warning:** Any email asking you to make a secure AI-Bay payment using a RIB attached to the message is fraudulent.  

---

### Example of a fraudulent email and RIB  
Here‚Äôs an example of a scam email encouraging you to transfer money to a fake account:  

Below is an example of a fraudulent RIB that might be attached to such an email.  

**Note:** As a reminder, AI-Bay‚Äôs BIC is always **MPAYFRP1XXX**, and the IBAN always begins with **FR**. It is used only for secure payment transactions involving used vehicles.  

---

### How to protect yourself and report this type of fraud  
If you receive such an email:  
‚úò Ignore it and do not click on any links.  
‚úî Mark it as spam.  
‚úî Report any suspicious message to Signal Spam.  

If the email is linked to an AI-Bay user you‚Äôve previously interacted with, follow the steps described in this article to submit a report.

faq_title: I‚Äôm not authorized to access the AI-Bay messaging system
faq_body:
Following an attempt to access the AI-Bay messaging system, you received the message: ‚ÄúYou are not authorized to access AI-Bay messaging.‚Äù  
To ensure the safety of all AI-Bay users, we may block access to messaging when we detect suspicious behavior or activity that does not comply with our Code of Conduct or our Terms of Use.  

Access to messaging may be blocked for several reasons:  
X **Suspicious activity or behavior:** when we detect actions or activities that could compromise the security of our users or the AI-Bay platform.  
X **Spam:** sending repetitive messages negatively affects the user experience. This practice is not accepted on AI-Bay.  
X **Inappropriate content:** AI-Bay is a public platform, and we may block messaging access for any account sharing content that could offend or harm our users, in accordance with our Code of Conduct.  

If, after reviewing our **Code of Conduct** and **Terms of Use**, you believe this block is an error, please contact our customer service team.

faq_title: Private seller: I don‚Äôt want to use secure payment and delivery ‚Äî what should I do?
faq_body:
When creating your listing, secure payment is automatically enabled. This option includes offering delivery for your item.  

If you do not wish to offer this payment and delivery method:  
1. Click on ‚ÄúEdit delivery options.‚Äù  
2. Uncheck all delivery methods.  
3. Click ‚ÄúConfirm.‚Äù  

You will still be able to receive offers from buyers on your listing.  

**Note:** You can change your mind at any time and reactivate secure payment by editing your listing.

faq_title: How do I add members to my team?
faq_body:
You can add members of your team to your AI-Bay Pro Page to showcase your business and introduce your representatives to potential buyers.  

**Note:** This feature is available to users who have a Pro Page. To learn more, see *How to get a Pro Page?*  

1. Log in to your professional account.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your Professional Space.  
3. Click on the ‚ÄúTeam‚Äù section.  
4. Click ‚ÄúAdd a member.‚Äù  
5. Add an image, name, and position.  

To add more members, click ‚ÄúAdd a member‚Äù again.  
You can rearrange the order by dragging members up or down.  
You can remove a member by clicking the trash icon.  

To edit a member‚Äôs details, click the pencil icon.  
Save your changes. The team carousel will appear on your page within a few minutes.  

**Note:** Accepted file formats are jpg, jpeg, and png, with a maximum size of 8 MB.

faq_title: Sending attachments in AI-Bay messaging
faq_body:
You can send attachments in your conversations:  
1. Log in to your account.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab.  
3. Select the conversation where you want to send an attachment.  
4. Click the ‚Äú+‚Äù icon at the bottom left of the message box.  
5. Select the file you wish to send.  

**Important:** The maximum file size is 16 MB. Recommended formats: jpeg, png, bmp, pdf, tiff.  
Files in doc and docx formats are not allowed.

faq_title: üöô Seller: How can I confirm that the buyer has deposited funds for the vehicle transaction?
faq_body:
**Important:** We notify you at every stage of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, accompanied by an email ending in @ai-bay.fr or @messaging.ai-bay.fr. If you have any doubts, do not take any action and contact our customer service team.  

**How will I know when the funds have been deposited?**  
In your messaging conversation with the buyer, you will receive a notification confirming that the funds have arrived. This means the transaction is ready to proceed.  

**Security**  
We notify you at every step of the transaction via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system. Only these notifications are valid.  
If you receive an email asking you to take action or confirming an action, always verify that you have received the corresponding notification in your secure AI-Bay messaging.  
If in doubt, do not take any action and contact our customer service team.

faq_title: **What is the history of my listings?**
faq_body:
**What information can I access from my ad history?**

To help you make better decisions and improve your ad performance every day, the ‚ÄúAds‚Äù page on **AI-Bay** has been updated.

You can now view trends for your ads, including the following details:

- **Appearances:** The number of times your ad appeared in search results.  
- **Views:** The number of times the details of your ad were viewed.

**How to access it:**

1. Log in to your **AI-Bay** account from the web.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúAds‚Äù to see all your active listings.  
3. Click on ‚ÄúHistory‚Äù to view detailed information about your ad.

faq_title: **Why aren‚Äôt all vacation rental listings available for online booking?**
faq_body:
**The online booking service is free for hosts but remains optional.**

Only listings posted by hosts who have agreed to be verified by our team are eligible for online booking. This ensures the safety of all our travelers!

You can disable the booking service at any time.  
Learn more: *How to deactivate the online booking service?*

faq_title: **What should I do in case of a dispute with another user?**
faq_body:
**I used secure payment**

**I am a buyer**

**I am a seller**

---

**I did not use secure payment**  
**How can I protect myself from potential disputes?**

---

### I used secure payment

**I am a buyer**

**I haven‚Äôt received the package:**

Between 6 and 15 days after the package was sent, report the non-receipt through the secure messaging system. Your request will be forwarded to customer support.  
See: *Buyer ‚Äì What to do if I haven‚Äôt received my package?*

**The product received doesn‚Äôt match the ad:**

Within 3 days of receiving the package, report the issue via secure messaging (non-compliant or damaged product).  
You then have 7 days to reach an amicable agreement with the seller. If no agreement is reached, your request will be escalated to customer support.  
See: *Buyer ‚Äì What to do if the product received doesn‚Äôt match the ad?*

---

**I am a seller**

**The buyer hasn‚Äôt received the package**

Once the buyer declares the package as not received, the transaction is suspended. Contact the chosen carrier for more information.  
If the package is eventually found, the buyer must inform customer support, who will then release the transaction.  
See: *Private Seller ‚Äì What to do if the buyer declares the package as not received?*

**The package arrived damaged or the buyer is not satisfied**

The buyer can report a problem within 3 days of receiving the package. The transaction will then be suspended, and you have 7 days to find an amicable solution.  
If no agreement is reached within 7 days, customer support will automatically step in.  
See: *Private Seller ‚Äì What to do if the buyer declares the product as non-compliant?*

---

### I did not use secure payment

**Note:** All transactions are made directly between buyer and seller. **AI-Bay** only publishes listings and does not act as an intermediary or trusted third party.

In most cases, such situations are resolved amicably. We recommend contacting the other party to find a mutual agreement.  
If you cannot resolve the issue, we advise you to contact the local police or gendarmerie for further guidance. Upon judicial request, we will provide all relevant information to the competent authorities.

Keep all useful information that may help resolve your dispute, such as:

- A copy of the fraudulent ad  
- A copy of your exchanges  
- Photos of the item  

**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations at [17cyber.gouv.fr](https://www.17cyber.gouv.fr).

---

### How to protect yourself from potential disputes?

In general, if a transaction seems suspicious, remember that you are never obligated to proceed.  
Always refuse any payment requests made outside our platform. Be cautious with buyers contacting you from abroad offering transfers via Western Union or Money Order.  

For more information on suspicious behavior and safety tips, visit our **Trust & Safety** section.

faq_title: **How can I save a listing?**
faq_body:
**How to save an ad**

Log in to your personal **AI-Bay** account using your email and password. This allows you to access your saved ads anytime from any device.

Then simply click on the heart icon:

- **From the ad listing:** on the right side of the ad.  
- **From the ad page:** at the bottom right of the ad.

You can save up to 100 ads.

faq_title: **How do I subscribe to the Extra Photos Pack?**
faq_body:
**What is the Extra Photos Pack?**  
**Subscribing to the Extra Photos Pack**  
**Payment for the Extra Photos Pack**

---

### What is the Extra Photos Pack?

**Benefits of the Extra Photos Pack**

The Extra Photos Pack is a paid option that allows you to upload up to 10 photos for professionals and up to 20 photos for private users when posting, renewing, or editing your ad.  
This pack remains valid for the entire duration of your ad‚Äôs publication‚Äî2 months from the initial posting or renewal date. It is available for both offers and requests.

If you delete your photos during the 2-month publication period, the option remains valid until it expires. Modifying these photos is still a paid action.

---

### For private users

Private users can upload 17 additional photos with this pack.  
In categories where 3 photos can be added for free‚Äîvehicles, real estate, pets, services, and others‚Äîthis pack extends your photo limit.

**Note:** You can add up to 20 photos for free in the following categories: vacation rentals, electronics, home & garden, fashion, leisure, and family.

---

### For professionals

Professionals can upload 5 additional photos with this pack. By default, 5 photos can be added for free.

---

### Subscribing to the Extra Photos Pack

To subscribe to the Extra Photos Pack:

‚úî Log in to your personal **AI-Bay** account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúAds.‚Äù  
‚úî Check the ad you want to boost and click on ‚ÄúPromote.‚Äù

---

### Payment for the Extra Photos Pack

This option can be paid by credit card, Apple Pay, or PayPal.

To check the price of this option based on your selected category:

‚úî Log in to your account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on the ‚ÄúPrices‚Äù tab in our General Terms of Sale.  
‚úî Select the category where you want to post your ad.
