faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: how can I pay for a purchase in 3 or 4 installments by credit card?
faq_body:
**Note:** Check out our article *Buyer: How does payment in 3 or 4 installments by credit card work?* to learn more about this offer.

For certain purchases made on **AI-Bay**, you can choose to pay in several installments.  
Here‚Äôs how to proceed:

‚úî Make sure your **AI-Bay** user profile is complete: full name, date of birth, postal address, and IBAN.  
‚úî Go to a listing eligible for installment payment (amount between ‚Ç¨150 and ‚Ç¨2000, excluding the Wine & Gastronomy category).  
‚úî Click the ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù button.  
‚úî Select a delivery method.  
‚úî Check the box ‚ÄúPay in 3x‚Äù or ‚ÄúPay in 4x.‚Äù  
‚úî Fill in the requested information: first name, last name, billing address, city or postal code, and phone number.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúContinue to Oney.‚Äù You will be redirected.  
‚úî Enter your date of birth, credit card details, and accept the general terms and conditions.  
‚úî Once your payment is approved, you‚Äôll receive a confirmation message.

**Note:** If you choose to pay in installments, the seller will still receive the full sale amount once the transaction is finalized.

**What if my request is declined?**  
First, check that your user profile is complete: full name, date of birth, postal address, and IBAN.  
Our payment partner **Oney** may refuse your payment if you are not eligible for this service. In that case, please choose another payment method.  
For any questions regarding a financing refusal, please contact our partner directly at: **contact@client.oney.fr**.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: steps for a purchase with secure payment and pickup from the seller (purchase from a professional seller)
faq_body:
Thanks to the **Pickup from Professional Seller** option, you can reserve your item by paying through **AI-Bay‚Äôs** secure payment system before going to the seller‚Äôs address to collect it. This option allows you to avoid delivery fees.

**Step 1:** Select pickup from the seller  
**Step 2:** Proceed with payment  
**Step 3:** The seller confirms the item‚Äôs availability and provides opening hours  
**Step 4:** On pickup day, share the pickup code with the seller  
**Step 5:** The seller finalizes the transaction and you collect the item  
**Step 6:** Right of withdrawal

**Step 1: Select pickup from the seller**  
‚úî On the listing you‚Äôre interested in, click ‚ÄúBuy.‚Äù  
‚úî The list of delivery options will appear. Check ‚ÄúPickup from the seller.‚Äù

**Note:** If this option doesn‚Äôt appear, it means the seller hasn‚Äôt enabled it.

**Step 2: Proceed with payment**  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúStep 2/2: Pay.‚Äù  
‚úî Enter your credit card details.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúPay.‚Äù

**Note:** Your money is not immediately transferred to the seller. Payment is triggered only when you pick up the item and confirm it suits you.

**Step 3: The seller confirms availability and provides opening hours**  
After your purchase, the seller has 48 hours to confirm the item‚Äôs availability. Then, contact them to check their opening hours and arrange pickup.

**Note:** If you don‚Äôt collect your item within 15 days after confirmation, the transaction will be automatically canceled and you‚Äôll be refunded.

**Step 4: On pickup day, share the pickup code with the seller**  
When you arrive to collect your item, check that it meets your expectations. If it does:  
‚úî Go to **AI-Bay‚Äôs** secure messaging.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúDoes the item suit you?‚Äù in the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî A window will open with a pickup code to share with the seller.  
‚úî Give the code to the seller and click ‚ÄúI‚Äôve given the code to the seller.‚Äù  
‚úî If the item doesn‚Äôt suit you, click ‚ÄúRequest cancellation‚Äù and leave the item with the seller. Your payment will then be refunded.

**Step 5: The seller finalizes the transaction and you collect the item**  
When you share the pickup code, you authorize the seller to trigger payment and complete the sale. Wait for a payment confirmation in the secure messaging before leaving with your item.

**Step 6: Right of withdrawal**  
You have a 14-day withdrawal period during which you can return the item to the seller for a refund if it doesn‚Äôt suit you. The return process is the same as the pickup.

**Important:** On the day of the return, make sure not to leave before the seller confirms receipt of the item via secure messaging.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: price and conditions of the mechanical breakdown warranty
faq_body:
**What is the mechanical breakdown warranty?**  
**How much does it cost?**  
**What are the conditions to subscribe?**  
**Which vehicle parts are covered?**  
**Do I have to pay a deductible in case of a claim?**  
**Do I need to pay repair costs upfront?**  
**Is there a reimbursement limit?**  
**Who should I contact for questions or in case of a breakdown?**

**Important:** This article only applies to requests related to the mechanical breakdown warranty subscribed through **AI-Bay‚Äôs** secure vehicle payment (with the Serenity Pack).

**What is the mechanical breakdown warranty?**  
It‚Äôs an insurance contract that covers your vehicle against mechanical, electrical, and electronic failures under the terms and limits of the following general conditions:

- CGV Extended Warranty and Maximum Assistance  
- CGV Extended Warranty and Essential Assistance  
- CGV Extended Warranty and Optimal Assistance  

This warranty is included in the Serenity Pack.

**Note:** If you buy a vehicle not eligible for the Serenity Pack, you cannot subscribe to the mechanical breakdown warranty.

If your vehicle is covered by **BNP Paribas Cardif**, the insurer will:  
‚úî Provide immediate roadside assistance if your vehicle is immobilized and offer a replacement vehicle.  
‚úî Cover repair costs, including parts and labor.

**How much does the warranty cost?**  
The price depends on the coverage duration selected with the Serenity Pack:  
- 3 months: ‚Ç¨139  
- 6 months: ‚Ç¨259  
- 12 months: ‚Ç¨399

**What are the conditions to subscribe?**  
The warranty is available only for peer-to-peer transactions.  
It comes in three levels: Maximum, Optimal, and Essential.  
You don‚Äôt choose the level yourself‚Äîit‚Äôs automatically assigned based on your vehicle type (price remains the same).

Eligibility criteria:

**Maximum Warranty**  
‚úî Vehicle age: 2‚Äì5 years  
‚úî Mileage ‚â§ 120,000 km  
‚úî Power ‚â§ 265 DIN hp  

**Optimal Warranty**  
‚úî Vehicle age: 5‚Äì10 years  
‚úî Mileage ‚â§ 200,000 km  
‚úî Power ‚â§ 265 DIN hp  

**Essential Warranty**  
‚úî Vehicle age: 10‚Äì20 years  
‚úî Mileage ‚â§ 200,000 km  
‚úî Power ‚â§ 265 DIN hp  

**Note:** For more details, see our article *I‚Äôm a buyer: How to subscribe to the mechanical breakdown warranty?*

**Which parts are covered?**  
Coverage varies depending on the vehicle‚Äôs age and mileage.

**Maximum Warranty**  
- Engine  
- Gearbox  
- Cooling system  
- Turbo injection  
- Electronic units  
- Parking assistance  
- Braking  
- Steering  
- Transmission  
- Starter or alternator  
- Sensors and wiring  
- Seats and upholstery  
- GPS/radio  
- Suspension  
- Central locking  
- Dashboard instruments  
- Air conditioning  
- High-voltage battery  
- Traction motor, control, and charging system  
- Battery cooling  

**Optimal Warranty**  
- Engine  
- Gearbox  
- Cooling system  
- Braking  
- Steering  
- Transmission  
- Turbo injection  
- Engine electronic units  
- Starter or alternator  
- Engine sensors and wiring  
- Traction motor, control, and charging system  
- Battery cooling  

**Essential Warranty**  
- Engine  
- Gearbox  
- Cooling system  
- Transmission  
- Injection  
- Turbo  
- Traction motor, control, and charging system  
- Battery cooling  

**Do I have to pay a deductible?**  
Yes, ‚Ç¨150 per claim.

**Do I need to pay repair costs upfront?**  
No. In France, covered repair costs are paid directly by the insurer to the repair garage.

**Is there a reimbursement limit?**  
Yes, the maximum coverage amount is ‚Ç¨3,000.

**Who should I contact?**  
- If you haven‚Äôt subscribed yet: contact **AI-Bay** customer service by clicking ‚ÄúSend a request‚Äù at the bottom of this article.  
- If you already have a warranty contract: contact our insurance partner by email. When declaring a breakdown, include a copy of your vehicle registration (in your name) to speed up processing.

faq_title: **Title:** How do I update my app?
faq_body:
**Important information:** Starting February 17, the iOS 15 version of the **AI-Bay** app will no longer be available. To continue using **AI-Bay** on the app, please update your operating system to iOS 16 by following the steps below. You can also continue using **AI-Bay** via your web browser.

**Why is it important to regularly update the AI-Bay app?**  
**How can I check if my app is up to date?**  
**How to update the app**

**Why should you keep the AI-Bay app updated?**  
We regularly improve the app to bring you new features and bug fixes. Installing the latest version ensures a smoother, more secure, and optimized experience.  
For example, if you encounter a bug while posting an ad or making a purchase, it‚Äôs likely to be fixed in the next update.

**Note:** A new app update is usually available every week.

**How to check if your app is up to date**  
Compare the version number shown on the App Store (iOS) or Play Store (Android) with the one displayed in your **AI-Bay** app.

In your app, the version number appears at the bottom right of the ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù tab.  
If both versions match, your app is up to date!

**How to update the app**

**On iOS**  
‚úî From your smartphone, open the App Store.  
‚úî Search for the **AI-Bay** app.  
‚úî Tap ‚ÄúUpdate.‚Äù

**On Android**  
‚úî From your smartphone, open the Play Store.  
‚úî Search for the **AI-Bay** app.  
‚úî Tap ‚ÄúUpdate.‚Äù

**Note:** You can also enable automatic app updates in your phone‚Äôs settings. Check how to do this on iOS and Android.

faq_title: **Title:** Strengthen My Account Security by Enabling Two-Step Verification
faq_body:
**Why enable two-step login?**  
**How to enable two-step login?**  
**How to disable two-step login?**  
**I can‚Äôt receive the verification code: what should I do?**  

To strengthen your account security, we recommend enabling two-step login.  

**Why enable two-step login?**  
Two-step login helps protect your account from malicious activity. It adds an extra layer of security by requiring a verification code sent by email or SMS in addition to your password.  

**How to enable two-step login?**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account and click on your profile.  
‚úî Select the ‚ÄúLogin and Security‚Äù section.  
‚úî Under ‚ÄúTwo-step login,‚Äù choose your preferred verification method: by email or SMS.  
‚úî Follow the on-screen steps to complete activation.  

Once two-step login is enabled, you‚Äôll be logged out of all devices currently connected to your account. From then on, each time you log in, you‚Äôll need to enter the code sent to you by email or SMS in addition to your password.  

**How to disable two-step login?**  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account and click on your profile.  
‚úî Go to ‚ÄúLogin and Security,‚Äù then under ‚ÄúTwo-step login,‚Äù click the arrow on the right.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúDisable two-step login.‚Äù  
‚úî Follow the steps to confirm deactivation.  

**I can‚Äôt receive the verification code: what should I do?**  
If your code was sent by email, check your spam or junk folder‚Äîit might be there.  
If you‚Äôve recently changed your phone number or no longer have access to your email inbox, preventing you from receiving the code, please contact AI-Bay Customer Support. On the contact form, select the topic ‚ÄúProblem with the verification code.‚Äù  

To help our team process your request, please include:  
‚úî Your old and new phone numbers  
‚úî A bill from the provider of your old phone number currently linked to your account  
‚úî A copy of the ID document associated with your account (front and back of your national ID card, passport, or driver‚Äôs license)  

**Information:** You may send a black-and-white copy of your ID with masked numbers, including the handwritten note: ‚ÄúCopy provided on [date] at my request to AI-Bay Customer Support,‚Äù followed by your signature.  

These documents will be processed by AI-Bay France to confirm account ownership and will be deleted once verification is complete, within a maximum of 30 days.  
For more details on how your data is used and to exercise your rights of access, correction, objection, deletion, restriction, and portability, please refer to our AI-Bay Privacy Policy.

faq_title: **Title:** How Can I Customize My Cover Photo?
faq_body:
**How to customize your Pro Page cover photo**  

To personalize your Pro Page, you can choose your own cover photo.  

**Note:** This feature is available only to users who have a Pro Page. To learn more, see *How to get a Pro Page?*  

**Steps:**  
1. Log in to your professional account.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your Professional Space.  
3. Click the ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù button on the cover photo.  
4. A window will open showing your current image and format guidelines.  
5. Click ‚ÄúChange image‚Äù to open your file explorer and select the desired photo.  
6. In the preview window, you can zoom in/out and reposition the image using your mouse.  
7. Click ‚ÄúSave‚Äù to confirm your changes. Your new cover photo will appear on your page within a few minutes.  

**Note:** Accepted formats are JPG, JPEG, and PNG. The maximum file size is 8 MB, and the ideal dimensions are 1066 x 240 px.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How Do I Receive Payment for My Reservations?
faq_body:
**Note:** This article applies only to transactions made through the online booking service.  

**Receiving the deposit payment**  
The deposit is credited to your AI-Bay wallet 48 hours after the traveler arrives at the property. The amount ranges from 30% to 100% of the total booking, as defined when the listing was created.  
Once the booking is confirmed, you can view the deposit under ‚Äúupcoming amounts‚Äù in your wallet section.  
When the funds appear in your AI-Bay wallet, you can transfer them to your bank account or use them to make purchases on AI-Bay.  

**Receiving the remaining balance**  
For transactions made through the online booking service, only the secured deposit is managed by AI-Bay and transferred to your wallet.  
The remaining balance of the booking must be paid upon the travelers‚Äô arrival, using the payment method of your choice.

faq_title: **Title:** What Is Included in the Reservation Price?
faq_body:
**What‚Äôs included in the booking price:**  

- **Stay deposit:** defined by the host when creating the listing  
- **Tourist tax**  
- **Service fees:** covering the costs of operating the service and the included insurance  
- **Mutuaide insurance:**  

**For the traveler:** If you encounter an issue upon arrival, your deposit will be refunded, you‚Äôll be re-accommodated for up to 3 nights free of charge, and Mutuaide will assist you in finding alternative lodging.*  

**For the host:** You‚Äôll receive your deposit even if the traveler cancels within 30 days before arrival, thanks to the secure rental guarantee subscribed by AI-Bay through its partner Mutuaide.*  

*Applies only to bookings made using the online payment service.*  

**Important:** No additional fees (e.g., cleaning fees) are included in the booking price. We recommend that travelers contact the host directly to confirm any extra costs or services.  

**Note:** If your stay is managed by Locasun (a brand of the AI-Bay Group), please refer to the information available directly via the provided link.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: How Am I Paid After Selling My Vehicle?
faq_body:
**How to transfer your funds**  

As a seller, you can transfer your funds to your bank account as soon as the transaction with the buyer is completed.  
The transaction is immediate and irreversible: once the funds are in your AI-Bay account, you can hand over the vehicle keys to the buyer.  

To transfer your funds to your bank account, simply click the ‚ÄúTransfer funds‚Äù button in your AI-Bay messaging area, then confirm.  

**Conditions for transferring your funds**  
To transfer your funds, you must:  
- Have entered the IBAN of the bank account where you want to receive the funds.  
- Have verified your identity (see ‚ÄúWhy and how to verify your identity?‚Äù in your profile section).  
- Have completed the transaction with your buyer and received the funds in your AI-Bay account.

faq_title: I received an email saying there was a login from a new device
faq_body:
To help you protect your account, we send you this email whenever we detect a new login attempt to your account from a new browser.  
This email includes:  
‚úî The date of the account login  
‚úî The location of the login  
‚úî The operating system and browser version used  

If this was you, you can safely ignore this email.  
If not, we recommend that you:  
‚úî Reset the password for your email account (Gmail, Outlook, Hotmail, etc.)  
‚úî Reset the password for your AI-Bay account to secure it.  

For added security, we suggest enabling two-step verification: How to activate two-step login?  
If you experience any difficulties, please contact our support team for assistance.

faq_title: How can I extend the lifespan of my listing?
faq_body:
Note: Your listing will remain online for 60 days (except in the Leisure, Home, Fashion, Multimedia, and Vacation categories, where listings stay online indefinitely) and will then be automatically removed.  

From your email inbox:  
You should have received an email from AI-Bay titled ‚ÄúRenew your listing for free.‚Äù Open it and follow the instructions.  

From your AI-Bay account:  
Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
Click on ‚ÄúListings‚Äù and then ‚ÄúExpired listings.‚Äù You‚Äôll find your expired ads along with the number of days left to renew them.  
Click the ‚ÄúRenew‚Äù button.  

Note: Renewing a listing is free, but any paid options selected when posting your ad must be renewed separately.

faq_title: Buyer: how do I pick up my parcel with Mondial Relay?
faq_body:
Receiving your parcel  
The item received is damaged  
Can someone else pick up my parcel?  
How long is my parcel kept?  

Receiving your parcel  
At a Pickup Point:  
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a message when your parcel is available at the selected Mondial Relay point. Delivery usually takes 3 to 6 business days.  
‚úî Go to the Mondial Relay pickup point.  
‚úî Present your ID to the shopkeeper.  
‚úî Collect your parcel and sign for it.  
‚úî Confirm receipt of the parcel in your AI-Bay app.  
‚úî After checking the contents, confirm that the item matches the description in your AI-Bay app.  

Important: Before accepting and electronically signing for your parcel, you must check its external condition. No claim can be made to Mondial Relay if you accept and collect the parcel without noting any issues.  

Via a Locker:  
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a message when your parcel is available in the selected Mondial Relay Locker. Delivery usually takes 3 to 6 business days.  
‚úî Go to the location of the Locker with your 6-digit pickup code received by SMS.  
‚úî Tap ‚ÄúPick up a parcel‚Äù on the Locker screen.  
‚úî Enter the pickup code; the locker containing your parcel will open automatically.  
‚úî Don‚Äôt forget to close the locker and confirm the pickup on the screen.  
‚úî Confirm receipt of the parcel in your AI-Bay app.  
‚úî After checking the contents, confirm that the item matches the description in your AI-Bay app.  

Note: Make sure your phone number is listed in your account to receive the pickup code.  
Locker delivery is available for parcels under 2 kg in all categories.  

The item received is damaged  
Step 1: Report your concern when receiving the parcel  
When collecting your parcel, you must check its external condition. If you notice any issue before opening it (damaged, torn, poorly packed, etc.), you must note a reservation with the pickup point before accepting it.  
To do this, select the reason ‚Äúdamaged/reservation‚Äù (via the signature pad) before signing and accepting the parcel.  

Step 2: File a claim with Mondial Relay  
If you notice an issue after opening the parcel, you must file a claim with Mondial Relay within 24 hours of pickup.  
You can submit your claim:  
- Using the form available on the Mondial Relay website  
- By phone at 09 69 32 23 32 (Monday to Friday, 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. and 2 p.m. to 6 p.m.)  

If no reservation was made at pickup, the carrier will not accept any claim.  

Can someone else pick up my parcel?  
Yes, you can authorize a trusted person to collect your parcel. They must bring their ID and yours (or a copy) to the Mondial Relay point.  

How long is my parcel kept?  
The Mondial Relay point keeps your parcel for 8 days. After that, it will be returned to the seller.

faq_title: Private seller: how do I send my parcel?
faq_body:
To send your parcel, download and print the shipping label. Pack the item carefully, making sure the barcode on the label remains visible. Drop off your parcel at the collection point corresponding to your chosen carrier. Don‚Äôt forget to confirm the shipment via AI-Bay messaging. Shipping costs are paid by the buyer.  

Here‚Äôs how to send your parcel:  
‚úî Download and print your shipping label.  
‚úî Pack your item carefully.  
‚úî Attach the label to the parcel, keeping the barcode visible.  
‚úî Drop off your parcel:  

- At a Mondial Relay pickup point: find a Mondial Relay location  
- At a Colissimo pickup point: find a Colissimo location  
- In a La Poste mailbox for tracked mail  
- With your chosen carrier if you selected a personalized shipment  
- At a Pickup Relay for Shop2Shop by Chronopost: find a Pickup Relay location  
- At a Relais Colis point: find a Relais Colis location  

‚úî Confirm the shipment via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  

Note: You don‚Äôt have to pay anything; shipping costs are billed to the buyer.  

I don‚Äôt have a printer ‚Äî what should I do?  
Mondial Relay allows you to print your shipping label directly at a pickup point. To do this, present the QR code received by email at one of the pickup points offering the printing service. The email containing the QR code is sent about 30 minutes after the purchase is confirmed.  

To find pickup points offering label printing:  
- Go to the link to find your Mondial Relay pickup point  
- Enter the destination postal code  
- Select a pickup point marked ‚ÄúPrinting available on site‚Äù

faq_title: Private seller: how do I rate my buyer?
faq_body:
Once the transaction is complete, you have 15 days to rate the buyer:  
‚úî Go to the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab.  
‚úî Select the conversation related to the transaction.  
‚úî The question ‚ÄúWould you recommend this seller to other AI-Bay members?‚Äù will appear.  
‚úî Tap ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù and leave your rating: 1 star is the lowest score, and 5 stars is the highest.  

If you don‚Äôt leave a rating within 15 days, an automatic rating will be assigned.  
The stars shown on a seller‚Äôs profile represent the average of all ratings received from previous transactions. 1 star means users do not recommend the seller, while 5 stars mean they highly recommend them.  

Once your rating is submitted, it will be published within a maximum of 15 days after the online transaction.  
For the rating to be published:  
‚úî Both the seller and buyer must validate their transaction rating.  
‚úî If one party doesn‚Äôt validate it, the other‚Äôs rating will be automatically confirmed after 14 days, when the transaction is considered complete.  

Note: In case of a dispute, it‚Äôs not possible to rate your buyer.  

For more information, please visit our dedicated page on User Review Rules.

faq_title: **Traveler: How to Contact the Host?**
faq_body:
As a traveler using the online booking service to reserve your vacation rentals, you can contact hosts through AI-Bay messaging, by email, or by phone.  

**I want to contact the host before booking**

**Note:** If your stay is managed by Locasun (a brand of the AI-Bay group), please contact the dedicated service [here].

faq_title: **How to Delete a Conversation?**
faq_body:
**From a computer (via a web browser)**  
- Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
- Click on ‚ÄúMessages.‚Äù  
- Your list of conversations will appear. To delete a conversation, click the ‚Äútrash‚Äù icon next to the user‚Äôs name.  

**From the iOS mobile app**  
- Open your AI-Bay app.  
- Go to the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab.  
- Your list of conversations will appear. To delete a conversation, swipe a message to the left and tap ‚ÄúDelete.‚Äù  

**From the Android mobile app**  
- Open your AI-Bay app.  
- Go to the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù tab.

faq_title: **How to Search for a Listing?**
faq_body:
**How to search for a listing**  
**Search tips**  
**Search by photo in the mobile apps**

You can search across all of France or combine up to 10 different locations (regions and neighboring regions, departments and neighboring departments, cities, or postal codes). You can remove or add locations at any time. When you enter a location, you‚Äôll also see your three most recent search locations.

faq_title: **Private Seller: What Does Identity Verification Involve?**
faq_body:
**A legal identification requirement for secure payments**  
**How this is applied on the AI-Bay platform**  
**Security measures implemented to protect you**  
**Protection of personal data**  

**A legal identification requirement for secure payments**  
Secure payment is a service offered by AI-Bay in partnership with the financial institution Adyen N.V.  
As a financial organization, Adyen is subject to European banking regulations, which include obligations for identification, identity verification, and customer due diligence to combat money laundering and terrorist financing (AML/CFT).  
Under this legal requirement, Adyen must implement a ‚ÄúKnow Your Customer‚Äù (KYC) process to identify and verify the identity of any user who uses this service.  

**How this is applied on the AI-Bay platform**  
This process involves a series of checks that vary depending on financial thresholds. For anti-fraud reasons, the exact amounts of these thresholds remain confidential.  
These checks are described in Article 3.9, ‚ÄúPayment receipt by the Seller,‚Äù of AI-Bay‚Äôs Terms of Use, which every user accepts when creating an account.  
After completing a transaction, you may be asked to provide the following information, which will be verified by our payment partner Adyen before you can receive your funds:  
‚úî Your first and last name  
‚úî Your postal address  
‚úî Your email address  
‚úî Your date of birth  
‚úî Your bank account details (RIB)  
‚úî A valid form of ID (national ID card, passport, or new-format driver‚Äôs license) may be requested from private sellers in certain cases, especially when transaction volumes exceed a certain level, to prevent fraud.  

**Important:** Providing this proof of identity is mandatory before funds can be released. The funds will remain held by Adyen until the legally required verification is completed.  

**Security measures implemented to protect you**  
The security and confidentiality of user data are top priorities for AI-Bay and our payment partner, Adyen. Strict and robust security measures have been implemented to protect personal information, including users‚Äô identity documents.  
Adyen fully complies with the PCI-DSS 3.2 standard, the leading security standard in the payment industry. Data and attachments sent to Adyen are transmitted through an encrypted connection using strong encryption algorithms. In addition to encrypting data in transit, Adyen maintains extensive monitoring and operates in an active/active mirrored mode. These measures help prevent unauthorized access, enable detection and response controls, and ensure system availability and resilience. The effectiveness of these controls is validated by Adyen‚Äôs security team, internal audits, and external PCI-DSS certified audits.  

**Protection of personal data**  
Your data is processed by our payment partner Adyen, which verifies it to secure transactions between users, based on its legal obligations related to anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing.  
According to Adyen‚Äôs privacy policy, your identity documents are retained for 5 years after the end of the contractual relationship.  
To learn more and exercise your rights of access, correction, objection, deletion, restriction, or portability with Adyen, click here.

faq_title: **Buyer: How do I pick up my parcel with Shop2Shop by Chronopost?**
faq_body:
**Receiving Your Parcel**  
**The item received is damaged**  
**Can someone else collect my parcel?**  
**How long is my parcel kept?**  

---

### Receiving Your Parcel  
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a message when your parcel is available at the selected Pickup point. Delivery usually takes between 3 and 5 business days.  
‚úî Go to the Pickup point.  
‚úî Present your ID to the shopkeeper.  
‚úî Sign to collect your parcel.  
‚úî Confirm receipt of the parcel in your **AI-Bay** app.  
‚úî After checking the contents, confirm that the item matches the description in your **AI-Bay** app.  

**Important:** Before accepting and electronically signing for your parcel, you must check its external condition. No claim can be made to Shop2Shop by Chronopost if you have accepted and collected the parcel without noting any reservations.  

---

### The Item Received Is Damaged  
**Step 1: Report your concern when collecting the parcel**  
When picking up your parcel, you must check its external condition. If you notice any issue before opening it (damaged, torn, poorly packed, etc.), you must make a reservation with the Pickup point before accepting the parcel.  
Ask the shopkeeper to record as many details as possible before signing and accepting the parcel.  

**Step 2: File a claim through your AI-Bay app**  
If you notice an issue after opening the parcel, open a dispute in your **AI-Bay** app to temporarily block your payment. **AI-Bay** will then open an investigation with Shop2Shop by Chronopost.  
If no reservation was made when collecting the parcel, the carrier will not accept any claim.  

---

### Can Someone Else Collect My Parcel?  
Yes, you can authorize a trusted person to collect your parcel. They must bring their ID and a written authorization to the Pickup point.  

---

### How Long Is My Parcel Kept?  
The Pickup point keeps your parcel for 7 calendar days. After this period, it will be returned to the seller.

faq_title: **Private Seller: What are my tax obligations when selling on AI-Bay?**
faq_body:
**Note:** Your tax obligations are detailed on our partner Climb‚Äôs page.  

---

### What Taxes Apply Depending on Your Situation?  

| Type of Item Sold | Taxation |  
|--------------------|-----------|  
| Furniture, household appliances, vehicles (except collector cars) | Exempt from income tax |  
| Other goods (not furniture, appliances, or vehicles) | Taxed at a flat rate of 36.2% if both conditions are met: 1) The sale generates a capital gain, and 2) The sale price exceeds ‚Ç¨5,000 |  
| Items bought or made for resale | Taxed under the category of industrial and commercial profits (BIC) ‚Äì see details |  
| Precious items (precious metals, jewelry, art, antiques, collectibles) | Exempt from income tax but subject to the flat tax on precious objects ‚Äì see details |  

---

### Transparency Obligation Between AI-Bay and the Tax Administration  
As part of anti-fraud measures, **AI-Bay** must report users‚Äô transaction histories annually to the tax authorities when the following conditions apply:  

- Provision of a service (e.g., vacation rentals)  
- Sale of consumer goods between individuals  
- From the first euro earned during the year  

When, within a calendar year, the user has:  
- Completed at least 30 transactions and/or  
- Earned ‚Ç¨2,000 or more  

**Note:** The transmission of information to the tax authorities does not necessarily mean the user will be taxed.

faq_body:
When making an online purchase using secure payment, you are charged once the seller confirms the item‚Äôs availability. Your funds are then held securely until you confirm that the received item matches the description.

To benefit from it:

faq_title: **Title:** Understanding the DSP2 Regulation That Secures Online Transactions
faq_body:
What is PSD2?  
How to authenticate a payment on AI-Bay?  
Are all purchases affected?  

**What is PSD2?**  
Effective since May 2021, the European Payment Services Directive 2 (PSD2) is a new regulation designed to enhance payment security.  
Its goal? To make online transactions safer and reduce fraud by introducing a new 3-D Secure standard. Each online payment must be authenticated using at least two of the following factors:  

- Entering a personal password  
- Verifying ownership of the device  
- Identification through biometric data (fingerprint, facial recognition, etc.)  

**How to authenticate a payment on AI-Bay?**  
What does this mean for your purchases? In most cases, authentication works as follows:  
‚úî You make a purchase on the AI-Bay website or app.  
‚úî You open your mobile banking app.  
‚úî You confirm the payment by entering a password or using fingerprint recognition.  
‚úî The payment is validated, and you return to AI-Bay.  

*Note:* This system complements SMS authentication, which only verified one of the three factors (device ownership).  

**Are all purchases affected?**  
Some transactions are not subject to PSD2:  

- Low-risk transactions: when the bank considers the buyer‚Äôs fraud rate low and the payment solution has an effective risk analysis system.  
- Recurring or split payments (of a fixed amount), after the first payment.  
- Payments under ‚Ç¨30: limited to 5 consecutive transactions and a total of ‚Ç¨100 per day.  
- Phone sales.  
- Transactions outside the Eurozone.  
- Payments made through corporate channels, such as travel agencies.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Use the Media Block
faq_body:
You can add a custom block to your Pro Page to share information, promote a special offer, include a link to your videos, provide a pricing table, and more.  

**Steps:**  
1. Log in to your professional account.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your Professional Space.  
3. Click on the ‚ÄúMedia‚Äù block.  
4. Add an image (required), a title, and a link.  

We recommend using a wide image for the best display on your page.  
You can remove content by clearing the title and link fields and deleting the image using the small orange cross at the top right of the image.  

Save your changes. Your custom block will appear on your page within a few minutes.  

*Note:* Accepted formats are jpg, jpeg, and png, with a maximum file size of 8 MB.  
For best results, use a wide photo. Ideal dimensions: 675px width, 438px maximum height.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Reset My Password
faq_body:
**To reset your password:**  
‚úî First, make sure to log out of all devices or browsers where your account is currently connected ‚Äî this step is important.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSign in‚Äù from the homepage.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúForgot password.‚Äù  
‚úî Enter the email address linked to your AI-Bay account in the Email field.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúContinue.‚Äù  
‚úî An email containing a verification code will be sent to the address provided. For security reasons, the code is valid for 2 hours. After that, you‚Äôll need to restart the password reset process. We never send your password by email.  
‚úî Enter the code you received and set your new password. It must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one number and one letter, and no more than 50 characters.  

*Note:* If you don‚Äôt receive the verification code, check your spam folder. To prevent our emails from being marked as spam, please add ‚Äúno.reply@ai-bay.fr‚Äù to your address book.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Seller: How Long Does It Take for My Funds to Be Transferred to My Bank Account?
faq_body:
Your withdrawal request is processed by AI-Bay within 24 business hours.  
Your funds are then transferred to your bank account via bank transfer, which typically takes 24 to 48 business hours.  
In total, your funds should arrive in your bank account within a maximum of 72 business hours.  

For transactions over ‚Ç¨2,000, the delay may be slightly longer while your bank performs compliance checks. This may add about 24 additional business hours, depending on your bank.  

Here‚Äôs an estimate to help you determine when your funds should arrive (first day = transfer initiation, second day = latest expected arrival on your AI-Bay account):  

- Transfer on Monday ‚Üí arrival by Thursday  
- Transfer on Tuesday ‚Üí arrival by Friday  
- Transfer on Wednesday ‚Üí arrival by the following Monday  
- Transfer on Thursday ‚Üí arrival by the following Tuesday  
- Transfer on Friday ‚Üí arrival by the following Wednesday  
- Transfer on Saturday ‚Üí arrival by the following Thursday  
- Transfer on Sunday ‚Üí arrival by the following Thursday

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How to Cancel a Reservation
faq_body:
**Important:** You cannot cancel a reservation less than 24 hours before it begins.  

Cancellation will result in a refund of the deposit, service fees, tourist tax, and any optional insurance purchased by the traveler within 48 business hours after cancellation.  
For more details: see ‚ÄúWhat are the cancellation conditions?‚Äù  

**Cancel a reservation from the calendar:**  
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account and go to your Listings.  
2. Click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button for the listing you‚Äôre interested in.  
3. On the calendar, select the reservation you want to cancel, then click ‚ÄúCancel reservation.‚Äù  

**Cancel a reservation from the reservations dashboard:**  
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account and go to your Listings.  
2. Click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button for the relevant listing.  
3. Then go to ‚ÄúMy reservations.‚Äù  
4. Open the ‚ÄúConfirmed reservations‚Äù tab.  
5. Select the reservation you want to cancel, then click ‚ÄúCancel reservation.‚Äù

faq_title: **How do I enable or disable messaging notifications?**
faq_body:
The AI-Bay service will notify you of any new messages (on your mobile) and/or send an email to the address you provided when creating your account.  
By default, you receive notifications for new messages both by email and mobile notifications.  

To manage your messaging notifications:  
‚úî Log in to your account and click on ‚ÄúAccount‚Äù  
‚úî In the "Notifications" section, click the icons to enable or disable notifications. There are two types of alerts: via the mobile app (smartphone icon) or via your email inbox (envelope icon).  

To enable message notifications:  

To disable message notifications:  

Note: To adjust other AI-Bay notifications, go to your mobile device settings.  

**I‚Äôm not receiving email notifications**  
It‚Äôs possible that your email provider is filtering messages and marking them as spam or junk. Check these folders in your mailbox. If you find an AI-Bay email there, mark it as safe so it won‚Äôt be treated as spam in the future.  

If you‚Äôve activated email notifications and your address belongs to one of these domains ‚Äî Orange, Microsoft, Hotmail, Outlook, Live, or MSN ‚Äî you may not receive all emails from our platform.  

Some email providers require you to add senders to an approved contacts list. We recommend adding AI-Bay to that list.  

You can find instructions for Outlook at this link, and for Orange mail at this link.  
If the issue persists, contact your email or internet service provider for further assistance.

faq_title: **Buyer: How can I rate my seller?**
faq_body:
Once the transaction is complete (via secure payment), you can rate your seller. Here‚Äôs how:  
‚úî Go to the secure messaging area and select the conversation you‚Äôre interested in. An automatic message will invite you to rate your seller ‚Äî click ‚ÄúContinue.‚Äù  
‚úî Answer the following questions by giving a rating from 1 to 5 stars (5 being the best):  

- Was the communication smooth?  
- Was the product as described?  
- Was the package properly packed?  
- Would you recommend this seller?  

If you don‚Äôt leave a review within 15 days, an automatic rating will be assigned.  

The stars displayed on the seller‚Äôs profile represent the average of all ratings received from previous transactions. One star means users do not recommend the seller, while five stars mean they highly recommend them.  

Once your review is submitted, it will be published within a maximum of 15 days after the online transaction.  

For your review to be published:  
‚úî Both the seller and the buyer must validate their transaction review.  
‚úî If one party doesn‚Äôt validate within 14 days, the other‚Äôs review will be automatically confirmed once the transaction is considered complete.  

**Important:** Once your review is submitted, it cannot be modified. In case of a dispute, rating your seller is not possible.  

For more information, please visit our dedicated page on User Review Rules.

faq_title: **Traveler: What information is required from the host to verify their identity?**
faq_body:
The host provides AI-Bay with identity information such as an ID card or passport.  
The host‚Äôs identity document is securely transmitted to our payment partner, Adyen, which verifies its authenticity.  

However, only AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is authorized to handle any requests related to identity verification or user payment matters.  
Therefore, please do not contact Adyen directly, as they are not able to respond to AI-Bay user inquiries.  

This document is strictly confidential and is not stored by AI-Bay.  

The host also provides AI-Bay with their bank account details. We verify that the host‚Äôs bank account is based in France before enabling online booking.

faq_title: **What is the response time for accepting a booking request?**
faq_body:
When a traveler sends a booking request, the host has 72 hours to accept or decline it.  
After the booking request is made, only a payment authorization is placed on the traveler‚Äôs account.  

If the host does not respond within 72 hours, the request automatically expires and no charge is made.  
If the host declines the request, no charge is made.  
If the host accepts the request, the deposit payment is processed.

faq_body: To learn about our posting rules, prohibited items, and the mandatory information you must provide, click here.

faq_title: **Title:** What rules must my listing follow?
faq_body:
Note: To review all the rules related to posting an ad, please consult our Posting Rules.

**Ad Categorization**  
**Ad Title and Description**  
**Duplicate Ads**  
**Photos**  
**Item Location**  
**Prohibited Products**

### Ad Categorization
Your ad must be placed in the category that matches the type of item you‚Äôre selling. Categories will be suggested when you post, but you can also choose from the full list of families and their associated categories:

**Vacations**

**Real Estate**

**Fashion**

**Home**  
- Furniture

**Multimedia**  
- Computers

**Leisure**

- CDs & Music  
- Books

- Musical Instruments  
- Collectibles  
- Games & Toys  
- Wine & Gastronomy  

**Animals**  
- Animals  

**Professional Equipment**  
- Agricultural Equipment  
- Transport & Handling  
- Construction & Heavy Work  
- Tools & Building Materials  
- Industrial Equipment  
- Catering & Hospitality  
- Office Supplies  
- Shops & Markets  
- Medical Equipment  

**Services**  
- Service Offers  
- Ticketing  
- Events  
- Private Lessons  
- Carpooling  

**Miscellaneous**  
- Miscellaneous  

---

### Ad Title and Description
Your ad content must follow these rules:

- The ad must be written in French (legal requirement under law n¬∞94-345 of August 4, 1994).  
- It must relate directly to the product, item, or service offered.  
- Avoid excessive use of keywords.  
- Do not redirect to another website other than **AI-Bay.fr** (directly or indirectly).  
- Do not include a phone number or email address (in the title, description, or photos).  
- Do not include premium-rate phone numbers.  
- Do not contain any sectarian, discriminatory, or sexist content, or references to organizations or individuals responsible for crimes against humanity.  

---

### Duplicate Ads
You cannot post the same ad multiple times on the site. Each ad must have a unique title, description, and photos (except in specific cases detailed in the Posting Rules where duplicates are allowed).  
If you need to sell the same product multiple times, you must do so one sale at a time, with a new ad each time.

---

### Photos
Photos must be in GIF, BMP, PNG, or JPEG format and ideally under 1200 KB. They must illustrate your item and not be reused from another of your ads.  
Photos containing the following elements are not accepted and may prevent your ad from being posted:

- Minors  
- Logos alone (except in the Jobs and Services categories)  
- Links to websites or QR codes  
- Phone numbers or email addresses  
- Images unrelated to the offer  
- Pornography or nudity  

---

### Item Location
Your ad must be located in the town where the item is physically located, even if you offer delivery across France.

---

### Prohibited Products
Certain products or services are not allowed on the site (non-exhaustive list):

- Tobacco, drugs, and related items; dangerous or illegal substances  
- Cosmetics, medicines, and pharmacy products  
- Combat or self-defense weapons, firearms, explosives, hunting traps  
- Adult content (pornography, nudity, etc.)  
- Protected or endangered plant and animal species, or those taken from the wild  
- Parts or derivatives of endangered/protected species (e.g., ivory)  
- Deposit items  
- Requests for private or humanitarian donations  
- Offers that may lead to questionable practices  
- Missing person notices  
- Most mass-produced consumer goods  
- Slimming, dietary supplement, or ‚Äúmiracle‚Äù products  
- Counterfeit goods  
- Items bearing protected emblems  
- Products or services infringing intellectual property rights  
- Illegal job or service offers  

---

**Note:** All new product ads posted by professionals in the following categories will be refused: Multimedia, Home, Fashion, Leisure (except Animals).  
A ‚Äúnew product‚Äù is defined as any item that has never been sold before, except for handcrafted goods, clearance items (unsold, returned, or factory outlet products), and display models sold by professionals.

faq_title: **Title:** Someone contacted me even though I didn‚Äôt post any listings
faq_body:
If you receive calls, emails, or text messages about ads you did not post on the site, please contact our team using the ‚ÄúSend a Request‚Äù link at the bottom of this article.  
To help us process your request efficiently, please provide the contact details used (phone number, email address, SIREN).  
Our agents will then be able to act quickly on the affected ads.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I view my saved searches?
faq_body:
To view your saved searches, log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
Logging into your account allows you to access all your saved searches across all your devices.

- From the **AI-Bay** website: click on ‚ÄúMy Searches.‚Äù  
- From the **AI-Bay** app: click on ‚ÄúFavorites,‚Äù then select the ‚ÄúMy Searches‚Äù tab.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: how do I pick up my parcel with Relais Colis?
faq_body:
### Receiving Your Parcel
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a message when your parcel is available at the selected pickup point. Delivery usually takes 3 to 5 business days.  
‚úî Go to the pickup point.  
‚úî Present your ID to the merchant (ID card, passport, or driver‚Äôs license).  
‚úî Collect your parcel and sign for it.  
‚úî Confirm receipt of the parcel in your **AI-Bay** app.  
‚úî After checking the contents, confirm that the item matches the description in your **AI-Bay** app.

---

### The Item Is Damaged
**Step 1: Check the parcel upon receipt**  
When collecting your parcel, you must check its external condition. If you notice any issue before opening (damaged, torn, poorly packed, etc.), you can refuse the parcel at the pickup point.  
If you still accept it, please open a dispute with our support team and send photos of the parcel (outside, inside) and the damaged product.

**Step 2: File a claim via your AI-Bay app**  
If you notice an issue when opening the parcel, open a dispute through your **AI-Bay** app to temporarily block your payment. **AI-Bay** will then open an investigation with the delivery partner.

---

### Can Someone Else Pick Up My Parcel?
Yes, you can authorize a trusted person to collect the parcel on your behalf. They must bring their ID, your ID, and a written authorization.

---

### How Long Is My Parcel Held?
The pickup point will hold your parcel for 8 calendar days. After that, it will be returned to the seller.

faq_title: **Title:** The DAC7 report
faq_body:
### Important Information ‚Äì Annual Sales Reports
Dear users,  
We have identified some irregularities in certain annual sales reports. Our teams are analyzing them to provide you with corrected reports as soon as possible. Please be patient.  
The corrections will also be sent to the DGFiP to update your tax declarations.  
We apologize for the inconvenience.  
**AI-Bay Customer Service**

---

### General Information
**Who is affected by this directive?**  
**I buy a lot of second-hand goods ‚Äî am I impacted by this law?**  
**Do I already have to pay taxes on my sales?**  
**What data is shared, with whom, and when?**  
**Where can I find my tax identification number?**  
**How do I provide my tax number?**  
**What happens if I don‚Äôt complete the DAC7 form?**  
**Where can I find my transaction history?**

---

### General Information
The DAC7 directive is a European Union (EU) tax directive requiring online platforms to report information about their members‚Äô sales and income to tax authorities.  
**AI-Bay** is legally required to collect and share certain income and seller information with tax authorities for users who meet specific conditions. If you are affected, you‚Äôll be asked to provide your taxpayer details and confirm your personal information by completing a DAC7 form.  
More details are available in the section ‚ÄúWhat data is shared, with whom, and when?‚Äù  
This directive has been in effect since January 1, 2023, and reports must be submitted annually. The first report is due by January 31, 2024 (for the 2023 calendar year).

*(Council Directive (EU) 2021/514 of March 22, 2021, amending Directive 2011/16/EU on administrative cooperation in the field of taxation. France applies this directive under Articles 1649b A to 1649b E of the General Tax Code.)*

---

**Important Note:**  
This concerns sales only. The number of ads you post does not matter. Only completed transactions on our platform are reported.  
If you do not use **AI-Bay‚Äôs** secure payment system, you don‚Äôt need to take any action for now.

---

### Who Is Affected by This Directive?
**Sales of Goods**  
You are affected as a seller if, in 2023 or 2024, you meet one of the following conditions:  
- At least 30 completed transactions and/or  
- ‚Ç¨2,000 or more in earnings.  

We will contact you if you meet these conditions. You‚Äôll receive an email and a notification on **AI-Bay** with next steps and additional information required.  
Once the data has been transmitted to the tax authorities, we‚Äôll inform you again about the scope and content of the data shared.

**Note:** If you don‚Äôt meet these conditions, no further information is required from you.

**Vacation Rentals**  
This directive also applies to users earning income from short-term accommodation rentals, regardless of the number of rentals or total income.  
We‚Äôll inform you of the next steps and any additional information needed.  
When the data is transmitted to the tax authorities, you‚Äôll again be notified of the scope and content of the data shared.

---

### I Buy a Lot of Second-Hand Goods ‚Äî Am I Impacted?
No. This only applies to sellers. No buyer information will be transmitted.

---

### Do I Already Have to Pay Taxes on My Sales?
You may not owe taxes on your sales ‚Äî it depends on your situation.  
Even if you meet the thresholds and your data is shared with tax authorities, this does not necessarily affect your personal tax obligations. You are only taxed on profits ‚Äî that is, if you sell an item for more than you originally paid.  
For more details, consult your local tax authority or an independent tax advisor.

---

### What Data Is Shared, With Whom, and When?
This data will be sent to the French tax authorities, and we‚Äôll notify you when it happens.  
The information remains valid for at least 36 months. After that, we‚Äôll ask you to confirm or update it.  

**Data shared includes:**  
*For individuals:*  
- First and last name  
- Address  
- Tax Identification Number (TIN)  
- Date of birth  

*For professionals:*  
- Legal and trade name  
- Business address  
- SIREN  
- VAT number (or SIREN/SIRET)  

*For property rentals (individuals and professionals):*  
- Property address  
- Land registration number  
- Number of rental days  

Reports are submitted annually by January 31 for the previous calendar year.  
You‚Äôll receive a copy of the data sent by email.  
Rest assured, **AI-Bay** only collects and transmits the data required by DAC7 to the tax authorities.

---

### Where Can I Find My Tax Identification Number?
The TIN (Tax Identification Number) is issued by the French tax administration to every taxpayer.  
**Authority:** Direction G√©n√©rale des Finances Publiques (DGFiP)  
**Format:** 01 23 456 789 012 (13 digits)  
You can find it on your income tax return or tax notice ‚Äî it appears at the top of the first page.

---

### How Do I Provide My Tax Number?
If you meet the eligibility criteria, our team will notify you via:  
- Informational emails  
- Information banners displayed on the **AI-Bay** website and app (homepage, ‚ÄúMy Account,‚Äù and wallet pages)  

When you see this message, click ‚ÄúProvide My Information‚Äù to access the form.

**Important:** To access the DAC7 form, make sure your identity verification (KYC) is complete. Once verified, you‚Äôll see the banner and can enter your tax number.

---

### What Happens If I Don‚Äôt Complete the DAC7 Form?
We‚Äôll send several reminders to complete the DAC7 form when required.  
If you fail to do so after reminders (or don‚Äôt provide your information at all) before year-end, we‚Äôll have to restrict your **AI-Bay** account access:  
- You won‚Äôt be able to withdraw money from your wallet.  
- You won‚Äôt be able to use your wallet balance for purchases on **AI-Bay**.  
- If your account is deleted, you won‚Äôt be able to access **AI-Bay** services or create a new account.  

You can regain full access by providing the required DAC7 information.

---

### Where Can I Find My Transaction History?
You can view your transactions under: **My Account > My Transactions**

**Important:**  
This applies only to completed transactions made since January 1, 2023, and for each calendar year thereafter. Previous sales will not appear in any tax authority report.

faq_title: **Title:** Traveler: What to Do in Case of a Problem?
faq_body:
If you have questions about your reservation or experience issues communicating with your host, our team is here to help.  

**Before your stay begins**  

**Your reservation request has not yet been accepted**  
Once your reservation request is submitted, the host has 72 hours to accept it. After this period, if the host takes no action, the reservation is automatically canceled. In that case, your deposit will not be charged.  
You can then look for another accommodation‚Äîconsider choosing recommended hosts and checking their profile reviews.  

**Your reservation request has been accepted**  
If you need assistance before your arrival:  
- Review the reservation details and listing information‚Äîyour answer may already be there!  
- For more details about the booking process, check the ‚ÄúHow It Works‚Äù and ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a Traveler‚Äù sections of the FAQ.  
- Contact the host through the secure messaging system. If they don‚Äôt respond, try reaching them by phone or email (if you have their contact details).  
- If the host still doesn‚Äôt respond and you need further help preparing for your stay, please contact our customer service (Monday to Friday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.).  
If your stay is managed by Locasun (a brand of the AI-Bay group), contact the dedicated service here.  

**Upon arrival**  
If you encounter a problem when you arrive, please refer to the article ‚ÄúWhat to do if there‚Äôs a problem upon arrival?‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How to Verify My ID to Receive My Payment?
faq_body:
**Procedure**  
**Requirements for your ID document**  
**How are my documents verified?**  

**Procedure**  
Once you reach a certain transaction amount, identity verification is required. To complete it:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî A banner (visible on the AI-Bay homepage and in your account) will indicate that additional information is needed to receive your payment. Click ‚ÄúReceive my payment.‚Äù  
‚úî A window will open prompting you to upload an ID document (identity card or passport). Add your files and click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù  

Once submitted, your document will be reviewed by our payment partner as soon as possible. After verification, your payment will be automatically processed.  

**Requirements for your ID document**  
To be approved, your ID must meet the following conditions:  
‚úî Valid and not expired  
‚úî In color only  
‚úî Front and back in separate files (for ID cards)  
‚úî Clear (no blur) and unedited  
‚úî No glare  
‚úî No watermark  
‚úî Not cropped‚Äîleave a visible margin around the document (all four corners must be visible)  
‚úî File size between 100 KB and 7 MB (low-resolution files cannot be read)  
‚úî No hidden data  
‚úî Accepted formats: PDF, JPEG, JPG, or PNG  
‚úî The ID or bank statement must be authentic (not forged or altered)  
‚úî The ID must be official (social security, health insurance, or student cards are not accepted)  

**How are my documents verified?**  
Your identity documents are processed by a payment service provider called Adyen.  
For the collection and verification of this information, AI-Bay acts solely as a technical service provider, allowing users to submit, modify, or update their information for Adyen through the AI-Bay website.  
The checks performed by Adyen are separate and independent from any verification AI-Bay may conduct as part of your use of the AI-Bay platform, in accordance with AI-Bay‚Äôs Terms of Service.  

However, AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is the only point of contact authorized to handle identity verification and payment inquiries for users.  
Therefore, please do not contact Adyen directly, as they are not able to respond to AI-Bay users.  

**Note:** Once Adyen receives your information, it is verified and stored. AI-Bay is neither responsible for nor involved in collecting or verifying this data.  

For more details, you can consult the ‚ÄúUser Information Notice ‚Äì Secure Payment Service by Adyen.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: Where Can I Find My Transaction Number?
faq_body:
The transaction number can be found in your AI-Bay account:  
‚úî Log in using your email and password.  
‚úî From your account homepage, click on ‚ÄúTransactions.‚Äù  
‚úî You‚Äôll see a list of your transactions (only the last 50 are displayed). Click on the one you‚Äôre interested in.  
‚úî The transaction number appears in the ‚ÄúTransaction Number‚Äù section. You can easily copy it by clicking ‚ÄúCopy to clipboard.‚Äù  

**Note:** To help us process your requests more efficiently, please include your transaction number in any communication with customer service regarding a secure payment transaction.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Change My Password?
faq_body:
To change your password:  

1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúLogin and Security.‚Äù  
3. In the ‚ÄúPassword‚Äù section, enter your new password, then your current one.  
4. Click ‚ÄúChange my password.‚Äù  
5. You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email once your password has been updated.  

You can also log out from all devices where you‚Äôre currently signed in by checking the corresponding box.  

**Important:** If you receive a password change confirmation email but did not initiate the change, we strongly recommend resetting your password immediately and logging out from all devices to secure your account. Follow the steps provided here.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How Much Does the Delivery Service with Colissimo Cost?
faq_body:
**Colissimo Delivery Rates**

Delivery fees are charged to the buyer. To view the delivery fee rates, please refer to our terms and conditions for Colissimo offers and services when using the AI-Bay website.  
The Colissimo delivery service via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system can be used for parcels up to 30 kg, depending on the category of the item you are selling.

**Conditions to Follow**  
We recommend entering the correct weight of your item to offer an accurate shipping price to your buyers and to avoid any refusal when dropping off your parcel. If your parcel does not match the declared postage weight, it may be rejected by the carrier.

**Important:** If you did not specify the item‚Äôs weight when posting your ad, the Colissimo shipping fee will default to a flat rate of ‚Ç¨7.95 for 1 kg.

**Good to Know**  
- To use Colissimo delivery, your item‚Äôs price must not exceed ‚Ç¨400.  
- Check which categories are eligible for Colissimo delivery.  
- The longest side of the parcel must not exceed 100 cm, OR the total of width + length + height must not exceed 150 cm.  
- To use Colissimo‚Äôs mailbox delivery option, your parcel must fit inside your mailbox, which must be accessible to the postal worker and equipped with a lock they can open (as is the case if you‚Äôve previously received a Colissimo parcel).  
If you wish to send a parcel over 30 kg and/or exceeding these dimensions, we recommend choosing personalized delivery. You can find La Poste‚Äôs various shipping rates and a guide to preparing your shipment here.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: How to Deposit Funds in Preparation for a Vehicle Purchase?
faq_body:
**Secure Vehicle Payment Process**

The secure payment for a vehicle takes place in two steps:

1. Depositing the funds into the AI-Bay secure account.  
2. Transferring the funds from the AI-Bay secure account to the seller.

To deposit funds into your AI-Bay secure account, simply make a bank transfer from your personal account to the AI-Bay bank details (RIB) provided through the secure messaging system via the ‚ÄúDeposit my funds‚Äù button.  
This information is sent once the seller confirms the vehicle‚Äôs availability and you validate your purchase.

**Note:** The BIC will always be MPAYFRP1XXX, and the IBAN will always begin with FR. If you receive a RIB by email, it is a fraud attempt.

You will receive a notification via secure messaging once your funds have been successfully transferred (the transfer may take up to 4 business days).

**Note:** You can make one or several transfers to this RIB to reach the exact amount agreed with the seller. You can also recover all or part of the funds in case of cancellation or renegotiation.

faq_title: **Title:** I Received an Email About a Change to My IBAN
faq_body:
**Email Confirmation for IBAN Validation or Modification**

This email is sent to you to:  
‚úî Confirm the validation of your IBAN in your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Confirm the modification of your IBAN in your AI-Bay account when you initiated the change.

**I Did Not Modify My IBAN**  
If you did not request this modification, please contact our support team as soon as possible so they can take action on your account.  
You can also refer to the article ‚ÄúMy account has been hacked, what should I do?‚Äù

**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website [17cyber.gouv.fr](https://www.17cyber.gouv.fr).

faq_title: **Title:** How to Find Your Booking Reference?
faq_body:
**Finding Your Booking Reference**

You can find your booking reference in the booking confirmation email that was sent to you.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Block a User?
faq_body:
**Handling Suspicious Messages and Reporting Offenses**

**Note:** If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website [17cyber.gouv.fr](https://www.17cyber.gouv.fr).

If you receive a suspicious message during your exchanges, the messaging interface allows you to block a user. You will no longer receive messages from them, but the blocked user will still have access to the conversation history and your listings.

**From Your Computer**  
‚úî Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúMessages.‚Äù  
‚úî Select the conversation with the user you want to block.  
‚úî Click the icon next to the user‚Äôs name.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúBlock this user.‚Äù

**From Your iOS Mobile Device**  
‚úî From your message list: swipe the conversation to the left and tap ‚ÄúBlock.‚Äù  
‚úî From within the conversation: tap ‚ÄúMore‚Äù at the top right, then select ‚ÄúBlock this user.‚Äù

**From Your Android Mobile Device**  
‚úî From your message list: tap the menu icon, then select ‚ÄúBlock user.‚Äù  
‚úî From within the conversation: open the top-right menu, then tap ‚ÄúBlock user.‚Äù

**Note:** You can unblock a user by following the same steps and selecting ‚ÄúUnblock user.‚Äù

**Reporting an Offense to the Defender of Rights**  
The Defender of Rights is a French public institution that combats discrimination and promotes access to justice for victims.  
You can contact the Defender of Rights if you believe you have been discriminated against. The alleged offender may be an individual or an organization, a private entity (such as a company) or a public body (such as a government service or local authority).  
You can file a report directly through this [link](https://www.defenseurdesdroits.fr) to contact the Defender of Rights.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I view my saved listings?
faq_body:
Saving a listing allows you to store ads and view them anytime.  
To find your saved listings, log in to your personal AI-Bay account using your email and password, then:  

**From the AI-Bay website:** click on ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù at the top of the page.  

**From the app:** tap on ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù at the bottom of the page.  

**Note:** If a listing is no longer active on the site, it will automatically disappear from your saved selection.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô The Autoviza Vehicle History Report for Car Listings
faq_body:
**What is the vehicle history report?**  

**How can I generate my history report as a private seller?**  
- When posting your listing  
- Through messaging, following a potential buyer‚Äôs request  

**Why isn‚Äôt the history report available to me?**  

**How can I generate my history report as a professional seller?**  

---

### What is the vehicle history report?  
The vehicle history report is a digital document that provides detailed information about a vehicle‚Äôs past to promote transparency when buying a used car. It is accessible directly from the vehicle‚Äôs listing and includes:  
- The number of previous owners  
- Verification of the vehicle‚Äôs existence  
- Available mileage records  

**Note:** Generating a history report is a free option.  

---

### How to generate my history report as a private seller  
For private sellers, sharing your vehicle‚Äôs history report is optional.  
To generate your report, you must provide:  
- The vehicle‚Äôs registration number  
- The last three digits of the VIN (found on the registration certificate)  

You can generate your report in two ways:  

**1. When posting your listing**  
To access the history report generator, you must first enter the vehicle‚Äôs registration number in your listing details. After publishing, a window will appear asking for the last three digits of the VIN.  
The report will then be automatically generated and displayed on your listing as a link.  

If you later decide not to make it public, you can remove it anytime by managing your listing.  
If you prefer not to display the report, simply click ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not interested.‚Äù  

**2. Through messaging after a buyer‚Äôs request**  
If you didn‚Äôt generate the report when posting your listing, a ‚ÄúRequest report from seller‚Äù button will appear for potential buyers.  
When a user clicks this button, you‚Äôll receive a notification in your messages. You can then enter the last three digits of the VIN to generate the report, which will be added to your listing and visible to everyone.  

---

### Why isn‚Äôt the history report available to me?  
If the page to generate your report doesn‚Äôt appear, possible reasons include:  
- You haven‚Äôt entered the vehicle‚Äôs registration number  
- The vehicle has a foreign registration  
- The vehicle is too old  

---

### How to generate my history report as a professional seller  
For professional sellers, the history report is automatically generated when posting a listing for vehicles or utility models. You simply need to include the vehicle‚Äôs registration number in your listing details.
