faq_title: **Title:** How can I access the annual report of my completed transactions on AI-Bay?
faq_body:
To access your annual income report from sales or bookings made on AI-Bay:  

1. Click on the link **‚ÄúView my annual report.‚Äù**  
2. Log in to your account to access the report.  

The report provides a summary of the number of online transactions completed on our site, detailing the total amount of sales and/or bookings made during the previous year.  

For information about your potential tax and social obligations, please refer to the official websites of the tax administration and URSSAF.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: Where can I find a summary of my purchases?
faq_body:
You can access your list of purchases made through secure payment from your account:  

‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on **‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù** from your account homepage.  
‚úî You‚Äôll then see a list of your most recent transactions (only the last 50 are displayed).  

Transactions are divided into two tabs: **Purchases** and **Sales.**

faq_title: **Title:** What is the validity period of credits?
faq_body:
**Validity Period of Credits**  
All credits purchased through your professional account are valid for 6 months from the date of purchase (see the General Terms and Conditions of Sale).  
After 6 months, the credits are automatically removed from your account and cannot be refunded.  

**Check the Expiration Date of Your Credits**  
From your account, you can view the expiration date for each batch of credits:  

1. Log in using your credentials.  
2. Go to the ‚ÄúBalance‚Äù tab.  
3. Your remaining balance and the corresponding expiration date for each credit purchase will be displayed.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I add the list of services or benefits?
faq_body:
**Setting Up and Displaying Your List of Services/Benefits**  
Professionals in the Real Estate, Vehicles, and Employment categories who have a Pro Page can configure and display the list of services, offerings, or benefits their business provides.  

1. Log in to your professional account.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúPro Page‚Äù tab in your Professional Space.  
3. Click on the ‚ÄúList of Services/Benefits‚Äù section.  
4. Select the items you wish to display.  
5. Save your changes ‚Äî the list will appear on your page within a few minutes.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: how do I add my IBAN?
faq_body:
**When Can I Add My IBAN?**  
**Steps to Add My IBAN**  
**Can a Sale Occur Before Adding My IBAN?**  
**How Are My Documents Verified?**  

**When Can I Add My IBAN?**  
If you sell consumer goods, you can enter your IBAN after posting your first listing. You can modify it at any time ‚Äî see the related article for detailed steps.  
Providing your IBAN is necessary to receive payments for your sales directly to your bank account. You can add it in advance or wait until your first sale.  

**Important:** If you are selling a used vehicle, your IBAN can only be added once the buyer has made the transfer to the AI-Bay bank account. This is a security measure designed to protect AI-Bay users. The detailed process is explained in the related article.  

**Steps to Add My IBAN**  
*Adding an IBAN via the AI-Bay website*  
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account and go to your account homepage.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù  
3. Enter your IBAN in the designated field and click ‚ÄúSave.‚Äù  

*Adding an IBAN via the AI-Bay app*  
1. Open your AI-Bay app.  
2. Tap ‚ÄúMy Account.‚Äù  
3. In ‚ÄúSettings,‚Äù select ‚ÄúPayment Methods.‚Äù  
4. Tap ‚ÄúAdd My IBAN.‚Äù  
5. Enter your IBAN and click ‚ÄúSave.‚Äù  

**Information:** IBANs linked to a Trade Republic account are not valid on the AI-Bay platform.  

**Can a Sale Occur Before Adding My IBAN?**  
If you‚Äôve chosen secure payment, not having an IBAN yet does not block the sale. This means a buyer can still make a payment on one of your listings even if your IBAN hasn‚Äôt been entered.  
When this happens, an orange dot appears on your profile icon, and a banner will show on your account (or in the ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù section of your app). Click ‚ÄúReceive My Payment‚Äù to provide your banking details.  
Once your information is processed, your payment will be transferred directly to the registered bank account.  

**How Are My Documents Verified?**  
Bank identity documents are managed by a payment service provider called Adyen.  
For the collection and verification of this information, AI-Bay acts solely as a technical service provider, allowing users to fill in, modify, and/or update their information provided to Adyen via the AI-Bay website.  
The checks performed by Adyen are separate and independent from any checks AI-Bay may conduct as part of your use of the AI-Bay platform and its services, in accordance with AI-Bay‚Äôs Terms and Conditions.  
However, AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is the only point of contact authorized to handle requests related to identity verification and payment of sales on the site.  
Therefore, our partner Adyen should not be contacted directly, as it cannot respond to AI-Bay users.  

**Note:** Once Adyen receives your information, it is verified and stored. AI-Bay is neither responsible for nor involved in collecting or verifying this data.  

For more details, you can consult the ‚ÄúUser Information Notice‚Äù for Adyen‚Äôs Secure Payment Service.

faq_title: **Title:** What does the ‚ÄúHealth measures‚Äù label mean?
faq_body:
**Health Measures Label**  
You may see the ‚ÄúHealth Measures‚Äù label on listings from professionals in the ‚ÄúVacation‚Äù category.  
This label indicates that the professional has implemented a strict and supervised health protocol to protect both staff and clients.  
AI-Bay encourages all accommodation professionals to take part in ensuring you can fully enjoy your holidays under the best possible conditions.  

The ‚ÄúHealth Measures‚Äù label and its associated icon cover two types of protocols implemented by accommodation providers:  
- Health certifications granted by independent certification organizations  
- Health charters created and issued by hotel chains  

This label will appear on professional ‚ÄúVacation‚Äù listings with the following message:  

**Health Measures:** The host has implemented enhanced health measures to ensure your safety. Learn more.  

**Health Labels and Charters**  
Below is a list of various labels and charters established by professionals committed to providing a safer stay.  
This list is updated regularly based on the declarations we receive from these professionals.  
Click on the labels or charters to view their descriptions:  

**Labels:**  
- ALLSAFE (Accor Hotels x Bureau Veritas)  
- B&B SOCOTEC (B&B Hotels x Socotec)  

**Charters:**  
- Brit Hotel Hygiene Charter  
- ‚ÄúFor a Safer Stay‚Äù Charter (Logis Hotel, Citotel, Urban Style, Ch√¢teaux & Demeures, Auberges de Pays)  
- FNHPA Protocol (outdoor hospitality, camping chains, or independent campsites)  
- Camping Clean Care  
- FNAIM Protocol  
- Cl√©vacances = O2Care Services

faq_title: **Title:** What is the ‚ÄúRecent Used‚Äù badge?
faq_body:
**Recent Vehicle Badge**  
This badge helps you simplify your car searches by quickly identifying recent used vehicles sold by professionals.  

It is automatically assigned to listings in the ‚ÄúCars‚Äù category posted by professional sellers if the vehicle meets the following criteria:  
- Maximum mileage of 10,000 km  
- First registration date within the past year  

The badge appears in your search results as well as on listings that meet these criteria.

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: What is the ‚ÄúAI-Bay Bank Details‚Äù for vehicle payment?**
faq_body:
The secure AI-Bay account RIB is the bank account information where the buyer of a used vehicle deposits funds in preparation for the purchase.  
The buyer can fund this RIB by making a transfer from one of their own bank accounts.  
The funds remain held in this account until the buyer inspects the vehicle:

- If the vehicle meets their expectations, the buyer will release the funds to the seller.  
- If the vehicle does not meet their expectations, the buyer can request to have the funds returned to their bank account.

**Important:** The BIC will always be **MPAYFRP1XXX**, and the IBAN will always start with **FR**. We never send the RIB by email.

**Note:** You can make one or several transfers to this RIB to reach the exact amount agreed upon with the seller.

faq_title: **What do the error messages on Android mean?**
faq_body:
Here is a list of possible error messages on the Android mobile version of the AI-Bay app:

**Error E1**  
You have no network connection or are using a private network access.  
**How to fix it:**  
- Disable your current network connection.  
- Reconnect to a regular mobile network (4G or 3G) or a standard Wi-Fi network.  
- If you are connected through a VPN, please disable it.

**Error E3 or E99**  
Data loading error.  
**How to fix it:**  
- Go to your phone‚Äôs settings.  
- Select ‚ÄúApplications‚Äù and find **AI-Bay** in the list.  
- In the app‚Äôs storage settings, select ‚ÄúDelete data.‚Äù  
  This will remove all locally stored data from the app.  
- If the issue persists, uninstall the AI-Bay app and reinstall it.

faq_title: **Buyer: How do I confirm that I‚Äôve received my package?**
faq_body:
You have 15 days from the date the seller ships the package to confirm that you have received it. To do so:

‚úî Go to the secure AI-Bay messaging system and open the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî Click the button **‚ÄúI‚Äôve received the package or I have an issue.‚Äù**  
‚úî Then select **‚ÄúYes, I‚Äôve received the package.‚Äù**  
‚úî If you purchased from a private seller, don‚Äôt forget to confirm that the product matches the description.

**Note:** After 15 days, if you take no action, the package will automatically be considered received.  
If you haven‚Äôt received your package, please refer to: *Buyer: What should I do if I haven‚Äôt received my package?*

faq_title: **Traveler: What should I do if there‚Äôs a problem upon arrival?**
faq_body:
**Note:** For any questions before your arrival at the accommodation (host not responding, retrieving the address, etc.), please see *What to do in case of a problem?*

### Traveler Insurance Terms
When you book online with private hosts using AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system, your stay is insured.  
This insurance covers issues related to:

- **Access to the accommodation:** if you cannot access the property upon arrival, the host does not respond, the property is occupied, or it does not exist.  
- **Description of the accommodation:** if the listing contained errors (e.g., no bathroom, bed, or pool) or if the stay becomes impossible due to necessary repairs.

If a problem is discovered upon arrival:
- The deposit refund is initiated within 48 hours.  
- The insurer helps you find alternative accommodation nearby.  
- The insurer covers up to three nights in a hotel if needed, within the guaranteed limit.

### Contacting the Insurance in Case of a Problem
If you encounter an issue upon arrival, you can request assistance:

All bookings accepted from **01/07/2022** are insured by **Mutuaide**.  
To benefit from the coverage, contact Mutuaide at **01 42 93 81 20** (available 24/7), on the day of your arrival or by noon the next day if you arrived after 8 p.m.

**Note:** If you experience a problem during a stay managed by **Locasun** (a brand of the AI-Bay group), please contact the dedicated service [here].

faq_title: **How can I bump my listings to the top of the list?**
faq_body:
### What is the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option? **Subscribing to the Top of the List option** **Payment for the Top of the List option** #### What is the ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option? The ‚ÄúTop of the List‚Äù option automatically bumps your ad to the top of the search results on the website and apps, as if it had just been posted. There are four ways to move your ad to the top: | Option | Description | |--------|--------------| | **Move my ad to the top immediately** | Your ad is instantly placed at the top of the results list as if newly posted. | | **Move my ad to the top daily for 7 days** | Your ad is moved to the top every day for 7 consecutive days, at the same time you subscribed. You‚Äôll receive an email confirming your subscription and another one the day after the option expires (on the 8th day). | | **Move my ad to the top daily for 30 days** | Your ad is moved to the top every day for 30 consecutive days, at the same time you subscribed. You‚Äôll receive an email confirming your subscription, then reminders on the 8th, 15th, and 22nd days, and a final email the day before expiration (on the 29th day). | | **Move my ad to the top weekly for 60 days** | Your ad is moved to the top every week for the remaining duration of your ad (60 days*), on the anniversary date of posting.
*Unlimited for the following categories: Leisure, Home, Fashion, and Multimedia. | #### Subscribing to the Top of the List option You can subscribe to these options when posting, extending, or editing your ad. To move an ad to the top: 1. Log in to your professional account using your email and password. 2. Click on **‚ÄúMy Pro Ads.‚Äù** 3. Check the ad you want to boost and click **‚ÄúTop of the List Subscription‚Äù** (first button). #### Payment for the Top of the List option These options can be paid by credit card or with credits for users with a personal or professional account. To check the pricing (depending on the selected category): 1. Log in to your account using your email and password. 2. Click on the **‚ÄúPricing‚Äù** tab in our General Terms of Sale. 3. Select the category where you want to post your ad. The publication duration of your ad remains unchanged.

faq_title: **Title:** Someone Is Asking Me to Post an Ad for Them
faq_body:
If someone asks you to post an ad on their behalf, be cautious!  
Their account may have been hacked, and the ad is likely fraudulent ‚Äî do not proceed.  
If you have already posted the ad, please report it using the ‚ÄúReport this ad‚Äù button at the bottom of the relevant ad page.  

Note: If you believe you are a victim of cybercrime, you can perform a diagnostic and consult government recommendations on the website 17cyber.gouv.fr.

faq_title: **Title:** How Can I Find My Ad Again?
faq_body:
Note: If your ad has been rejected, unfortunately, you can no longer view or recover its content.  

**Find an ad through your account**  
1. Log in to your account.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúAds.‚Äù  
Your list of active ads will appear. If you have many, you can search by title or category.  
You can also sort your ads by posting date or price order.  

**Find an ad through the publication confirmation email**  
You can also locate an ad by clicking the link in the email you received when it was published. The email is titled ‚ÄúYour ad [ad title] is now online.‚Äù  

**Ad duration**  
Your ad remains published on the site for 60 days (except for categories such as Vacation, Leisure, Home, Fashion, and Multimedia, where ads remain visible indefinitely).  
After 60 days (about 2 months), we‚Äôll send you an email inviting you to renew your ad. The link in that email is valid for 5 days. After that, you‚Äôll need to post a new ad.  

Please note that the lifespan of your ad remains the same even if you modify it or add a paid option while it‚Äôs active. Paid options are valid for the duration of your ad and are removed when you renew it.  

**Get help**  
If you still can‚Äôt find your ad, please contact our team and provide as many details as possible about it:  
- The link  
- The title  
- The email address used when posting  
- The phone number provided when posting  
- The publication date of the ad

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How Can I Become a ‚ÄúRecommended Host‚Äù?
faq_body:
You earn the ‚ÄúRecommended Host‚Äù badge when you meet the following criteria:  

- You have accepted at least two booking requests.  
- Your acceptance rate is above 75%.  

Earning this badge helps you rank higher in search results and attract more visitors.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How Do I Confirm That the Product I Received Matches the Description?
faq_body:
If you purchased from a private seller, you have 3 days from the receipt of the package to confirm that the product or lot matches the description. To do so:  
‚úî Access the secure AI-Bay messaging system and open the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî A notification will appear asking, ‚ÄúEverything OK?‚Äù  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúYes, everything‚Äôs fine‚Äù to confirm the product or lot matches the description and finalize the transaction.  

Note: After 3 days, if you take no action, the transaction is automatically finalized and the seller is paid.  
If the item does not match the ad, please refer to: Buyer: what to do if the product (or lot) received does not match the ad?

faq_title: **Title:** How Do I Add My Business Area?
faq_body:

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How much does the delivery service by Tracked Mail cost?
faq_body:
**Tracked Mail Delivery Rates**  
Delivery costs are the responsibility of the buyer. To check delivery fees, please refer to La Poste‚Äôs shipping rate list.  

**Conditions to Meet**  
The tracked mail delivery service via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system can be used for items up to 2 kg, limited to 3 cm in thickness, and depending on the category in which you are selling your item.  
We recommend entering the correct weight of your item to offer an accurate price to buyers and avoid any refusal when dropping off your parcel. If your parcel exceeds the postage weight limit, it may be rejected by the carrier.  
To use tracked mail delivery, the item‚Äôs price must not exceed ‚Ç¨400.  

You can find the eligible categories for tracked mail delivery.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: How can I update my bank details / IBAN?
faq_body:
**Update Your Contact Information**  
You can update your banking details from your AI-Bay account:  

1. Log in to your account.  
2. Click on *Settings* and go to the *Payment Methods* tab.  
3. In the IBAN section, click *Edit*.  

Follow the on-screen steps to update your IBAN. A verification code will be sent to your email to complete the process.  

**How to Delete My IBAN?**  
*Note:* This feature is only available from a web browser. You cannot delete your IBAN from the mobile app.  

1. Log in to your account.  
2. Go to your account settings.  
3. Select the *Payment Methods* section.  
4. Click the small trash icon in the top right corner.  

**How Are My Documents Verified?**  
Your banking identity documents are managed by a payment service provider called Adyen.  
For the collection and verification of this information, AI-Bay acts solely as a technical service provider, allowing users to fill in, modify, and/or update their information provided to Adyen through the AI-Bay website.  

The checks performed by Adyen are separate and independent from any checks AI-Bay may carry out as part of your use of the AI-Bay platform and its services, in accordance with AI-Bay‚Äôs Terms and Conditions.  

However, AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service is the only point of contact authorized to handle any requests related to identity verification and payment of user sales.  
Therefore, our partner Adyen should not be contacted directly, as they are not able to respond to AI-Bay users.  

*Note:* Once the information is received by Adyen, it is verified and stored. AI-Bay is neither responsible for nor in charge of collecting or verifying this information.  

For more details, you can consult the *User Payment Information Notice* for the Adyen Secure Payment Service.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: How long will it take for my transfer to arrive in my AI-Bay account?
faq_body:
**Transfer Time for Funds**  
**Notification When Funds Arrive**  
**Security**  
**Why Is My Payment Blocked?**  

*Important:* You will be notified at every stage of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, along with an email ending in @ai-bay.fr or @messagerie.ai-bay.fr. If you have any doubts, do not take any action and contact our customer service.  

**Transfer Time for Funds**  
A bank transfer may take up to 48 business hours on average. Timelines may vary depending on your bank.  
Here‚Äôs an estimate to help you know when your funds should arrive (first day = transfer initiation, second day = latest expected arrival on your AI-Bay account):  

- Transfer Monday ‚Üí Arrival Thursday  
- Transfer Tuesday ‚Üí Arrival Friday  
- Transfer Wednesday ‚Üí Arrival Monday (next week)  
- Transfer Thursday ‚Üí Arrival Tuesday (next week)  
- Transfer Friday ‚Üí Arrival Wednesday (next week)  
- Transfer Saturday ‚Üí Arrival Thursday (next week)  
- Transfer Sunday ‚Üí Arrival Thursday (next week)  

*Note:* The transfer time depends on your bank, which issues the transfer. We cannot act on the funds before they arrive, but we will notify you in real time once they do.  

**Notification When Funds Arrive**  
As soon as the funds reach your AI-Bay account (RIB), you‚Äôll be immediately notified via secure messaging. You won‚Äôt be able to proceed with the transaction until you receive this message.  

We recommend scheduling your meeting with the seller only after your funds have arrived in your AI-Bay account.  

**Security**  
We notify you at every step of the transaction through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system. Only these notifications are valid.  
If you receive an email or SMS asking you to take action or confirming an action, always verify that you have received the corresponding notification in your AI-Bay secure messaging.  
If in doubt, do not take any action and contact our customer service.  

**Why Is My Payment Blocked?**  
AI-Bay uses a payment service provider called MangoPay to manage payments for users in the vehicle category.  
Make sure the ‚Äúfirst name‚Äù and ‚Äúlast name‚Äù on your AI-Bay profile match your real information. When purchasing a vehicle using secure payment, you‚Äôll be asked to provide personal details that must exactly match your account information; otherwise, the payment will be blocked.

faq_title: **Buyer: Why Was My Secure Payment Refused?**
faq_body:
**Note:** If you encounter a blank page when attempting to make an online payment, please contact your bank to activate 3DS2 on your credit card (the new authentication standard).

**A problem related to your payment card**  
**A problem related to your bank account**  
**A problem related to 3D-Secure verification**  
**My request for installment payment was refused ‚Äî what should I do?**  
**My issue is still not resolved ‚Äî what should I do?**

When making a payment, several factors can cause a secure payment to fail.

### A problem related to your payment card
Your payment may have failed for one of the following reasons:  
- The card is not part of the Visa, Mastercard, or Carte Bancaire network.  
- You entered incorrect information (16 digits, expiration date, or security code).  
- The card has expired.  
- The card is currently blocked.  
- Online payment functionality is disabled for this card.  
- You have reached your payment limit.

**Note:** The payment page expires after 15 minutes. After that, you‚Äôll need to re-enter your banking details.

### A problem related to your bank account
The payment may also fail in the following cases:  
- You do not have sufficient funds.  
- Your bank has blocked the payment due to suspected fraud.

### A problem related to 3D-Secure verification
AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system complies with the European Payment Services Directive 2 (PSD2), which ensures all online transactions are protected against fraud.  
This requires an authentication step during your purchase. Please follow these steps:  
1. Make your purchase on the AI-Bay website or app.  
2. Open your mobile banking app, where a payment validation request will automatically appear.  
3. Approve the payment from your banking app.  
4. Once validated, you‚Äôll be redirected back to AI-Bay.

**Note:** For customers without a smartphone, banks offer alternative solutions such as a one-time SMS code combined with a password. Contact your bank for more information.

### My request for installment payment was refused ‚Äî what should I do?
Our payment partner Oney may refuse your installment payment if you are not eligible for this service. In that case, please choose another payment method.  
For any questions regarding a financing refusal, contact our partner directly at: **contact@client.oney.fr**

### My issue is still not resolved ‚Äî what should I do?
If you‚Äôve checked all the above points and your payment is still being refused, contact your bank to find out the reason and identify a solution.

faq_title: **AI-Bay Isn‚Äôt Working on My Device ‚Äî What Should I Do?**
faq_body:
**Important Information:** Starting February 17, the iOS15 version of the AI-Bay app will no longer be available. To continue using AI-Bay via the app, please update your operating system to iOS16 by following the procedure described in this article. You can also continue using AI-Bay through your web browser.

**AI-Bay doesn‚Äôt work on my computer**  
**AI-Bay doesn‚Äôt work on my smartphone**

### AI-Bay doesn‚Äôt work on my computer
**Check if there‚Äôs a general outage**  
If there‚Äôs an ongoing issue with the AI-Bay website, you‚Äôll be informed via the service status page.

**Check your internet connection**  
AI-Bay requires a stable internet connection to function properly. If you‚Äôre having trouble connecting, contact your internet service provider.

**Note:** If you‚Äôre abroad and using a foreign IP address, access to certain features may be restricted.

**Try another browser**  
Access AI-Bay using Google Chrome, Safari, or Mozilla Firefox and see if the issue persists.

**Clear your browser‚Äôs cache and cookies**  
If you‚Äôre unsure how to do this, follow the instructions for:  
- Google Chrome  
- Mozilla Firefox  
- Safari

**Update your browser**  
If you‚Äôre unsure how to do this, follow the instructions for:  
- Google Chrome  
- Mozilla Firefox  
- Safari

**Note:** Since February 16, 2021, it is no longer possible to access AI-Bay using Internet Explorer 11.

**Check your extensions and antivirus/ad-blocking software**  
Your browsing experience may be affected by ad-blockers (like Adblock) or antivirus software. Temporarily disable them and check if the issue persists.

**Restart your computer**  
If none of the above solutions work, restart your computer. This will close any background programs that might interfere with your browsing.

### AI-Bay doesn‚Äôt work on my smartphone
**Check your network connection**  
The AI-Bay app requires a stable internet connection. Start by checking your Wi-Fi or mobile data (3G/4G/5G).

**Check that your operating system version is compatible with AI-Bay**  
To function properly, the AI-Bay app requires a recent OS version:  
- iOS: 14.0 or later  
- Android: 7.0 or later  

If you‚Äôre using an older version and can‚Äôt update your OS, you‚Äôll need to use the mobile version of the AI-Bay website.

**Update the app**  
Updating the AI-Bay app can fix potential bugs. If you‚Äôre unsure how, see ‚ÄúHow to update your app?‚Äù

**Delete and reinstall the app**  
If updating doesn‚Äôt help, delete the app from your phone and reinstall it from the App Store (iOS) or Play Store (Android).

**Restart your smartphone**  
If none of the above solutions work, restart your phone to close background apps that might affect performance.

faq_title: **How to Set Up Alerts and Notifications for New Listings**
faq_body:
**From the website**  
**From the iOS app**  
**From the Android app**

Logging into your account allows you to:  
- Access all your saved searches and listings across all categories and devices.  
- Receive alerts and notifications when new results match your saved searches.

To receive email alerts for new results, follow the steps below.

### From the website
1. Log in to your personal AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
2. Click on the **My Searches** menu to view all your saved searches.  
3. Click the icons to activate alerts:

### From the iOS app

**Note:** If the bell is blue, notifications are active.

### From the Android app

**Note:** If the bell is blue, notifications are active.

faq_title: **How to Purchase Credits**
faq_body:
**Important:** Starting January 3, 2022, a strict 6-month expiration period applies to credits in professional accounts. If your credits were purchased more than 6 months ago, they will be automatically removed from your professional account (see the General Terms of Sale).

### Steps to purchase credits:
1. Log in to your Pro account.  
2. Click on **Purchase Credits**.  
3. Select the desired credit amount and click **Confirm** after accepting the General Terms of Sale.  
4. Enter your banking details on the secure payment page.  

Once your payment is confirmed, the purchased credits are automatically added to your available balance. You can view your credit balance on the **Balance** page.  

You can use your credits on the AI-Bay website and mobile apps (iPhone and Android) to subscribe to paid options. When completing a transaction, the corresponding amount will be deducted from your credit balance.  

The transaction will appear in your purchase history under the **Invoices** tab, where you can also download a transaction statement.

**Note:** Credit purchases are only available through our website. Credits cannot be used for payments made via the secure payment service.

**Bonus credits based on the amount purchased**

faq_title: **A Company Is Offering Me Potential Buyers**
faq_body:
If you receive a call or SMS from a company claiming to have potential buyers for your listings on our site, please exercise caution.  
- This type of solicitation is not from us ‚Äî these companies are not partners of AI-Bay.  
- We encourage you to contact our team and forward the message you received.

faq_title: **Title:** How do I post an ad?
faq_body:
Note: If you encounter issues when posting an ad, please refer to *I‚Äôm not authorized to post an ad* or *My ad was rejected, what should I do?*

**Step 1: Access the ad posting page**  
**Step 2:** Enter the main details of your ad  
**Step 3:** Set up your payment and delivery options  
**Step 4:** Add photos  
**Step 5:** Finalize and publish your ad  

---

### Step 1: Access the ad posting page
From the homepage, click the **‚ÄúPost an ad‚Äù** button.

**Note:** To post an ad, you must be logged in or create an AI-Bay account.

---

### Step 2: Enter the main details of your ad
‚úî Choose a title for your ad.  
‚úî Select the appropriate category from the available options.  
‚úî Fill in the required fields (these vary depending on the category). Feel free to use the item condition/size guides to better target your listing.  
‚úî Write a clear and detailed description including all relevant information for potential buyers.  
‚úî Indicate the selling price.

---

### Step 3: Set up your payment and delivery options
By default, secure payment with delivery is enabled. Using it increases your chances of selling (see eligible categories).  
‚úî Enter the package weight by clicking **‚ÄúEdit package weight.‚Äù**  
‚úî Choose your preferred delivery methods by clicking **‚ÄúEdit delivery methods‚Äù** (by default, Mondial Relay and Colissimo are selected).

**Note:** If you prefer not to offer secure payment and delivery, please refer to this article.

---

### Step 4: Add photos
You can upload up to **3 photos for free** in the following categories: Vehicles, Real Estate, Pets, Services, and Others.  
You can upload up to **20 photos for free** in these categories: Vacation Rentals, Electronics, Home & Garden, Fashion, Leisure, and Family.

---

### Step 5: Finalize and publish your ad
‚úî Indicate your location. If you prefer not to share your exact address, you can provide just your street name (without the number) or your city.  
‚úî Enter your email address and phone number (for your safety, your number will be hidden by default).  
‚úî Click **‚ÄúContinue.‚Äù** If the button remains greyed out, you may have missed a required field or an error is present.  
‚úî You can choose to boost your ad or click **‚ÄúPost without boosting my ad.‚Äù** To learn more about boosting options, click here.

You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email once your ad is published. You can find it in the **Ads** section of your account.

**Note:** If you can‚Äôt find your ad, click here.

---

Once your ad is live, as a seller, you‚Äôll see **‚ÄúBoost‚Äù** and **‚ÄúManage‚Äù** buttons on your own listings.  
Potential buyers, however, will see **‚ÄúBuy‚Äù** and **‚ÄúMessage‚Äù** instead. It‚Äôs normal that you don‚Äôt have access to these actions on your own ads.

**Information:** If you haven‚Äôt finished writing your ad, you can save it as a draft and return to it later. This feature is currently available only for Android app users.

faq_title: **Title:** How does the Opinion System rating display work?
faq_body:
**The rating displayed is not that of my company**  
**No rating appears on my page**  
**How is my rating displayed on my professional page?**  
**Can I choose to show or hide my rating on my page?**  
**Can I select which reviews appear on AI-Bay?**  
**I‚Äôm not an Opinion System member ‚Äî how can I get reviews for my agency?**

---

For real estate professionals with a **Pro Page**, we display your rating if your company is a member of **Opinion System**.

### The rating displayed is not that of my company
We use the SIRET number from your Pro Page to identify your Opinion System certificate. If there‚Äôs a mismatch between your Pro Page and Opinion System data, your rating may not be correctly linked.  
To update your SIRET number on your AI-Bay Pro Page, please contact customer support.

### No rating appears on my page
If you‚Äôre an Opinion System member but no rating appears, ensure that the SIRET number on your AI-Bay Pro Page matches the one registered with Opinion System.  
You can also check your rating visibility settings in your Opinion System member area.

### How is my rating displayed on my Pro Page?
We use your SIRET number to identify your Opinion System rating.  
We display the rating from your certificate provided by Opinion System, along with your three most recent reviews. Additional reviews can be viewed by clicking **‚ÄúSee all reviews.‚Äù**

### Can I choose to show or hide my rating on my page?
Yes, you can choose to display or hide your rating and reviews directly from your Opinion System member area.

### Can I select which reviews appear on AI-Bay?
If you choose to display your Opinion System reviews on AI-Bay, all verified reviews from the platform will appear on your Pro Page. You cannot select individual reviews.

### I‚Äôm not an Opinion System member ‚Äî how can I get reviews for my agency?
If you‚Äôre interested in their services, please contact Opinion System directly through their platform.

faq_title: **Title:** üöô Buyer: I made a bank transfer to the AI-Bay account, but the seller deleted their ad.
faq_body:
Deleting the ad by your seller is not an issue. You can still complete your transaction directly through the messaging system.

All steps of the **secure vehicle transaction** take place within the secure messaging system.  
There, you‚Äôll find all details related to your transaction, and you‚Äôll receive a notification when your funds arrive.  
The finalization of the transaction always occurs within your messaging space.

---

**Important:** You‚Äôll receive notifications for each step of the transaction via AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system, accompanied by an email ending in **@ai-bay.fr** or **@messagerie.ai-bay.fr**.  
If you have any doubts, do not take any action and contact our customer support team.

faq_title: **Title:** Data shared with local authorities for registration and reporting purposes
faq_body:
Since **December 1, 2019**, under the **ELAN law**, municipalities that have implemented a registration procedure may request information from short-term rental platforms operating in France.

Accordingly, upon request, AI-Bay will provide the municipality ‚Äî at most once per calendar year ‚Äî with a list of short-term rental properties published on **ai-bay.fr**, including the following data:

- Name of the host  
- Address of the listed property  
- Type of residence (primary or secondary)  
- Registration number, if displayed on the listing  
- Number of nights booked in the property during the current and, if applicable, the previous calendar year  

Municipalities can send their information requests to the following address:  
**communes.demande.info@ai-bay.fr**

faq_title: **Traveler: How can I recommend a host?**
faq_body:
You can recommend your host starting the day after your stay ends, and within a 15-day period.  
To do so:

- Go to the **Messages** tab (‚ÄúMy messages‚Äù on mobile).  
- Select the conversation related to your stay.  
- Under the question ‚ÄúWould you recommend this host to other AI-Bay members?‚Äù, tap **Continue**.  
- Rate your host from 1 to 5 stars, then send your recommendation.  
  - 1 star = I do not recommend the host  
  - 5 stars = I highly recommend the host  

A host can also leave a recommendation for you, which will be visible on your profile to all users.

faq_title: **Buyer: The nearest Mondial Relay, Pickup, or Relais Colis point doesn‚Äôt appear in the list of options**
faq_body:
**Reasons for Unavailability**  
Some Mondial Relay, Pickup, or Relais Colis points may be temporarily unavailable and therefore cannot be selected when finalizing your purchase. Here are the possible reasons:

- The Mondial Relay, Pickup, or Relais Colis point is temporarily closed or scheduled to close soon.  
- The point has reached its maximum storage capacity.  
- Access to the point is restricted (roadwork, event, etc.).  
- The merchant is no longer part of the Mondial Relay or Pickup network.  

**Note:** The list of available points is updated in real time directly by Mondial Relay, Shop2Shop by Chronopost, or Relais Colis. You can then enter the address of your chosen pickup point during step 1 of your purchase on the AI-Bay platform.

**What to do if your chosen pickup point is unavailable?**  
Search for other nearby Mondial Relay, Pickup, or Relais Colis points. If none are available close to you, you can authorize a trusted person who lives near an available point to collect the parcel on your behalf (both your ID and theirs will be required). Your parcel will be held for 8 days before being returned to the seller.  

As a last resort, inform your seller to choose another carrier. The current transaction will need to be canceled and restarted. The cancellation will automatically trigger your refund.

faq_title: **How can I disable alerts and notifications for new listings?**
faq_body:
To disable alerts and notifications when new results appear for your saved searches, follow the steps below.  
New listings matching your saved search criteria will still appear in your search results, but you will no longer receive email or app notifications.

**From the website**  
‚úî Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
‚úî Click on the **My Searches** menu to view all your saved searches.  
‚úî Click the icons to disable alerts:  

- The smartphone icon controls app notifications.  
- The envelope icon controls email notifications.  

**Note:** A white icon means alerts are disabled. A blue icon means they are active.

**From the iOS app**  
‚úî Tap **Favorites**, then **My Searches**.  
‚úî You can disable notifications by tapping the bell icon.  

**Note:** A white crossed-out bell means notifications are disabled; a blue bell means they are active.

**From the Android app**  
‚úî Tap **Favorites**, then **My Searches**.  
‚úî Slide the toggle to the right to activate notifications.  

**Note:** A greyed-out bell means notifications are disabled.

faq_title: **How does online booking work for hosts?**
faq_body:
**Note:** As a host, using the online booking service offers several advantages. Learn more in *Why use the online booking service?*

The online booking feature allows travelers to book and pay for their stays directly through the AI-Bay platform. It‚Äôs also a great way to build trust with potential future guests.  
This service is completely free for you (0% commission on the booking amount) and is automatically available once you post your listing.

**Here‚Äôs how to use the online booking service:**

1. **Customize your listing for free**  
   Post your rental listing by providing:  
   - **Deposit amount:** Choose the deposit you want travelers to pay securely online when posting your listing (between 30% and 100% of the total stay). You can adjust it anytime from the ‚ÄúListing‚Äù tab by clicking ‚ÄúEdit for free.‚Äù  
   - **Prices and availability:** Once your listing is published, you‚Äôll be redirected to your AI-Bay calendar, where you can set your prices and availability for specific dates.  

   **Note:** Find more information about how your calendar works here.

2. **Receive booking requests with deposits paid online**  
   Travelers find your listing and send booking requests by paying the secure deposit directly on AI-Bay. You have 3 days to accept or decline these requests.  
   You‚Äôll be notified and can view requests in:  
   - Your AI-Bay messages  
   - Your calendar  
   - The ‚ÄúVacation Bookings‚Äù tab (iOS app only)  

   You can chat with travelers anytime via AI-Bay messaging to discuss:  
   - The rental agreement  
   - Security deposits (if applicable)  
   - Payment methods for the remaining balance  
   - Arrival details  

   **Note:** The more bookings you accept, the higher your listing appears in search results‚Äîup to 3 times more requests! Track your performance daily in your listing dashboard.

3. **Accept or decline booking requests**  
   You have 72 hours to accept or decline a booking.  
   To respond, click **Accept** or **Decline** via:  
   - The message conversation  
   - The ‚ÄúMy Bookings‚Äù tab in your account calendar  
   - The booking summary email  

   **Note:** If you don‚Äôt respond within 72 hours, the request automatically expires and the traveler won‚Äôt be charged.

4. **Receive the secure deposit once the booking is accepted**  
   After accepting a booking on the AI-Bay site or app, enter your IBAN and ID documents in your personal account.  
   We transfer the secure deposit to your bank account 48 hours after the travelers‚Äô arrival to ensure a trustworthy experience. The funds will appear in your account within 5‚Äì7 business days, depending on your bank.

5. **Enjoy peace of mind**  
   We collect and remit the tourist tax (non-flat rate) on your behalf.  
   You can cancel bookings if something unexpected happens:  
   - If you cancel, we refund the traveler‚Äôs online payment (deposit, service fees, tourist tax).  
   - If travelers cancel less than 30 days before arrival, you receive the deposit in your bank account.  

   **Note:** Bookings cannot be canceled less than 24 hours before the stay begins. In case of emergency, contact customer support.

6. **Welcome your travelers with confidence**  
   Upon arrival, the traveler pays the remaining balance using your chosen payment method (check, holiday voucher, cash, bank transfer, etc.).  

   **Note:** After the stay, both you and the traveler will be asked to leave a review. Don‚Äôt forget to remind them‚Äîreviews are key to reassuring future guests.

faq_title: **What should I do if I forgot my password?**
faq_body:
If you‚Äôve forgotten your password, you can reset it as follows:  

‚úî First, make sure to log out of all devices or browsers where your account is currently signed in‚Äîthis step is important.  
‚úî Click **Sign In** from the homepage.  
‚úî Click **Forgot Password**.  
‚úî Enter the email address linked to your AI-Bay account in the ‚ÄúEmail‚Äù field.  
‚úî Click **Continue**.  
‚úî An email containing a verification code will be sent to the address provided. For security reasons, the code is valid for 2 hours. After that, you‚Äôll need to restart the password reset process. We never send passwords by email.  
‚úî Enter the code you received and set your new password. It must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one number and one letter, and be no longer than 50 characters.  

**Note:** If you don‚Äôt receive the verification code, check your spam folder. To prevent our emails from being marked as spam, please add **no.reply@ai-bay.fr** to your address book.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I edit my listing?
faq_body:
**Steps to Modify an Ad**  
**What Can I Edit?**  
**How Long Before the Changes Are Visible?**  
**Does Editing My Ad Move It to the Top of the List?**  
**My Ad Modification Was Rejected**

---

### Steps to Modify an Ad
To edit your ad:

1. Log in to your personal AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúAds.‚Äù  
3. Click the ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù button.

---

### What Can I Edit?
Only certain fields of your ad can be modified:  
‚úî The title of your ad  
‚úî Category-specific details (model year, mileage, engine size, etc.)  
‚úî The description  
‚úî The price  
‚úî Delivery options  
‚úî Photos  
‚úî The location of your ad (within the same department as originally listed)  
‚úî Your phone number  

**Important:** Editing is free only for ads posted in the following categories: Vacations, Fashion, Multimedia & Leisure, Home D√©cor, Linens, and Tableware.  
For ads in any other category, editing is a paid service. You can find detailed pricing information via this link.

**Note:** For technical reasons, the following fields cannot be modified:  
‚úò The region or department of your ad  
‚úò The ad category  
‚úò The type (individual or professional, offer or request)

To update these details, please delete your ad and post a new one with the desired changes.

---

### How Long Before the Changes Are Visible?
Your modified ad will be reviewed by AI-Bay within 24 hours.  
You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email once your changes are approved, and the updated version will appear on the site within about 30 minutes.  
Once validated, the new version will replace the old one.

---

### Does Editing My Ad Move It to the Top of the List?
**If you already purchased promotional options:**  
Editing your ad does not cancel your existing options.

**If you did not purchase promotional options:**  
Your ad will move to the top of the list as if newly published. However, the overall publication duration remains unchanged.

**Note:** Ads in the categories Vacations, Fashion, Multimedia & Leisure, Home D√©cor, Linens, and Tableware are not automatically bumped to the top after an edit.

You can also purchase paid options such as ‚ÄúTop of the List,‚Äù ‚ÄúUrgent Logo,‚Äù or ‚ÄúFeatured‚Äù while editing your ad.  
To view pricing for these options (depending on the selected category):

1. Log in to your AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
2. Visit the page listing all paid option prices.  
3. Select the category where you want to post your ad.

---

### My Ad Modification Was Rejected
If your modified ad is rejected by AI-Bay, you‚Äôll receive an email notification (and any payment for paid options will be canceled).  
To learn more, see: *Why was my ad modification rejected?*

faq_title: **Title:** Host: I paid to boost my listing, but it‚Äôs not showing at the top of the results ‚Äî why?
faq_body:
**Changes to the Premium Option**

The premium option ‚ÄúAppear at the Top of the List‚Äù is now called ‚ÄúAppear Among the First Results‚Äù and is adapted to relevance-based sorting.

Previously, the ‚ÄúAppear at the Top of the List‚Äù option placed your ad at the top of search results regardless of the search criteria. While this increased visibility, it often led to less qualified visits since the ad didn‚Äôt always match what travelers were looking for.

Now, the ‚ÄúAppear Among the First Results‚Äù option highlights your ad based on search relevance. Your ad will be boosted for travelers most likely to be interested in your listing, increasing your chances of receiving booking requests.

---

### Summary

**Appear at the Top of the List (Old Option)**  
- Sorting system: by posting date  
- Effect on visits and conversions: more visits, but not always relevant

**Appear Among the First Results (New Option)**  
- Sorting system: by relevance  
- Effect on visits and conversions: more visits from travelers likely to be interested

---

### Why Isn‚Äôt My Ad in the First Position?
If your ad doesn‚Äôt appear first after selecting the premium option, it means other ads also use the premium feature and/or better match travelers‚Äô search criteria.

faq_title: **Title:** Traveler: Guidelines and penalties related to noise disturbances
faq_body:
**As a Traveler, Respecting the Property and Neighborhood**

When you stay in a new home and environment for a few days, your host trusts you to respect both the property and the neighbors. It‚Äôs therefore important to follow the house rules, especially regarding noise.

---

### Precautions to Take as a Traveler
During your stay, it‚Äôs recommended that you:
- Avoid hosting parties  
- Keep music at a reasonable volume  
- Minimize floor noise that could disturb neighbors below (such as moving chairs, wearing heels, or children running)

In short, simply adopt respectful and considerate behavior.  
If you‚Äôre unsure about what‚Äôs allowed in the property, don‚Äôt hesitate to ask your host.

---

### Consequences in Case of Noise Disturbance
If you fail to follow the host‚Äôs house rules and cause noise disturbances, you may be reported to the local authorities.

faq_title: **Title:** Professional contact emails for AI-Bay
faq_body:
**How to Find All Contacts Generated by My Ads**  
**What Is the Format of Contact Emails?**  
**What Information Do These Emails Contain?**

---

### How to Find All Contacts Generated by My Ads
As a professional on AI-Bay, you receive contact emails through:

- **Email:** Sent directly to the address provided when creating your Pro Account.  
- **AI-Bay Messaging:** Available only for professionals in the following categories: Leisure, Fashion, Home, Services, Professional Equipment, Vacations, Multimedia, Auto, and Real Estate.

You can view all your contacts directly under the **Contacts** tab in your Pro Account.

**Note:** Add the sender address *message@ai-bay.fr* to your address book to ensure proper delivery of these emails.

---

### What Is the Format of Contact Emails?
Contact emails generated by your ads are in **HTML format**.  
Here are the different display formats for the **Vehicles** and **Real Estate** categories (excluding New Real Estate Offers):

- **Format 1:** If both first and last names are empty, the username is displayed.  
- **Format 2:** If the first name is empty but the last name is filled, only the last name is displayed.  
- **Format 3:** If both first and last names are filled, both are displayed.

---

### What Information Do These Emails Contain?
They summarize the user‚Äôs contact details, the ad reference, and its location.  
To improve clarity and readability, these emails are regularly updated.

**Note:** You can export your ad contacts in Excel format directly from the **Contacts** tab of your Pro Account.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How much does delivery via Mondial Relay cost?
faq_body:
**Delivery Costs via Mondial Relay**

Delivery costs through Mondial Relay depend on the category of the item you‚Äôre purchasing.  
To qualify for Mondial Relay delivery, your item‚Äôs price must not exceed ‚Ç¨2000.

---

### Mondial Relay Delivery Rates
Below are the rates applied by Mondial Relay based on weight for the following categories: Professional Equipment, Multimedia, Vehicles, Leisure, Home, and Others:

| Weight | Price |
|--------|-------|
| Up to 100g | ‚Ç¨3.49 |
| 100g ‚Äì 500g | ‚Ç¨3.49 |
| 500g ‚Äì 1kg | ‚Ç¨3.99 |
| 1kg ‚Äì 2kg | ‚Ç¨4.99 |
| 2kg ‚Äì 5kg | ‚Ç¨6.49 |
| 5kg ‚Äì 10kg | ‚Ç¨10.99 |
| 10kg ‚Äì 20kg | ‚Ç¨15.99 |

For the **Fashion** category:

| Weight | Price |
|--------|-------|
| Up to 100g | ‚Ç¨2.88 |
| 100g ‚Äì 500g | ‚Ç¨2.88 |
| 500g ‚Äì 1kg | ‚Ç¨3.28 |
| 1kg ‚Äì 2kg | ‚Ç¨3.78 |
| 2kg ‚Äì 5kg | ‚Ç¨5.19 |
| 5kg ‚Äì 10kg | ‚Ç¨8.19 |
| 10kg ‚Äì 20kg | ‚Ç¨12.11 |

---

### Good to Know
- Delivery fees are paid by the buyer.  
- Shipping rates apply to mainland France and Corsica.  
- Delivery costs are the buyer‚Äôs responsibility for transactions using Mondial Relay, Colissimo, or Tracked Mail.  
- To use Mondial Relay delivery, the item‚Äôs price must not exceed ‚Ç¨2000.  
- If the seller didn‚Äôt specify the item‚Äôs weight when posting the ad, displayed prices may differ from those in the table above.  
- The parcel must not exceed **30 kg** (including packaging).  
- Maximum parcel dimensions: total (height + length + width) must not exceed **150 cm**, and the longest side must not exceed **120 cm**.  
- Minimum dimensions: **20 cm x 10 cm**.

faq_title: **Private Seller: What to Do If There‚Äôs a Delivery Problem?**
faq_body:
**Delivery by Colissimo**  
If an issue occurs during the delivery of your parcel with Colissimo (such as tracking problems, damaged parcel or item, etc.), we invite you to contact Colissimo Customer Service to take the necessary steps.  
Learn more.  

**Delivery by Mondial Relay**  
If an issue occurs during the delivery of your parcel with Mondial Relay (parcel marked as delivered but unavailable, tracking stuck, etc.), please contact Mondial Relay Customer Service to take the necessary steps.  
Learn more.  

**Delivery by Shop2Shop by Chronopost**  
If an issue occurs during the delivery of your parcel with Shop2Shop by Chronopost (parcel marked as delivered but unavailable, tracking stuck, etc.), please contact Shop2Shop by Chronopost Customer Service to take the necessary steps.  
Learn more.  

**Delivery by Relais Colis**  
If an issue occurs during the delivery of your parcel with Relais Colis (parcel marked as delivered but unavailable, tracking stuck, etc.), please contact Relais Colis Customer Service to take the necessary steps.  

**Delivery by another carrier**  
If an issue occurs during delivery with another carrier, please contact the Customer Service of the relevant delivery provider as soon as possible, then inform the buyer.  
Examples of carriers:  

**Chronopost**  
By phone: 09 69 39 13 91 (standard rate call)  
Monday to Friday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m.  
Saturday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 12 p.m.  
FAQ available online.  

**UPS**  
By phone: 0 173 006 661 (standard rate call)  
Monday to Friday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m.  
Saturday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 1 p.m.  
Online support or via a Virtual Assistant and FAQ.  

**Good to know**  
If your buyer has not confirmed receipt of the parcel, we encourage you to contact them again via AI-Bay messaging.  

You will receive your payment directly into your AI-Bay wallet (on average within 6 business days after the payment is triggered).

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: How to Unlock the Funds?**
faq_body:
It‚Äôs the buyer who controls the release of funds and their transfer to the seller.  
As a buyer, if the vehicle meets your expectations (after inspection):  

1. Go to your AI-Bay messaging.  
2. Select your conversation with the seller.  
3. Click on ‚ÄúPay.‚Äù  
4. Enter the amount agreed upon with the seller and click ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù to validate the transfer of funds to the seller and confirm receipt of the vehicle. Please note: this action is irreversible.  

Once the transaction is complete, if you have remaining funds due to price negotiation, you can recover them: *How to recover remaining funds?*  

The seller will receive a transaction confirmation in their AI-Bay messaging and can then transfer the amount to their bank account.

faq_title: **How to Delete a Search?**
faq_body:
To delete your saved searches, follow the steps below.  

**From the website**  
1. Log in to your personal account using your email and password.  
2. Click on the ‚ÄúMy Searches‚Äù menu, where you can view all your saved searches.  
3. Click ‚ÄúDelete.‚Äù  

**From the iOS app**  
1. Tap ‚ÄúFavorites,‚Äù then ‚ÄúMy Searches.‚Äù  
2. Swipe your search to reveal the trash can icon, then tap the icon to delete your search.  

**From the Android app**  
1. Tap ‚ÄúFavorites,‚Äù then ‚ÄúMy Searches.‚Äù  
2. Tap the trash can icon to delete your search.

faq_title: **How to Subscribe to the Vacation Rental Package?**
faq_body:
**What is the Holiday Rental Pack?**  
**Subscribing to the Holiday Rental Pack**  
**Already subscribed to another paid option?**  
**Want to add options after subscribing to the Holiday Rental Pack?**  

**What is the Holiday Rental Pack?**  
The Holiday Rental Pack is a paid option for professionals.  
This pack was created specifically for the Holiday category to make managing your listing easier. It includes:  

- Listing validity extended to 6 months (automatically, instead of 2 months).  
- Up to 10 photos.  
- Free and unlimited listing edits for 6 months: you can add promotional options during these edits. Edits do not cancel existing options.  
- Automatic weekly top-of-list refresh for 6 months (instead of 2 months). A confirmation email will be sent each week until your listing expires.  
- Insertion fees valid for 6 months for professionals.  

**Subscribing to the Holiday Rental Pack**  
You can choose to subscribe to the Holiday Rental Pack when posting, renewing, or editing your listing. The pack remains valid for the entire listing period, i.e., 6 months from the date of subscription.  
Payment can be made by credit card or credits for users with a personal or professional account.  

If your listing is already online:  
1. Log in to your pro account using your email and password.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúMy Listings.‚Äù  
3. Check the listing you want to boost and click on one of the paid options. The Holiday Rental Pack will be offered.  

**Already subscribed to another paid option?**  

| Already Subscribed Option | Impact on Your Options |  
|----------------------------|------------------------|  
| **Urgent Logo** | Transferred into the Holiday Rental Pack and valid for 6 months. |  
| **Weekly Top-of-List Refresh** | Canceled and replaced by the weekly refresh included in the pack. |  
| **7- or 30-Day Top-of-List Refresh** | Remains active until expiration (7 or 30 days) alongside the pack. |  
| **Extra Photo Pack** | Photos are transferred into the Holiday Rental Pack. |  

**Want to add options after subscribing to the Holiday Rental Pack?**  
After purchasing the Holiday Rental Pack, the following additional options are available:  

- Featured placement: 7 days or 30 days.  
- Immediate top-of-list refresh.  
- Urgent Logo: valid for 6 months after purchasing the pack.

faq_title: **Title:** What should I do if I don‚Äôt receive the verification email to create my account?
faq_body:
Creating your AI-Bay account involves verifying your email address (and later, your phone number).  
To confirm your email, you‚Äôll receive a code that you must enter on the site for verification.  

If you haven‚Äôt received anything:  
‚úî Check your spam or junk mail folders ‚Äî the verification email might be there.  
‚úî Go back and re-enter your email address, making sure it‚Äôs correct.  
‚úî Click on ‚ÄúResend the code.‚Äù  

Reminder of the validation steps:  
1. Enter a valid email address that you can access (double-check for typos).  
2. Click ‚ÄúNext.‚Äù  
3. Go to your inbox and enter the verification code you received on the site.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How can I improve the ranking of my vacation rental listing?
faq_body:
How AI-Bay search results work  
Listings in the ‚ÄúVacation‚Äù category are sorted based on relevance.  
The AI-Bay algorithm takes into account travelers‚Äô search criteria to show them listings that best match their expectations, as well as how effectively hosts use the online booking service.  

Tips to boost your listing‚Äôs visibility:  
1. Accept and honor online booking requests  
To increase the likelihood that a traveler‚Äôs booking request is successful, the algorithm highlights listings with a good acceptance rate.  
The more you accept and fulfill booking requests, the more reliable your listing appears ‚Äî and the higher it will rank.  
To learn more, see ‚ÄúHow does the acceptance rate work?‚Äù  

2. Keep your calendar and prices up to date  
By maintaining an updated calendar, you avoid unwanted booking requests that you‚Äôd have to decline ‚Äî which could hurt your acceptance rate and, in turn, your ranking.  
Your listing‚Äôs price also matters: adjust it according to the season to stay competitive.  
To learn more, see ‚ÄúHow to manage my calendar‚Äôs prices and availability?‚Äù and ‚ÄúHow to sync my booking calendar?‚Äù  

3. Subscribe to a highlight option  
If you want a quick and effective way to improve your listing‚Äôs ranking, you can subscribe to a highlight option that boosts your visibility in search results. Several options are available:  
- Immediately  
- Daily for 7 days  
- Daily for 30 days  
- Weekly for 60 days  

To subscribe, go to your list of listings and click ‚ÄúRent faster.‚Äù  

Can I move my listing to the top by deleting and reposting it?  
Deleting and reposting a listing will not make it appear at the top of search results. In fact, doing so can be counterproductive, as you‚Äôll lose your booking history and performance data.  
To improve your ranking, it‚Äôs better to enhance your existing listing rather than start from scratch.  

Note: If you no longer wish to receive booking requests, you can pause your listing.

faq_title: **Private seller: What should I do if there‚Äôs a problem with Mondial Relay delivery?**
faq_body:
**The parcel tracking is stuck or shows damage**  
**The parcel is marked as delivered but not available at the pickup point**  
**The buyer has not confirmed receipt of the parcel**  
**The buyer reports that the item is damaged or not as ordered**  

**Note:** If you chose home delivery with your own carrier, please make sure to share all relevant details (carrier name, tracking number) with your buyer.  

**Parcel Tracking is Stuck or Shows Damage**  
If tracking has been stuck for more than 3 days (excluding Saturday, Sunday, and Monday), you must:  
- Open an investigation with Mondial Relay, which will process your request only after 10 calendar days from the last tracking update.  
- Mondial Relay will then have 3 business days to carry out the necessary checks.  
- After this period, if the parcel cannot be delivered, an investigation will be opened and may last up to 20 business days.  

**Parcel Marked as Delivered but Not Available at Pickup Point**  
Once the issue is confirmed, we will ask your buyer to:  
- Report the issue/damage at the pickup point.  
- Contact Mondial Relay to open a damage report.  

**Buyer Has Not Confirmed Receipt of the Parcel**  
If your buyer has not confirmed receipt, we encourage you to contact them again via AI-Bay messaging.  
If the buyer does not confirm receipt within 15 days of shipment confirmation or has not requested assistance from our support team, the funds will be automatically released.  
You will receive the payment directly in your AI-Bay wallet (usually within 24 hours, excluding weekends and holidays).  

**Buyer Reports the Item is Damaged or Incorrect**  
The buyer must check the parcel‚Äôs condition upon receipt. If there is any issue, they must refuse the parcel.  
Afterward, the buyer should report the issue/damage at the pickup point.  
They can also request assistance from our support team to temporarily suspend the transaction.

faq_title: **Host: How does the acceptance rate work?**
faq_body:
**What Is the Acceptance Rate?**

The acceptance rate represents the percentage of booking requests you‚Äôve accepted out of all the requests you‚Äôve received since creating your account. This indicator helps travelers understand how often you accept or decline bookings.

The higher your acceptance rate, the higher your listings appear in search results.  
If you‚Äôve accepted at least two bookings and your rate exceeds 75%, you become a **Recommended Host**, a mark of trust for travelers. You‚Äôll also earn a badge that boosts your listing‚Äôs visibility and increases your chances of receiving booking requests.

**Note:** A low acceptance rate appears on your listing and reduces its visibility.

**How to Improve Your Acceptance Rate**

- **Keep your calendar updated:** Regularly updating your calendar is key. If your prices and availability are accurate, you‚Äôll receive relevant booking requests that you‚Äôre more likely to accept. (See: How to manage prices and availability in my calendar?)  
- **Provide house rules:** When posting your listing, fill in all property details and write a complete description. This helps attract more suitable booking requests.  
- **Use the pause feature:** If you‚Äôre unable to respond to requests, you can pause your listing. It will temporarily disappear from search results, and you won‚Äôt receive new requests.

**Note:** Your search ranking isn‚Äôt determined solely by your acceptance rate. Occasional refusals are fine ‚Äî what matters is maintaining a higher proportion of accepted requests.

**What Happens If I Accept a Booking but Don‚Äôt Honor the Stay?**

Remember, you cannot cancel a booking less than 24 hours before the stay begins. If the stay cannot take place, the booking will be canceled by our customer service or the traveler, which will negatively affect your acceptance rate.  
Keep your calendar up to date to ensure you only accept bookings that match your real availability.

faq_title: **Private seller: What should I do if the buyer reports the package as not received?**
faq_body:
**What to Do If the Parcel Is Not Received**

In a transaction using secure payment and delivery, the buyer has 15 days to confirm receipt of the parcel. Otherwise, they can report it as not received.

**Impact on the Transaction**

When the buyer reports the parcel as not received, the transaction is suspended until the issue is resolved.  
If the parcel is found and eventually delivered, the buyer must notify customer service to release the payment.  
If the parcel is not found, the transaction is canceled, and the buyer is refunded.

**Getting Help from the Carrier**

To obtain information about the parcel and resolve the issue, contact the customer service of the chosen carrier:

- Contact Mondial Relay  
- Contact Colissimo  
- Contact Shop2Shop by Chronopost  
- Contact Relais Colis  

Here are some useful contacts if you used another carrier:

| Carrier | Phone | Online Help |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| Chronopost | 09 69 391 391 | Online FAQ |
| UPS | 0 173 006 661 | Submit a request online |
| DPD | 09 70 80 85 66 | Submit a request online |
| DHL | 0 809 40 02 13 | Submit a request online |
| FedEx | 0 820 12 38 00 | Submit a request online |

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: How can I cancel a vehicle transaction?**
faq_body:
**Canceling a Vehicle Transaction**

You can cancel a vehicle transaction at any time before the funds are transferred to the seller.

**If You Want to Cancel Before Making the Bank Transfer to AI-Bay‚Äôs Account**

Go to your payment summary via your messaging by clicking ‚ÄúDeposit my funds,‚Äù then select ‚ÄúI no longer wish to buy the vehicle.‚Äù  
Click ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt made the transfer‚Äù and then ‚ÄúEnd the transaction.‚Äù  
You‚Äôll receive a notification confirming that the transaction has been canceled.

**If You Want to Cancel After Making the Bank Transfer to AI-Bay‚Äôs Account**

Wait until you receive the notification confirming that the funds have arrived in your secure AI-Bay account.  
Then, go to the secure messaging and click the ‚ÄúCancel‚Äù button.  
Fill out the form fields and confirm.  
You‚Äôll receive a notification confirming that the transaction has been canceled.

**Important:**  
Once the funds have been transferred to the seller and the vehicle receipt has been confirmed, the process is irreversible. After confirmation, you can no longer request a refund.

faq_title: **üöô Buyer: AI-Bay‚Äôs checklist for purchasing used vehicles**
faq_body:
### Things to Check  

**Bodywork**  
- Signs of impact: condition of rims, welds under the trunk mat, etc.  
- Openings: ensure doors and trunk open and close properly; watch for resistance or squeaking.  
- Corrosion: may appear on the lower body, inside wheel arches, or exhaust pipe.  
- Tires: check wear above the indicator and look for cuts or bulges.  
- Windshield: make sure there are no chips or cracks.  

**Interior**  
- Upholstery: inspect plastics, seats (remove covers if needed), and carpets (check under mats).  
- Controls: headlights, indicators, wipers, etc.  
- Bulbs: ensure all signal lights work.  
- Dashboard: no warning lights should remain on.  

**Trunk**  
- Flat tire equipment: spare wheel, space-saver, or inflation kit.  
- Coverings: check plastics and carpets.  

**Electrical Equipment**  
- Temperature systems: test air conditioning and heating.  
- Other electrical features: test windows, mirrors, and infotainment system.  

**Mechanical**  
- Engine block: check for corrosion, leaks, or cracked rubber parts.  
- Brakes: inspect disc and pad wear.  
- Fluids: check levels of engine oil, coolant, brake fluid, power steering, and windshield washer.  

**During the Test Drive**  
- Engine: ensure it starts easily.  
- Exhaust: listen for unusual noises.  
- Steering: no pulling to one side.  
- Gearbox: no grinding; gear changes should be smooth.  
- Braking: no steering vibrations; idle should be stable.  
- Mileage: verify it matches the listing.  

**Administrative**  
- Registration certificate: confirm the serial number matches the vehicle.  
- Certificate of non-encumbrance (administrative status certificate): required for vehicle sale.  
- Transfer certificate: three copies (buyer, seller, and administration).  
- Maintenance: service book or invoices.  
- Keys: ensure you have the spare and coded keys.  
- Vehicle user manual.

faq_title: **Private seller: The buyer didn‚Äôt pick up the package ‚Äî what should I do?**
faq_body:
The buyer has 15 days from the shipping date to confirm receipt of the package.  
After these 15 days, if the buyer has not taken any action (no confirmation or issue reported), the package is automatically considered received.  
You must then wait an additional 3 days for your payment to be released.

faq_title: **Title:** How do I save my card for purchases?
faq_body:
**Saving Your Bank Card**

**How do I save a new card?**  
**How do I delete my saved card?**

When making a payment through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system, you can now save your bank card to make future purchases easier.

**Saving your bank card**  
When entering your payment details for a purchase on AI-Bay, check the box ‚ÄúSave this card for future purchases.‚Äù  
Your card will then be saved for your next transactions.

**How do I save a new card?**  
You can update your card when paying for an option or purchasing an item, at the payment step:  
- Click on ‚ÄúPay with another card‚Äù and enter your new card details.  
- Check the box again: ‚ÄúSave this card for future purchases.‚Äù  

*Note: Saving a new card will automatically replace the previous one.*

**How do I delete my saved card?**  
You can delete your saved card at any time:  
- Go to your Account Settings.  
- Open the ‚ÄúPayment Methods‚Äù section.  
- Your saved card will appear. Click ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù to remove it from your account.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: What should I do if there‚Äôs a problem with Colissimo delivery?
faq_body:
**Standard Colissimo Delivery**

If you experience any issues with your Colissimo delivery (such as tracking problems, damaged parcels, or damaged items), please contact Colissimo Customer Service to take the necessary steps.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: How can I contact travelers?
faq_body:
**Contacting Travelers as a Host Using Online Booking**

As a host using AI-Bay‚Äôs online booking for your vacation rentals, you can contact travelers through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.

**I haven‚Äôt accepted the booking request yet**  
You‚Äôll be notified by email and through secure messaging when a booking request is made on your listings. You can then chat with travelers before accepting the booking.

**Access the booking request from secure messaging**  
- Log in to your AI-Bay account and open your messages.  
- A notification will indicate that you‚Äôve received a booking request. If the traveler included a message, it will appear there.  
- From the conversation, you can directly communicate with the traveler before accepting or declining the booking.

**Access the booking request from your dashboard**  
You can also find pending bookings and start a conversation as follows:  
- Log in to your AI-Bay account and go to your Dashboard.  
- A banner will show that you have a pending booking. Click ‚ÄúView Request.‚Äù  
- The booking summary will appear. Click the ‚ÄúContact‚Äù button.  
- You‚Äôll be redirected to the secure messaging system, where you can chat with the traveler who made the request.

**I‚Äôve already accepted the booking request**  
Once the booking is accepted, you can still contact travelers through secure messaging. If you can‚Äôt find the conversation related to a specific booking:  
- Go to your list of active listings in your account.  
- On the relevant listing, click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button.  
- The list of your bookings and travelers will appear. Click the traveler‚Äôs name you wish to contact, then click the button to message them.

faq_title: **Title:** Unable to add a photo
faq_body:
**Troubleshooting Photo Upload Issues in Your Listing**

If you experience technical difficulties when uploading photos to your listing, we apologize for the inconvenience.  
This issue may be related to your internet speed or the size of the selected photos.

Here are the steps we recommend to successfully upload your photos:  
- Check the photo format ‚Äî accepted formats are GIF, BMP, PNG, or JPEG.  
- Choose photos between 400 KB and 1 MB in size.  
- Reduce the size of your photos if necessary.  
- Try posting your listing from another device ‚Äî either another computer or the mobile app.  
- If you‚Äôre using a proxy and your images take too long to load, we recommend disabling the proxy while browsing AI-Bay.com.

faq_title: **Title:** Professional seller: What is the Subscribers Notifications page?
faq_body:
**Subscriber Notifications Page**

The Subscriber Notifications page is available in your AI-Bay Pro Space.  
It allows you to send notifications to users who follow your professional page ‚Äî helping you promote your page or a specific listing and increase visibility.

You can send one notification per month if:  
‚úî You have a professional page  
‚úî You have at least one user subscribed to your page  

On this page, you can:  
‚úî See how many notification credits you have left for the month  
‚úî Send a notification  
‚úî Preview how the notification will appear to your subscribers before sending it  
‚úî View the history of previously sent notifications  

**How do I send a notification to my subscribers?**  
‚úî Make sure you still have a notification credit available for the month.  
‚úî Choose the type of notification you want to send: ‚ÄúMy Business Profile‚Äù or ‚ÄúOne of My Listings.‚Äù

‚úî Write your message to subscribers (between 10 and 150 characters).  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend Notification‚Äù to confirm.

faq_title: **Title:** Individual Seller: What to Do If There‚Äôs a Problem with Delivery via Shop2Shop by Chronopost?
faq_body:
**Package Tracking Is Stuck**  
**The Package Is Marked as Delivered but Not Available at the Pickup Point**  
**The Buyer Has Not Confirmed Receipt of the Package**  
**The Buyer Reports the Item Is Damaged or Not as Ordered**  
**The Package Is Reported as Damaged or Lost**

---

**Note:** If you chose home delivery with your own carrier, please make sure to share all relevant details (carrier name, tracking number) with your buyer.

---

### Package Tracking Is Stuck
If tracking has been stuck for more than 5 days (excluding Saturday, Sunday, and Monday), you should:

- Contact Shop2Shop by Chronopost via the online form, chatbot, or by phone at **09 69 391 391** (toll-free), Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., and Saturday from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m.  
- Shop2Shop by Chronopost will have up to 10 days to carry out the necessary checks.  
- If the package has not been located between the 6th and 10th day after shipment, ask your buyer to contact **AI-Bay Customer Service** through their messaging system.

---

### The Package Is Marked as Delivered but Not Available at the Pickup Point
Once the issue has been confirmed, we will ask your buyer to:

- Report the issue or damage to the pickup location.  
- Contact **AI-Bay Customer Service** through their messaging system.

---

### The Buyer Has Not Confirmed Receipt of the Package
If your buyer has not confirmed receipt, we encourage you to contact them again via **AI-Bay messaging**.  
If the buyer does not confirm receipt within 15 days after shipment confirmation, or if they have not requested assistance, the payment will be automatically released.  
You will receive the funds directly in your **AI-Bay wallet** (usually within 24 hours, excluding weekends and holidays).

---

### The Buyer Reports the Item Is Damaged or Not as Ordered
The buyer must check the condition of the package at the pickup point.  
If there is any issue, they must immediately make a note of it and/or refuse the package with the store clerk.  
They should also contact our support team to temporarily suspend the transaction.

---

### The Package Is Reported as Damaged or Lost
Once the issue has been confirmed, we will ask your buyer to:

- Contact **AI-Bay Customer Service** through their messaging system.

faq_title: **Title:** Individual Seller: What to Do If the Buyer Reports the Product as Non-Compliant?
faq_body:
The buyer has **3 days** from the date of receipt to confirm that the item matches the description. If not satisfied, they can report a problem.  
As the seller, you will be notified through the secure messaging system.

‚úî You then have **7 days** to reach an agreement with the buyer (see *Seller: What to Do During the Amicable Resolution Phase?*) on a mutually acceptable solution.  
‚úî The simplest option is to suggest that the buyer return the item (at their own expense).  
‚úî Once the return is completed, you can issue the refund directly, and your listing will become available again for purchase.

---

**Note:** If no solution is found within **10 days** after the issue is reported, the **AI-Bay support team** will automatically step in to assist.

faq_title: **Title:** How to Analyze the Performance of My Listings?

### Choose a Time Period to Analyze
