faq_title: **Title:** Host: The Price of Your Vacation Rental Listing
faq_body:
The price of your listing represents the **minimum nightly rate** you wish to set as a host. It‚Äôs the default price below which you do not want to go.  
Once your host profile is complete, you can set different prices per night or per week (Saturday to Saturday), depending on your availability dates.

faq_title: **Title:** What should I include in the text of my listing?
faq_body:
To ensure users have as much information as possible, we recommend providing a detailed description of the item you‚Äôre selling in your ad text.  
Choose your ad title carefully and fill in all the suggested criteria.  
When posting, information bubbles will guide you on what details to include for a successful listing.  
It‚Äôs not possible to use code or HTML tags ‚Äî these will be automatically removed.  
Finally, make sure to follow the posting rules for the category where your ad is listed to avoid rejection.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: how can I get my item back if the buyer isn‚Äôt satisfied?
faq_body:
As part of a transaction using secure payment, the buyer can report an issue if they are not satisfied with the product received or its condition upon delivery.  

You then have a 7-day amicable resolution period during which you can agree with the buyer to have the item returned in exchange for a refund. To do this:  

- Provide the buyer with the return address.  
- Agree on the return terms (shipping costs, carrier choice).  
- Wait for the package to be returned and check its condition upon arrival. Report any issues to the carrier (if using Mondial Relay or Shop2Shop by Chronopost, you can note a reservation when collecting your parcel).  
- Confirm the return and refund from your AI-Bay messaging by clicking ‚ÄúI refund the buyer‚Äù (if the button doesn‚Äôt appear, please contact our support team).  
The refund to the buyer will then be processed automatically.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Do not issue the refund before receiving the returned package. If you refund the buyer beforehand and they refuse to send the item back, AI-Bay will unfortunately not be able to intervene.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: what should I do if there‚Äôs a delivery issue with Mondial Relay?
faq_body:
**Note:** If you have questions about deliveries handled by Mondial Relay, please visit the Mondial Relay FAQ.  

**The tracking is stuck or shows an issue**  
If tracking has been frozen for more than 3 days (excluding Saturday, Sunday, and Monday), you should:  
- Open an investigation with Mondial Relay, which will only process your request 10 calendar days after the last tracking update.  
- Mondial Relay will then have 3 business days to carry out the necessary checks.  
- After this period, if the parcel cannot be delivered, an investigation will be opened and may last up to 20 business days.  

**The parcel is marked as delivered but not available at the pickup point**  
Once the issue is confirmed, please:  
- Report the anomaly or damage to your pickup point.  
- Contact Mondial Relay immediately to open an investigation.  

**The parcel is marked as collected but you haven‚Äôt received it**  
Once the issue is confirmed, please:  
- Report the anomaly or damage to your pickup point.  
- Contact Mondial Relay immediately to open an investigation.  

**The item is damaged or not the one ordered**  
You must check the external condition of your parcel. If you notice any issue, refuse the delivery.  
No claim can be made to Mondial Relay if you accept the parcel at the pickup point.  

**The parcel was delivered to another pickup point**  
If your pickup point has reached its parcel limit or is closed at the time of delivery, your parcel will be redirected to another pickup point. Mondial Relay will notify you by email.  

**The parcel was not collected in time**  
Parcels remain available at the pickup point for 7 to 14 calendar days. After this period, the parcel will be returned to the sender.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: how do I manage prices and availability on my calendar?
faq_body:
**How do I access my calendar?**  
Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
From your account homepage, click on ‚ÄúListings.‚Äù  
A list of your active ads will appear. Click the ‚ÄúCalendar‚Äù button next to the listing you want to manage.  
You‚Äôll then be redirected to the calendar associated with that listing, which you can edit.  

**How do I mark the property as unavailable?**  
From the calendar of the relevant listing:  
- Select the date or date range when the property will be unavailable.  
- A pop-up will appear. Choose ‚ÄúUnavailable‚Äù and save your changes.  

*Note:* To make a ‚Äúweekly‚Äù change, select a date range from Saturday to Friday.  

**How do I change the property‚Äôs prices?**  
From the calendar management page of the relevant listing:  
- Select the date or date range for the price change.  
- A pop-up will appear. Indicate that the property is available and enter the nightly or weekly rate before saving your changes.  

*Note:* To make a ‚Äúweekly‚Äù change, select a date range from Saturday to Friday.  

**How do I sync my calendar with another site?**  
To save time, you can sync your calendar with those on Abritel or Airbnb. Follow the steps described in ‚ÄúHow to sync my booking calendar?‚Äù to complete this process.  

*Note:* Keeping your calendar up to date ensures you receive booking requests at the right price and for the correct dates.

faq_title: **Title:** I didn‚Äôt receive the email to activate my account
faq_body:
When you create an account:

From the website: we send a verification code to the email address used to create the account.

From the app: we send a validation link to the email address used to create the account.

If you haven‚Äôt received the activation email or code for your account, it‚Äôs possible that your email provider has marked the message as spam.  
Please check your junk or spam folder to see if the email is there.  

To prevent our emails from being treated as spam, please add the address ‚Äúno.reply@ai-bay.fr‚Äù to your address book.

faq_title: **Title:** How do I add photos to my listing?
faq_body:
Adding photos to your ad submission  
‚úî In the ad submission form, click on the photo icon.  

‚úî Select the photos that best showcase your item, then confirm.  
You can add up to 3 photos for free* (and up to 20 with the Additional Photo Pack). Ads with photos are viewed 7 times more often than those without.  

*Note: You can add 3 photos for free in the categories Vehicles, Real Estate, Pets, Services, and Others, and get 17 additional photos with the Additional Photo Pack. You can upload up to 20 free photos in the categories Vacation Rentals, Electronics, Home & Garden, Fashion, Leisure, and Family.  

Accepted formats  
If you have trouble uploading a photo, please check its format. Photos must be in GIF, BMP, PNG, or JPEG format.  

Important: When posting an ad, you must only use photos that you own or that are royalty-free.  

Recommended photo size  
Ideally, use photos between 400 KB and 1 MB to reduce loading time. However, regardless of size, your photos will be compressed.  

Photo orientation in your ad  
Uploading a photo to our platform does not change its orientation. It will appear exactly as it was taken on your device.  
Please adjust the orientation directly in your device‚Äôs gallery, computer, or smartphone before publishing your ad.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: What should I do if there‚Äôs a problem with Relais Colis delivery?
faq_body:
Note: If you have questions about deliveries handled by Relais Colis, please visit the Relais Colis Help Center.  

Package tracking is stuck  
If tracking has been stuck for more than 5 days (excluding Saturday, Sunday, and Monday), you should:  
‚úî Contact Relais Colis via their form or by phone at 09.70.25.22.31.  
‚úî Relais Colis will have 15 days to carry out the necessary checks.  
‚úî If the package has not been located between the 6th and 10th day after shipment, ask your buyer to contact AI-Bay Customer Service through their messages by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received my package.‚Äù  

The package is marked as delivered but not available at the pickup point  
Once the issue has been confirmed, please:  
‚úî Report the issue or damage at the pickup point.  
‚úî Contact AI-Bay Customer Service by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received my package‚Äù in your messages between the 6th and 10th day after shipment. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Relais Colis.  

The package is marked as collected, but you didn‚Äôt pick it up  
Once the issue has been confirmed, please:  
‚úî Contact AI-Bay Customer Service by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received my package‚Äù in your messages between the 6th and 10th day after shipment. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Relais Colis.  
You will need to provide the following documents:  
For items under ‚Ç¨50:  
‚úî A sworn statement confirming non-receipt of the package  
‚úî A copy of your ID  
For items over ‚Ç¨50:  
‚úî A copy of the police report filed at your local station  

The item is damaged or not as described  
You must check the external condition of your package upon delivery. If you notice any issue, refuse the package at the store.  
If the buyer still accepts the package, they can open a dispute with our team and must send proof of the damaged item.  
Please remember to contact AI-Bay starting from the 6th day after shipment by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received my package‚Äù in your messages. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Relais Colis.  

The package was delivered to another pickup point  
If your pickup point was full or closed at the time of delivery, your package will be redirected to the nearest available Relais Colis point. You will receive an email from Relais Colis with the new pickup details.  

The package was not collected in time  
Packages remain available at the pickup point for 8 calendar days. After this period, the package will be returned to the sender.  

The package is still in transit  
Once the issue has been confirmed, please contact AI-Bay starting from the 6th day after shipment by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received my package‚Äù in your messages. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Relais Colis.

faq_title: **Title:** Private seller: What should I do during the amicable resolution phase?
faq_body:
What does an amicable resolution phase mean?  
Solution 1: Ask the buyer to return the package, then issue a refund  
Solution 2: Issue a refund without requesting the return  
Solution 3: Offer compensation to the buyer  

What is an amicable resolution phase?  
For purchases made through secure payment, the buyer has 3 days after receiving the package to report a problem (item not as described, damaged, etc.). This starts a 7-day amicable resolution phase during which you can agree on a solution with the buyer.  

Note: If no solution is found within 7 days after the buyer reports the issue, the AI-Bay team will automatically step in. It‚Äôs also possible to open a dispute 48 hours after the start of the amicable resolution phase.  

Solution 1: Ask the buyer to return the package, then issue a refund  
The simplest option is to arrange for the return of the package in exchange for a refund. To do this:  
- Provide the buyer with the return address.  
- Agree on the return terms (shipping costs, carrier choice).  
- Wait for the package to be returned and check its condition upon arrival. Report any issues to the carrier (if using Mondial Relay or Shop2Shop by Chronopost, you can note a reservation when collecting the package).  
- Confirm the return and refund from your AI-Bay messages by clicking ‚ÄúI refund the buyer‚Äù (if the button doesn‚Äôt appear, contact our support team).  
The refund will be processed automatically.  

Solution 2: Issue a refund without requesting the return  
If the product is too damaged, of low value, or you simply don‚Äôt want it back, you can refund the buyer without requesting a return. To do this:  
- Inform the buyer that a return isn‚Äôt necessary and that you‚Äôre initiating the refund.  
- From your messages, click ‚ÄúI refund the buyer.‚Äù  
The refund will be processed automatically.  

Solution 3: Offer compensation to the buyer  
If the buyer wants to keep the product but feels compensation is appropriate:  
- Discuss and agree on the amount of the discount.  
- Decide on the payment method (bank transfer, check, etc.).  
- Proceed with the compensation payment.  
The buyer can then finalize the sale by clicking ‚ÄúRelease payment‚Äù from their AI-Bay messages.  
You will then receive the full payment for the sale.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I change my email address?
faq_body:
I still have access to my old email address  
I no longer have access to my old email address  

I still have access to my old email address  
To change your email address:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Click on Settings.  
‚úî In the ‚ÄúEmail‚Äù section, click ‚ÄúEdit.‚Äù  
‚úî A verification code will be sent to your current email address. Enter it to continue.  
‚úî Enter your new email address and click ‚ÄúSave my email.‚Äù A validation code will be sent to your new address to confirm ownership.  

For security reasons, the email change link is valid for 20 minutes. After that, you‚Äôll need to restart the process.  

If you don‚Äôt receive the confirmation email, two possibilities:  
X The email address entered is invalid.  
X The email was blocked by your spam filter. Check your ‚ÄúSpam‚Äù or ‚ÄúJunk‚Äù folder to find it.  

I no longer have access to my old email address  
If you want to change the email linked to your account but no longer have access to your old inbox, please contact our customer service and provide the following information:  
‚úî Your first and last name  
‚úî Your postal address  
‚úî Your phone number  
‚úî The email address currently linked to your account  
‚úî Your new email address  
This information is required to process your request.  

Note: Changing your email address does not apply to ads already online at the time of modification.  
We remind you that the secure messaging system is the safest way to communicate with other users. You can send and receive documents directly through the messaging feature.

faq_title: **Host: How can I deactivate the online booking service?**
faq_body:
We regularly update the booking service to better meet your expectations. However, if it still doesn‚Äôt suit your needs, you have the option to deactivate it.

**Why deactivate the online booking service instead of deleting your listing?**  
The deactivation feature allows you to:

- Keep your listing online.  
- Retain your calendar history.  
- Keep your current bookings active.

When you deactivate the service:

- Your listing will remain online and revert to the standard format used on AI-Bay.  
- Travelers can contact you through AI-Bay messaging, email, or phone to discuss booking details.  
- Any booking requests already accepted through the online booking service will remain valid.  
- Travelers will no longer have access to the dynamic calendar on your listing.  
- Travelers will no longer be able to send online booking requests or make online payments.

**Note:** You can reactivate the online booking service at any time and regain access to all its features, free of charge.

**How to deactivate the online booking service:**  
- Go to the ‚ÄúListings‚Äù tab in your personal account.  
- For the relevant listing, click on ‚ÄúCalendar.‚Äù  
- Then click on ‚ÄúMy bookings.‚Äù  
- Select ‚ÄúLearn more.‚Äù  
- You can then activate or deactivate the booking service.

**How to check if the online booking service is deactivated:**  
When the button is green, the booking service is active. When it‚Äôs greyed out, the service is deactivated.

faq_title: **Where should I locate my listing?**
faq_body:
When posting a listing, you must indicate where your property is located. You can choose to provide:

- **Your address:** On your listing, it will appear as a point on the map, but your exact address will not be visible to users.  
- **Your street:** A point will indicate the street on the map.  
- **Your town or city:** Only the city name will be visible on your listing.

To set the location, simply type your postal code, street, address, or city name in the designated field, then select the correct location from the dropdown menu.

If your town doesn‚Äôt appear in the dropdown list, don‚Äôt worry. Only the most frequently searched towns are suggested automatically. Just type your town‚Äôs name after the corresponding postal code, and it will appear.

**Note:** Adding a location to your listing helps it appear in search results for users looking in your area.

faq_title: **Buyer: What should I do if there‚Äôs a delivery issue with Colissimo?**
faq_body:
When receiving your parcel, if you notice that the packaging is damaged:

- You can refuse the parcel, and it will be returned to the seller.  
- You can accept it but ask the delivery person to record your observation at the time of delivery.

If your parcel was left in your mailbox, with a neighbor, or with a building manager‚Äîand it hasn‚Äôt been opened‚Äîyou can return it to a post office no later than the next business day. The parcel will then be sent back to the seller.

If, upon opening, you find that the contents are damaged, you must contact the seller so they can reach out to Colissimo Customer Service to handle the issue.  
You can also report the problem directly to Colissimo Customer Service.

faq_title: **Host: How to prepare for travelers‚Äô arrival to ensure a great stay?**
faq_body:
As a host, it‚Äôs important to provide your guests with key information about your accommodation so they can book with confidence and enjoy a safe and pleasant stay.

**Information to share with guests**  
We recommend providing:

- As many details as possible about your rental, such as its location, a detailed description, number of beds, available amenities, nearby attractions, etc.  
- Emergency contact information, including emergency numbers (medical services, police, fire department, nearest hospital) and a phone number where guests can reach you if needed.  
- Reminders about house or building rules (caretaking, recycling, respecting neighbors, etc.). You can, for example, write a short house manual.

**Additional items**  
To ensure your guests have the best possible stay, we also suggest providing:

- A first aid kit (you can find advice on the Paris Civil Protection website).  
- At least one certified smoke detector (see the public service website for more information).  
- A floor plan of your property clearly showing emergency exits.

**Safety and precautions**  
In line with current health measures, we recommend providing hand sanitizer and/or masks.  
To prevent any potential hazards, welcome your guests personally to show them around and point out any equipment or installations that could pose a risk, especially for children.  
Also, make sure your guests know how to use household appliances such as heating, gas, or television.

**Housing standards**  
Your accommodation must meet the minimum standards for decent housing. For more information, refer to Decree No. 2002-120 of January 30, 2002, regarding housing quality requirements.

faq_title: **How can I update my personal information?**
faq_body:
**Note:** If you are a professional user, please refer to *How to edit my business account information?*

**To access and edit your personal information:**

- Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
- Go to ‚ÄúSettings.‚Äù  
- You‚Äôll then see all your personal information (not all fields are mandatory):

  - Name, surname, date of birth  
  - Address  
  - Email (see more information)  
  - Phone number (see more information)  
  - Payment and banking details  
  - Notification preferences  
  - Other information (occupation category, interests)

You can edit any fields you wish and save your changes.

**Note:** If you want to exercise your data rights or retrieve your personal data, see *How to exercise my rights and delete my account?*

**What is the impact of these changes on my existing listings?**  
If you already had listings online before updating your information, here‚Äôs what happens:

- **Email address change:**  
  If your listings were posted using your old email address, the change won‚Äôt apply automatically. Any communication about those listings must be done either:  
  - Through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging, or  
  - Via your old email inbox.

- **Phone number change:**  
  If your old phone number appears on your listings, you‚Äôll need to manually update each affected listing.

- **Username change:**  
  If you change your username, it will only appear on listings published after the change. To display your new username on previously published listings, you‚Äôll need to delete and repost them.

faq_title: **Title:** Should I include my email address in the text of my listing?
faq_body: For your safety, adding an email address to your listing is not allowed. We encourage you to communicate through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system and to avoid sharing your personal contact details.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: What should I do if there‚Äôs a delivery issue with Shop2Shop by Chronopost?
faq_body:
**Note:** If you have questions about delivery handled by Shop2Shop by Chronopost, please visit the Shop2Shop by Chronopost FAQ.  

---

### The parcel tracking is stuck  
If tracking has been frozen for more than 5 days (excluding Saturday, Sunday, and Monday), you should:  

- Contact Shop2Shop by Chronopost via their online form or chatbot.  
- You can also call 09 69 391 391 (standard rate) Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., and Saturday from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m.  

Shop2Shop by Chronopost will then have 10 days to carry out the necessary checks.  

If the parcel has not been located between the 6th and 15th day after shipment, please contact AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service.  

---

### The parcel is marked as delivered but not available at the pickup point  
Once the issue has been confirmed, please:  

- Report the anomaly or damage to your Pickup point.  
- Contact AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received the parcel‚Äù in your messages between the 6th and 10th day after shipment. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Shop2Shop by Chronopost.  

---

### The parcel is marked as collected, but you didn‚Äôt pick it up  
Once the issue has been confirmed, please:  

- Contact AI-Bay‚Äôs customer service by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received the parcel‚Äù in your messages between the 6th and 10th day after shipment. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Shop2Shop by Chronopost.  

You will need to provide the following documents:  

- For items under ‚Ç¨50: a sworn statement of non-receipt + a copy of your ID.  
- For items over ‚Ç¨50: a copy of the police report filed at your local station.  

---

### The item is damaged or not the one you ordered  
You must check the external condition of your parcel upon delivery. At the slightest issue, you must make a note of it and/or refuse the parcel at the store.  

No claim will be accepted by Shop2Shop by Chronopost or AI-Bay if you collect the parcel without making a reservation.  

Remember to contact AI-Bay starting from the 6th day after shipment by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received the parcel‚Äù in your messages. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Shop2Shop by Chronopost.  

---

### The parcel was delivered to another pickup point  
If your pickup location has reached its parcel limit or was closed at the time of delivery, your parcel will be redirected to another pickup point. Shop2Shop by Chronopost will notify you by email.  

---

### The parcel was not collected in time  
The parcel remains available at the pickup point for 7 calendar days. After this period, it will be returned to the sender.  

---

### The parcel is reported as damaged  
Once the issue has been confirmed, you must contact AI-Bay starting from the 6th day after shipment by clicking ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received the parcel‚Äù in your messages. AI-Bay will then open an investigation with Shop2Shop by Chronopost.

faq_title: **Title:** How do I disable web push notifications?
faq_body:
### Disable push notifications on Google Chrome

faq_title: **Title:** How can I earn the ‚ÄúRecommended Profile‚Äù badge?
faq_body:
To earn the badge visible on your listings, your profile must meet the following criteria:  

- At least 5 ratings, including 1 as a seller  
- An average rating above 4.5  
- No reports for violating the Code of Good Conduct  
- No account blocks  

If your profile meets these conditions, the ‚ÄúRecommended Profile‚Äù badge will be automatically granted, and you‚Äôll be notified by email in advance.  

You will lose the ‚ÄúRecommended Profile‚Äù badge as soon as one of these criteria is no longer met.  

**Note:** The badge is available only for individual users and is valid for a rolling one-year period. For example, if you receive a report, you‚Äôll need to wait one year without any new reports to regain the badge, provided all other criteria are still met.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: What should I do if I haven‚Äôt received my parcel?
faq_body:
### Step 1: Check that the parcel has been shipped  
When you purchase an item, the seller has 48 hours to confirm availability and 6 days to ship it. Once the parcel is sent, you‚Äôll receive a message in AI-Bay‚Äôs secure chat confirming the shipment.  

If you haven‚Äôt received this message, the parcel may not have been shipped yet. If the seller fails to send it on time, the transaction is automatically canceled, and you‚Äôll be refunded.  

---

### Step 2: Track your parcel  
From your account, go to your list of transactions and click on the one you‚Äôre interested in.  
You can then track your parcel by clicking the ‚ÄúTrack parcel‚Äù button.  

---

### Step 3: Contact the relevant carrier  
If you notice an issue with your parcel‚Äôs delivery, contact the carrier directly:  

- Contact Mondial Relay  
- Contact Colissimo  
- Contact Shop2Shop by Chronopost  
- Contact Relais Colis  

---

### Step 4: Report the parcel as not received  
As a buyer, you can report your parcel as not received starting from the 6th day after shipment.  

To do so:  
1. Go to AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging and open the conversation related to your purchase.  
2. A notification will appear saying ‚ÄúI‚Äôve received the item or I have a problem.‚Äù  
3. Click ‚ÄúNo, I haven‚Äôt received the parcel.‚Äù If only the ‚ÄúYes, I‚Äôve received the parcel‚Äù button appears, it‚Äôs too early to report it ‚Äî wait until the 6th day after shipment.  
4. Click ‚ÄúRequest AI-Bay‚Äôs assistance.‚Äù  
5. Fill out the contact form describing your issue.  

Your transaction will then be paused until the issue is resolved.  

---

**Important:** If you haven‚Äôt reported anything (neither received nor not received) after 15 days, we‚Äôll assume the parcel has been received. From that point, you still have 3 days to report a problem ‚Äî see the procedure for details.

faq_title: **What is the Monthly Activity Report?**
faq_body:
Every month, you receive an email titled ‚ÄúYour Monthly Performance on AI-Bay,‚Äù which provides a detailed summary of your ad activity. This email is sent to the address linked to your professional account.  
This report includes four key indicators to help you track your ad performance over the past month:

- Number of views  
- Number of messages received  
- Number of call intents  
- Number of times your ads were added to favorites  

By clicking the ‚ÄúView Your Statistics‚Äù button, you‚Äôll be redirected directly to the ‚ÄúStatistics‚Äù tab in your account for more detailed performance insights.  

**Note:** If you have a Pro Page, each viewed ad will display your brand‚Äôs logo ‚Äî a great way to boost your visibility.

faq_title: **Host: Am I allowed to rent out my property on AI-Bay?**
faq_body:
**I am a tenant**  
**General regulations**  
If you are a tenant, you must obtain your landlord‚Äôs permission before offering your accommodation for subletting. We recommend checking your lease agreement, as it may prohibit subletting.  
You can find more information about subletting conditions on the official public service website.  
If you need a sample letter to request your landlord‚Äôs authorization for subletting, click here.  

**I live in subsidized housing**  
If you live in subsidized housing, please check with your property manager, as specific regulations may apply to short-term rentals.  

**I live in social housing**  
If you live in social housing (for example, an HLM), subletting your home is strictly prohibited. You cannot rent it out, even for short-term vacation stays.  

**I am a homeowner**  
If you are a property owner, please verify that your building‚Äôs co-ownership rules do not prohibit or restrict the rental of your property.  
For more information about the steps to take before renting out your property, please refer to the dedicated article by clicking here.

faq_title: **How can I view my listing statistics?**
faq_body:
**To view your ad statistics:**  

1. Log in to your personal AI-Bay account using your email and password.  
2. Click on ‚ÄúAds.‚Äù  

Your ad statistics allow you to see:  

- **Views:** The number of times your ad has been viewed.  
- **Appearances:** The number of times your ad appeared in search results.  
- **Phone number clicks:** The number of times someone clicked to display your phone number. Note that a click to view your number does not necessarily mean the user has contacted or will contact you.  
- **Conversations:** The number of conversations generated by your ad.  
- **Redirects to employer site (for Job ads):** The number of times users were redirected to the recruiter‚Äôs website.  

**Note:** Your own clicks and views are included in your statistics.

faq_title: **How do I post an ad for an animal?**
faq_body:
**Animal-related ads on AI-Bay**  

Ads involving animals are regulated on AI-Bay. Posting is allowed only for domestic animals, in accordance with legal criteria.  

**Posting an ad from a personal account**  
Permitted:  

- Donations, exchanges, and free breeding of dogs and cats.  
- Sale of a dog or cat at least 8 weeks old and registered in the French Book of Origins (LOF) or the Official Book of Feline Origins (LOOF), limited to one litter per year for any registered professional exception listed in the National Operator Database (BNO). You can find more details in the article *Registration in the BNO for professional users* in the *User Guide for LOF or LOOF breeders*. In this case, the litter number assigned by the genealogical registry is required:  
  - LOF (French Book of Origins for dogs)  
  - LOOF (Official Book of Feline Origins for cats)  

Beyond one litter, any ad must be posted from a Pro account, as a Siren number will be required.  

- Donations, exchanges, and free breeding of authorized domestic ‚Äúnew pets‚Äù (NACs), such as ferrets, certain rodents (mice, hamsters), certain birds (domestic parakeets, canaries), and certain fish (koi carp, guppies). Note that only specific domestic varieties are allowed, so please specify the exact variety.  
- Lost domestic animal search ads. You can post these in the ‚ÄúAnimals‚Äù category under ‚ÄúLost animals.‚Äù Online transactions are not available for this category, and you cannot add a price.  

Not permitted:  

- Sales of domestic animals (including dogs and cats) by private individuals.  
- Donations, exchanges, or breeding of non-domestic or protected animals.  

**Note:** ‚ÄúDonations with compensation‚Äù are prohibited for private individuals for any domestic animal ad. Only professional users and registered LOF/LOOF breeders are authorized to sell dogs and cats.  

**Posting an ad from a professional account**  
Permitted:  

- Sale, donation, exchange, and breeding of domestic animals within the authorized species, for breeders and sellers with a valid registration number.  

Not permitted:  

- Sale, donation, exchange, or breeding of non-domestic animals.  

**Note:** As a professional user, registration in the National Operator Database (BNO) is mandatory if you own, transfer, or sell dogs, cats, or ferrets. More details can be found in the ‚ÄúBNO Registration‚Äù section.  

**AI-Bay‚Äôs policy on wild and protected animals**  
Animals protected under the CITES convention are strictly prohibited on AI-Bay.  
To help combat online wildlife trafficking, AI-Bay actively collaborates with IFAW and participates in the Coalition to End Wildlife Trafficking Online. You can find more information here.  
See our detailed article on *AI-Bay‚Äôs policy regarding wild and protected animals*.

faq_title: **Buyer: What should I do if the product (or bundle) I received doesn‚Äôt match the listing?**
faq_body:
In case of an issue, you first have the option to resolve it amicably with the seller. If you reach an agreement, the payment can be released. Otherwise, after 7 days from your request, our team will automatically step in to assist.  
To dispute a product‚Äôs conformity, you have 3 days for a purchase from a private seller and 14 days if the seller is a professional.  

---

**I bought from a private seller**  
You have 3 days from the confirmation of delivery to verify that the product (or lot) matches the ad.  

**Important:** After 3 days, if you take no action, the transaction is automatically finalized and the seller is paid.  

**Report a non-conforming order**  
If the product or lot you received does not match the ad:  
‚úî Go to AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging and open the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî A notification will ask, ‚ÄúEverything OK?‚Äù  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúNo, I have a problem.‚Äù  
‚úî Select the reason.  
‚úî Describe your issue in the provided field.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù  

**Amicable resolution phase with the seller**  
You‚Äôll first be redirected to your conversation with the seller to find a solution. For example, you can propose returning the item, and the seller can trigger your refund through secure messaging once the item is received.  
For more details, see *Buyer: What to do during the amicable resolution phase?*  

**If you found a solution with the seller**  
Click ‚ÄúMy issue is resolved‚Äù and then ‚ÄúRelease payment.‚Äù  

**If no solution is found**  
If no agreement is reached within 7 days of your request, AI-Bay‚Äôs team will automatically be notified to intervene.  

---

**I bought from a professional seller**  
If you are not satisfied, you have 14 calendar days to withdraw and return the item to the professional seller.  

**Important:** If you take no action, the payment will automatically be released to the seller.  

**To request a withdrawal:**  
‚úî Go to the ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äù section in your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Click on the relevant product.  
‚úî At the bottom of the page, under ‚ÄúManage your transaction,‚Äù select ‚ÄúReturn the item to the seller.‚Äù  
‚úî Choose a return reason.  
‚úî Send your request.  
‚úî Contact the seller to obtain the return address.  

You can then return the item within 14 days from the date you submitted your withdrawal request. Return shipping costs are your responsibility. Once the seller receives the item, you‚Äôll be refunded.  

**Note:** Before sending the package back, we recommend taking photos of the product and its packaging.

faq_title: **Buyer: What should I do if there‚Äôs a problem with delivery?**
faq_body:
If a problem occurs during home delivery, we recommend that you contact the customer support of the relevant delivery service as soon as possible, and then inform the seller:  

**Chronopost**  
By phone:  
09 69 39 13 91 (toll-free call)  
Monday to Friday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m.  
Saturday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 12 p.m.  
[FAQ]  

**UPS**  
By phone:  
0 173 006 661 (toll-free call)  
Monday to Friday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m.  
Saturday: 8 a.m. ‚Äì 1 p.m.  
Online or via a Virtual Assistant and FAQ  

**Good to know**  
Have your tracking number ready when contacting the carrier‚Äôs customer service.  
After payment, you have 15 days to confirm receipt of your parcel. After this period, your payment is automatically released and transferred to the seller.

faq_title: **Host: What types of accommodations can I list for rent?**
faq_body:
**Tourist Furnished Rentals**  
Tourist furnished rentals are generally listed under the ‚ÄúRentals & Cottages‚Äù category on our site.  
This refers to the rental of a furnished property (apartment or house) intended for short-term stays by travelers who do not take up residence there.  

Before listing a tourist rental, you must complete certain checks and administrative steps. For more information on the required procedures, click here.  

Optionally, you can request a classification for your tourist rental from 1 to 5 stars, based on several criteria designed to indicate the level of comfort and service to travelers. To learn more about these criteria, visit the Atout France website.  

**Guest Rooms**  
Guest rooms are generally listed under the ‚ÄúGuest House‚Äù category on our site.  
These are furnished rooms located in a private home, offered for rent to tourists for one or more nights, including services such as a personal welcome, breakfast, and household linen.  
To determine whether your rental qualifies as a guest room, you can find more information on this website.

faq_title: **Do I need to register to use AI-Bay?**
faq_body:
**I am a private individual**  
To post an ad, you‚Äôll need to create an account or log in to your existing one.  
This will allow you to post your ad, access your AI-Bay messaging, and manage all your saved ads and searches in one place.  
Only your name, email address, and phone number are required to create an account and post an ad.  

**I am a professional**  
Professionals must first create a Pro Account in order to post ads.  
A professional is any legal entity established in France (including the overseas departments, excluding Mayotte and the overseas collectivities) posting ads exclusively for professional purposes via the website or mobile apps.  

The following activities may be considered professional:  
- Reselling items purchased for resale rather than personal use.  
- Selling items created by the advertiser.  
- Regularly selling a large volume of items.  
- Conducting sales that generate significant profit or income.

faq_title: **Buyer: What should I do during the amicable resolution phase?**
faq_body:
**What is an amicable resolution phase?**  
**Option 1:** Arrange the return of the parcel with the seller for a refund  
**Option 2:** Request compensation  

**What is an amicable resolution phase?**  
When you make a purchase using secure payment, you have 3 days from the date of receipt to report a problem (e.g., non-compliant or damaged item).  
A 7-day amicable resolution phase then begins, during which you can work with the seller to find a solution.  

**Note:** If no solution is reached within 7 days of reporting the issue, the AI-Bay team will automatically step in to assist.  

**Option 1: Arrange the return of the parcel with the seller for a refund**  
The simplest solution is to organize the return of the parcel to receive a refund from the seller. To do this:  
‚úî Communicate with the seller to agree on return details (full destination address, carrier choice, shipping costs).  
‚úî Take photos of the product (from all angles) before shipping, including the serial number if applicable.  
‚úî Pack the product carefully using a suitable and sturdy box.  
‚úî Send your parcel with tracking or as registered mail and share the tracking number with the seller.  
‚úî Keep proof of shipment.  
‚úî Wait for the seller to confirm receipt of the parcel.  
‚úî The seller can then trigger your refund via AI-Bay messaging.  
‚úî Your refund will be processed automatically.  

If the seller has canceled your order:  
‚úî Your bank account will be credited according to your bank‚Äôs processing times.  
‚úî If the seller requests the return of the item, return shipping costs will be your responsibility, as stated in our Terms of Use, article 9.3.2.  
‚úî You may reach an amicable agreement with the seller.  
‚úî If the seller does not request the return, you may keep the item.  

**Option 2: Request compensation**  
If you wish to keep the product but believe its condition warrants compensation:  
‚úî Communicate with the seller to agree on the amount of the discount.  
‚úî Decide on the payment method (bank transfer, check, etc.).  
‚úî Wait for the seller to send the compensation.  
‚úî Then finalize the sale by clicking ‚ÄúRelease Payment‚Äù in AI-Bay messaging.  
‚úî The seller will then receive the full payment for the sale.

faq_title: **What is a ‚Äúboosted‚Äù listing?**
faq_body:
A ‚Äúboostable‚Äù ad appears less and less frequently in search results for potential buyers.  

This happens naturally after an ad is published, and even faster in competitive markets. As new competing ads are posted or moved to the top of the list each day, your ad gradually moves down in search results.  

To increase your ad‚Äôs visibility‚Äîand therefore your chances of finding a buyer, client, or candidate‚Äîyou can boost it at any time to bring it back to the top of the list.  

**Note:** You can view all your ‚Äúboostable‚Äù ads at a glance on the ‚ÄúAds‚Äù page. They will disappear from this list once you boost them.

faq_title: **Title:** What are the requirements for posting an ad for a dog or cat?
faq_body:
Since January 1, 2016, Ordinance No. 2015-1243 of October 7, 2015, has more strictly regulated the donation and sale of dogs and cats by private individuals. These new requirements aim to improve seller traceability and reduce pet abandonment.

**Rules to follow as a private individual**

You are not allowed to post ads offering adult dogs or cats for sale.  
You are not allowed to post ads offering non-LOF puppies or non-LOOF kittens for sale.  
Within the limit of one litter per year, the sale of LOF puppies or LOOF kittens must include the litter number assigned by the genealogical registry.

If your ad falls outside these cases, you must have a professional account and a valid SIRET number.

**Ads for donation or breeding as a private individual**

Donations and breeding remain allowed, provided all mandatory details are included in your ad.  
The donation offer must be clearly stated in the text of your ad, for example: ‚Äúdonation,‚Äù ‚ÄúI‚Äôm giving away,‚Äù etc.

**Mandatory information for a sale or donation**

To be published on our site, your ad must include the following details:

- The age of the animals (minimum 8 weeks or ‚Äúavailable for reservation‚Äù).  
- The mention ‚Äútattooed‚Äù or ‚Äúmicrochipped.‚Äù  
- Whether the animal belongs to a breed and if it is registered with the LOF.  
- The registration number of each animal sold or the registration number of the female that gave birth.  
- The number of animals in the litter.  
- The litter number if you are selling a puppy or kitten registered in the genealogical book.

Any animal given away or sold on our site must be tattooed or microchipped. This identification must be done before the sale, and the cost is not the buyer‚Äôs responsibility.  
We recommend gathering all this information before completing your ad on **AI-Bay**.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: What are the steps and obligations for renting out your property?
faq_body:
**Which situation applies to you?**

**What is a primary residence?**  
The property you wish to rent out repeatedly for short stays is considered your primary residence if you occupy it for at least 8 months per year, except in cases of professional obligations, health reasons, or force majeure.  
In cities that have implemented a registration number system, it is prohibited to rent your primary residence for more than 120 days per calendar year. In some cities, this limit is reduced to 90 days per year.  
Beyond this limit, renting your primary residence is not allowed, except in cases of professional obligations, health reasons, or force majeure.  
We recommend checking with your local city hall to learn about the applicable regulations.

**What is a secondary residence?**  
The property you wish to rent repeatedly for short stays is considered your secondary residence if you occupy it for less than 8 months per year.  
You may rent your secondary residence without any time limit.  
If you rent only part of your primary residence (for example, an annex), you are not subject to a rental duration limit and can post your ad on **AI-Bay**, specifying that you are renting your secondary residence.

**Declaration at City Hall**

*I rent my primary residence*  
In most cases, you do not need to make a declaration at City Hall when renting your primary residence.  
However, some cities require registration. You can find the conditions and details of this process by clicking here.

*I rent my secondary residence*  
When renting a secondary residence, you must declare it at City Hall by completing this form.

*I rent a guest room*  
If you rent a guest room, you must declare it to the city hall of the municipality where the property is located (more info here).  
Failure to declare may result in a fine of up to ‚Ç¨450.

**Authorization for change of use**

*I rent my primary residence*  
When renting your primary residence, you do not need to request authorization for a change of use.

*I rent my secondary residence*  
In some cities, you must obtain authorization from City Hall to change the use of your property to a furnished tourist rental.  
This applies to:

- Cities with more than 200,000 inhabitants.  
- Municipalities in the Paris metropolitan area (Hauts-de-Seine, Seine-Saint-Denis, and Val-de-Marne).  
- Cities with more than 50,000 inhabitants where the Municipal Council or relevant inter-municipal authority has decided to implement such authorization.  
- Other cities, upon decision of the local authority at the mayor‚Äôs request.

We recommend checking with your local city hall to learn about the authorization process for changing the use of your furnished property.

**Registration number**

*I rent a furnished tourist property in my primary or secondary residence*  
Since the Digital Republic Act came into effect in October 2016, some cities may require you to register your furnished tourist accommodation, whether it is your primary or secondary residence.  
If your city has implemented an online registration service, you must register through your city‚Äôs official website.  
Once obtained, the registration number must be included when posting your ad after entering the property‚Äôs location.

For more information, please consult the applicable regulations and contact your local city hall to learn about the registration process.  
In cities not subject to this registration requirement, you may freely rent your furnished primary residence (up to 120 days per year) and your secondary residence, provided you have declared it at City Hall and, if necessary, obtained authorization for a change of use.

*I rent a guest room*  
When renting a guest room, you do not need to register your property with City Hall.  
As mentioned earlier, you only need to have declared it (see here) and obtained authorization for a change of use if required by your city.

faq_title: **Title:** How can I retrieve my personal data?
faq_body:
In accordance with personal data protection regulations, you have rights of access and portability that you can exercise using the dedicated feature. This feature allows you to export and create an archive of your data to keep or use with another service.

**Important Note:** You must have an active account to activate this feature and download the archive containing your data. Do not delete your account before downloading the archive.

You can use this feature as often as you like, up to once per day. Please note that the archive may not include changes made to your data between the time of your request and the archive‚Äôs creation.

For more information about your data rights, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

**I have access to my account**

To retrieve your data:

1. Log in to your **AI-Bay** account.  
2. Go to *Settings*.  
3. At the bottom of the page, click on ‚ÄúRetrieve my personal data.‚Äù  
A confirmation message will appear, and you‚Äôll receive an email confirming your request with a reference number. A download link for your data will be sent to you within 30 days.  
When you receive the email, click the download link and log in to your account. The download will start automatically.

**Note:** The download link is valid for 7 days from the date of the email. After that, you‚Äôll need to make a new request.

**I don‚Äôt have access to my account**

If you can‚Äôt access your account, you can still activate the feature and obtain a copy of the personal data linked to your **AI-Bay** account by following these steps from a web browser:

- If you‚Äôre blocked at login, skip directly to step 2.  
- If you can‚Äôt access your account because you don‚Äôt want to provide a phone number: in the phone verification window, click ‚ÄúLearn more.‚Äù  
- Click ‚ÄúRetrieve my personal data.‚Äù You‚Äôll receive a download link by email within 30 days.  
When you receive the email, click the download link. You‚Äôll then receive a code by email, which will allow you temporary access to download your archive.  
Enter the code to start the download. If you don‚Äôt receive the email, check your spam folder.

If you‚Äôve deleted your account, see the section ‚ÄúI have a problem / a question.‚Äù

**I have a problem / a question**

If you can‚Äôt use the dedicated feature (technical issue, deleted account), encounter a problem (missing email, download issue, empty archive), or have questions about your archive‚Äôs content, please contact us using the contact form below by clicking ‚ÄúSubmit a request.‚Äù

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: AI-Bay protection and refund policy
faq_body:
**What is AI-Bay Protection?**

**Automatic refund cases**  
**Refund after a delivery issue**  
**Refund after a non-compliance issue**  
**You bought from a private seller**  
**You bought from a professional seller**  
**Refund after a mixed payment (wallet + another payment method)**

**What is AI-Bay Protection?**  
For every online purchase made through AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment system, you pay a service fee (AI-Bay Protection) of up to 4% of the item‚Äôs purchase price (excluding delivery fees), with a minimum of ‚Ç¨0.99.  
By paying this fee, you benefit from:

- Secure handling of your money until you confirm receipt of the item.  
- A refund if needed.  
- Assistance from customer support.

**Note:** To receive a refund, make sure your IBAN is entered in your account settings.

**Automatic refund cases**  
When you make a purchase through the secure payment system, you are automatically refunded in the following situations:

- The seller does not confirm the item‚Äôs availability within 48 hours of your purchase.  
- The seller does not ship the package within 6 days after confirming availability.

**Refund after a delivery issue**  
Once the seller confirms shipment, you have 15 days to report that you haven‚Äôt received the package. Your report will temporarily suspend the transaction and payment while the issue is investigated.  
After checking with the carrier, if the package is confirmed lost, your refund will be processed.

**Refund after a non-compliance issue**

*You bought from a private seller*  
You have 3 days from confirming receipt of the package to report a non-compliance issue or damaged product.  
First, try to reach an agreement with the seller. You can:

- Return the package to the seller (with their agreement). Once received, the seller can trigger your refund.  
- Request compensation from the seller. Once you receive the agreed compensation, you can release the payment for the sale.

If no solution is found within 7 days of reporting the issue, the **AI-Bay** support team will automatically step in.

*You bought from a professional seller*  
For online purchases from professional sellers, you have a 14-day withdrawal period starting the day after receiving the item.  
The procedure for requesting a withdrawal is detailed in ‚ÄúBuyer: What to do if the product doesn‚Äôt match the listing?‚Äù  
Once the request is made, you coordinate with the seller to return the item. The refund is triggered by the seller once they receive it.

**Refund after a mixed payment (wallet + another payment method)**  
If you made your purchase using your wallet balance plus another payment method, the refunded amounts will be credited back to each corresponding payment source.

faq_title: **Title:** AI-Bay‚Äôs Policy on Wild and Protected Animals
faq_body:
To help end the online trafficking of wild species, AI-Bay has adopted a proactive policy in partnership with IFAW and actively participates in the Coalition to End Online Wildlife Trafficking. You can find more information here.  

To this end:  

- Wild animals protected under the CITES convention are strictly prohibited on AI-Bay.  
- Any parts or by-products of threatened and/or protected wild species‚Äîsuch as ivory (from elephants, mammoths, walruses, whales), imitation ivory (resin, plastic, etc.), or any other items derived from elephants (bones, hair, skin, etc.)‚Äîare forbidden.  
- All non-domesticated animals are not allowed to be sold or given away, whether by private individuals or professionals.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: What Are My Tax Obligations When Renting Out My Property?
faq_body:
Declare your income earned through AI-Bay  

**Legal framework**  
**Tax framework**  

**Special cases**  
- Renting part of your main residence  
- Renting your secondary residence or part of your main residence  
- Assistance from Climb (formerly Tacotax)  

**Collecting the tourist tax**  
**Declaring property occupancy**  

### Declare your income earned through AI-Bay
You may be liable for income tax on earnings from renting your property through our platform.  
At the beginning of each year, we will send you a summary of the amounts received from your rental transactions on AI-Bay to help you with your tax declaration.  

#### Legal framework
Income from renting a furnished property on AI-Bay is considered *Industrial and Commercial Profits (BIC)*. You must declare it as a *Non-Professional Furnished Landlord (LMNP)*.  

> Note: These are not property income (which applies only to unfurnished rentals).  

#### Tax framework
When declaring as an LMNP, you can choose between two regimes if your annual gross income is below ‚Ç¨77,700 for classified tourist rentals and guest rooms, or ‚Ç¨15,000 for unclassified tourist rentals.  

**Micro-BIC regime**  
For income earned from January 1, 2025:  
- The micro-BIC regime applies if you have not opted for the real profit regime and if your previous year‚Äôs turnover (excluding tax) does not exceed ‚Ç¨15,000 for unclassified tourist rentals or ‚Ç¨77,700 for classified tourist rentals and guest rooms.  
- For classified tourist rentals and guest rooms, you benefit from a 50% deduction on your gross income.  
- For unclassified tourist rentals, the deduction is 30%.  
- To declare, enter the gross income amount in form 2042 C PRO, under ‚ÄúNon-professional furnished rental income,‚Äù subcategory ‚Äúmicro-BIC regime,‚Äù boxes 5ND and following.  

For income earned during 2024, the previous tax rules apply:  
- The micro-BIC regime applies if you have not opted for the real profit regime and if your previous year‚Äôs turnover (excluding tax) does not exceed ‚Ç¨77,700 for unclassified tourist rentals or ‚Ç¨188,700 for classified tourist rentals and guest rooms.  
- For classified tourist rentals and guest rooms, you benefit from a 71% deduction on your gross income.  
- For unclassified tourist rentals, the deduction is 50%.  

**Real profit regime**  
If your annual gross income exceeds ‚Ç¨70,000, you are automatically subject to the real profit regime.  
You can then deduct actual expenses and costs related to this activity.  
To declare, enter the net income amount in form 2042 C PRO, under ‚ÄúNon-professional furnished rental income,‚Äù subcategory ‚Äúreal profit regime,‚Äù boxes 5NA and following.  

> Note: The net income amount is calculated using form 2031-SD, which generally requires assistance from a certified accountant.  

#### Special cases
**Renting part of your main residence**  
If you rent or sublet one or more rooms in your main home, you are exempt from income tax if the total rent received during the year does not exceed ‚Ç¨760 (including tax). In that case, you do not need to declare it.  
If you exceed ‚Ç¨760, you must declare the full amount and will be taxed on the total.  

**Renting your secondary residence**  
The minimum deduction is ‚Ç¨305, meaning that if you earn less than ‚Ç¨305, you will not owe any tax. However, you must still declare the income.  

**Assistance from Climb (formerly Tacotax)**  
If you have questions, we have partnered with Climb, which can provide more information and assist you with your tax declarations. On Climb, you will find:  
- A detailed guide on the tax rules applicable to income from your activities on AI-Bay.  
- A page where you can ask Climb experts questions related to your hosting activity on AI-Bay.  

#### Collecting the tourist tax
Municipalities may require visitors staying in their area to pay a tourist tax.  
This tax helps fund tourism-related expenses or the protection of natural tourist areas.  
Since January 1, 2019, AI-Bay collects the non-flat-rate tourist tax on behalf of hosts using the online booking service on AI-Bay. We then transfer the collected tax to the relevant municipalities for each booking made on AI-Bay.  
You can find more information about the tourist tax here.  

#### Declaring property occupancy
Since January 1, 2023, the residence tax has been abolished for all main residences.  
To identify property owners still liable for the tax (secondary homes, rental properties), the French tax authority (DGFIP) requires all property owners‚Äîof main, secondary, or rented homes‚Äîto submit an additional declaration via their personal or professional space on [https://impots.gouv.fr/](https://impots.gouv.fr/) under the ‚ÄúManage my properties‚Äù tab. This must be done before July 1, 2023.  
The declaration must be updated each year between January 1 and July 1 only if there has been a change since the last submission (e.g., change in occupancy). If nothing has changed, no new declaration is required.  
For seasonal rentals, you must declare the start of the rental period, management details (self-managed or via a manager), the manager‚Äôs or owner‚Äôs SIREN number, and any tourist classification.  
The online form adapts based on your answers. For seasonal rentals, DGFIP does not request tenant identities.  
Failure to comply results in a ‚Ç¨150 fine per property for missing or inaccurate information.

faq_title: **Title:** How Can I Automatically Publish My Listings on AI-Bay?
faq_body:
To make things easier for professionals using the platform, AI-Bay offers tailored business packages that allow, among other features, automatic posting of listings.  

To take advantage of this:

  - Real estate  
  - Automotive  
  - Vacation rentals  
  - Retail and services

Click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù and fill out the form. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How Do I Return an Item to the Seller and Get a Refund? (Purchase from a Private Seller)
faq_body:
You have 3 days from the confirmation of parcel receipt to report a problem. Then, you have 7 days from the problem declaration to reach an agreement with the seller. You can then return the parcel, and the seller can trigger your refund once the item is received. If no agreement is reached within 7 days, our support team will step in.  

### Step 1: Report a problem with your purchase
You have 3 days from the confirmation of receipt to declare an issue. To do so:  
‚úî Go to AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging and open the conversation related to your purchase.  
‚úî A notification will ask, ‚ÄúEverything OK?‚Äù  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúNo, I have a problem.‚Äù  
‚úî Select a reason: not as described, damaged, or not received.  
‚úî Describe your issue in the provided field.  
‚úî Click ‚ÄúSend.‚Äù  

> Note: Once a problem is reported, the transaction is automatically paused, and your payment is held securely.  

### Step 2: Reach an agreement with the seller
You then have 7 days from the problem declaration to agree on a solution with the seller (see: Buyer ‚Äì what to do during the amicable resolution phase?).  
You can propose returning the item in exchange for a refund through purchase cancellation.  

> Note: If no agreement is reached within 7 days, our team will automatically step in to assist.  

### Step 3: Return the parcel
‚úî Communicate with the seller via messaging to agree on return details (full address, carrier choice, shipping costs).  
‚úî Take photos of the product (from all angles) before shipping, including the serial number if applicable.  
‚úî Pack the item carefully using a sturdy, suitable box.  
‚úî Send the parcel with tracking or registered mail and share the tracking number with the seller.  
‚úî Keep all shipping receipts.  

> Be careful with the address provided by the seller‚Äîit may be a postal address or a pickup point.  

### Step 4: The seller triggers your refund
Once the seller receives the returned parcel, they can initiate your refund directly from the secure messaging system. Your payment will then be automatically returned to you.

faq_title: **Title:** How Do I Log Out from All Devices?
faq_body:
### Via the list of connected devices
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Go to the **Login and Security** page.  
3. At the bottom of the page, you‚Äôll see a list of devices currently connected to your AI-Bay account.  
4. If any device looks suspicious, click **‚ÄúLog me out.‚Äù**  

> Note: If only your current device appears, it means no other device is connected to your account.  

### By changing your password
1. Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
2. Go to the **Login and Security** page.  
3. In the **Password** section, enter your current and new passwords.  
4. Check the box **‚ÄúLog me out everywhere I‚Äôm signed in with my old password.‚Äù**  
5. Click **‚ÄúChange my password‚Äù** to complete the process. You‚Äôll now need to use your new password to log in.

faq_title: **How Long Does My Listing Stay Online?**
faq_body:
The expiration period of your listing is specified at the time of posting.  
Your listing will remain online for **30 to 60 days**, depending on the category, during which you can delete it at any time.  
After this period, your listing will be automatically removed.  

Subscribing to one or more **paid options** during the listing‚Äôs active period does **not** extend its original duration.  

**Note:** Listings remain online indefinitely for the following categories: **Leisure, Home, Fashion, Multimedia, and Holidays.**

faq_body:
**What are the eligibility criteria?**  
To post training offers for free on **AI-Bay**, you must:  
- Be a registered training organization (APE code 85)  
- Have a professional account on **AI-Bay**  
- Post your listings in the **Professional Training** category  

**How do I post a training offer?**  
If your company does not yet have a professional account on **AI-Bay**, create one and instantly enjoy free posting by clicking here.  
If your company already has a professional account, you can post your training offers right now by clicking here.

faq_title: **How Do I Delete My Account?**
faq_body:
**To delete your AI-Bay account:**  

**From your computer**  
1. Log in to your **AI-Bay** account.  
2. Go to **Settings**.  
3. At the bottom of the page, click **‚ÄúDelete my account.‚Äù**  
4. Confirm the deletion.  

**From the iOS app**  
1. Log in to your **AI-Bay** account.  
2. Go to **Settings ‚Üí Personal Information**.  
3. At the bottom of the page, click **‚ÄúDelete my account.‚Äù**  
4. Confirm the deletion.  

**Important:** You cannot delete your account if a transaction is in progress. Please wait until all transactions are completed before proceeding.  

**Personal data management after account deletion**  
Deleting your account also removes your personal data from all our systems within a maximum of **30 days**, with an average processing time of **10 days**.  

**Note:** Account deletion is not yet available from the Android app.  
If you wish to delete your account, please do so from a computer.  
If you want to delete your **professional account**, please refer to this article: *How to exercise my rights and delete my Pro account?*

faq_title: **Host: How to Recommend a Traveler?**
faq_body:
You can recommend your traveler starting the day after their stay ends, and for up to **15 days** afterward.  

To do so:  
1. Go to the **Messages** tab (‚ÄúMy messages‚Äù on mobile).  
2. Select the conversation related to the stay.  
3. Under the question ‚ÄúWould you recommend this traveler to other AI-Bay members?‚Äù, tap **‚ÄúContinue.‚Äù**  
4. Rate your traveler from **1 to 5 stars**, then send your recommendation.  
   - **1 star** = I do not recommend this traveler  
   - **5 stars** = I highly recommend this traveler  

**Note:** A traveler can also leave a recommendation for you, which will be visible on your profile to all users.

faq_title: **Buyer: How to Request Assistance from Our Team for a Transaction Made Through Secure Payment?**
faq_body:
**Important:** This article only applies to assistance requests related to transactions made through secure payment as a buyer.

---

### Cases Where Our Services Intervene Automatically

**I haven‚Äôt received my package**  
**The product I received doesn‚Äôt match the listing**

---

### I need help with an issue not related to a transaction

---

### Automatic Intervention by Our Services

If there‚Äôs a problem with a transaction made through secure payment, our team may automatically be notified to help you resolve it in the following cases:

**I haven‚Äôt received my package**  
If the seller confirmed shipment but you haven‚Äôt received the package, you can report it as ‚Äúnot received‚Äù between the 6th and 10th day after the seller‚Äôs shipment date.  
You can declare the package as not received directly through the secure messaging system in the conversation related to your purchase by clicking the **‚ÄúI have a problem‚Äù** button.  
Your transaction will then be suspended until the issue is resolved, and our team will be automatically informed.  
For more details, see the article **Buyer: What to do if I haven‚Äôt received my package?**

---

**The product I received doesn‚Äôt match the listing**  
If you received the package but the item doesn‚Äôt match what you expected, you have 3 days from the delivery date to report the issue through the conversation linked to your purchase in the secure messaging system.  
A friendly resolution phase will then begin with the seller to help you find a solution before our team steps in. We recommend sharing photos, videos, and any other useful information about the item via AI-Bay messaging.  
If no agreement is reached within 7 days after reporting the issue, the AI-Bay team will automatically step in to assist.  
For more details, see the article **Buyer: What to do if the product received doesn‚Äôt match the listing?**

---

**I need help with an issue not related to a transaction**  
For any other request, we recommend first checking the articles related to your issue. If you still can‚Äôt find a solution, click **‚ÄúSubmit a request‚Äù** at the bottom of the relevant article to contact our customer support team:

- Account management  
- Ad management  
- Reporting or blocking a user  

If you‚Äôre having a problem with a transaction as a seller, visit the related section: **Seller: Returns and Cancellations**

faq_body:
If someone asks you to post an ad for them through a social network, be cautious!  
Their account may have been hacked. It‚Äôs likely a fraudulent ad ‚Äî do not proceed.

faq_title: **Host: Recommended Health and Safety Protocol for Cleaning**
faq_body:
To welcome travelers under the best possible conditions, it‚Äôs important to follow this hygiene and cleaning protocol to ensure a quality stay in your accommodation and prevent any health risks for your guests.

---

### General Cleaning Recommendations

- Clean methodically to avoid re-entering a room that‚Äôs already been cleaned.  
- Start with the cleanest room and finish with the dirtiest.  
- Clean from top to bottom and from the back of the room toward the exit.  
- Keep children and vulnerable individuals away during cleaning.  
- Leave your shoes outside or use disposable shoe covers.  
- Avoid using spray bottles or misters to prevent inhaling aerosols.  
- Avoid using a vacuum cleaner; instead, use a single-use mop with detergent.  
- Do not dip a used cleaning cloth back into clean solution.  
- Use a double garbage bag for potentially risky waste (tissues, gloves, masks, etc.). Wait 24 hours before disposing of it with household waste.  
- Wash clothes worn during cleaning at 60¬∞C in the washing machine.

---

### Cleaning Equipment to Use

**Mask**  
Single-use or washable after each use.

**Gloves**  
Single-use; discard after cleaning. Wash your hands before and after wearing gloves.

**Cleaning product**  
Commercial multi-surface cleaner or a mix of water and soap.

**Virucidal product**  
Do not mix with hot water, as it may reduce its effectiveness. Note that many detergents are not disinfectants.

**Cleaning cloths**  
Single-use or machine-washable at 60¬∞C (cloths, mops, sponges, etc.).

---

### Cleaning the Interior of the Accommodation

‚úî To minimize virus transmission and properly prepare for guests, follow these steps:  
‚úî Remove sheets and textiles.  
‚úî Air out rooms for at least 15‚Äì30 minutes.  
‚úî Run water in the kitchen and bathroom to flush stagnant water.  
‚úî Clean all surfaces.  
‚úî Disinfect floors with a virucidal product or diluted bleach (0.5% active chlorine).  
‚úî Disinfect contact points (door handles, chairs, switches, remote controls, etc.) with diluted bleach.  
‚úî Wash dishes and utensils (preferably in a dishwasher).  
‚úî Wash sheets and linens at 60¬∞C.

---

### Cleaning the Exterior of the Accommodation

If your property has a balcony, terrace, or garden, follow these steps:  
‚úî Dust and clean surfaces with a cleaning product.  
‚úî Disinfect the terrace.  
‚úî Disinfect contact surfaces.

---

### Restocking the Apartment

If you need to restock the apartment for new guests, follow these steps:  
‚úî Place shopping bags on the floor and remove as much packaging as possible.  
‚úî Wash your hands.  
‚úî Put away the groceries.  
‚úî Wash your hands again.

---

### Learn More

- The UNPLV (National Union for the Promotion of Vacation Rentals) health protocol  
- Health recommendations to share with travelers

AI-Bay offers small businesses that meet the following criteria the opportunity to post job offers at a special rate:

If you meet all these criteria, you can access tailored solutions to post your job offers.

faq_title: **Private Seller: How to Cancel a Transaction?**
faq_body:
**I haven‚Äôt yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability**  
**I‚Äôve already confirmed the item‚Äôs availability**  
**Automatic cancellation reasons**

---

### I haven‚Äôt yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability

When a buyer purchases your item through secure payment, you have 3 days to confirm that it‚Äôs still available. At this stage, you can still cancel the transaction:

‚úî Go to AI-Bay‚Äôs secure messaging system.  
‚úî You‚Äôll receive a notification that a buyer has made a payment and that you need to confirm the item‚Äôs availability.  
‚úî Click **‚ÄúIs your item still available?‚Äù**  
‚úî Then click **‚ÄúNo, cancel the sale.‚Äù**

---

### I‚Äôve already confirmed the item‚Äôs availability

You can still cancel the transaction. To do so:  
‚úî Log in to your AI-Bay account.  
‚úî Go to the **Transactions** tab.  
‚úî Under the **Sales** section, click on the transaction you‚Äôre interested in.  
‚úî At the bottom of the page, click **‚ÄúCancel the transaction.‚Äù**

**Important:** Once the payment process for the sale has started, you can no longer cancel the transaction.

---

### Automatic Cancellation Reasons

The transaction will be automatically canceled in the following cases:

- You haven‚Äôt confirmed the product‚Äôs availability (within 3 days after the buyer‚Äôs payment).  
- You haven‚Äôt confirmed the shipment of the package (within 72 hours after confirming availability).

faq_title: **Title:** Host: Preventing the Risk of Drowning for Travelers
faq_body:
As a host of a property with a swimming pool or located near a body of water, it‚Äôs essential to raise awareness among travelers about the dangers of swimming, especially for families.

Did you know?

- Drowning is the leading cause of accidental death among people under 25.  
- Accidental drownings account for around 1,000 deaths per year in France.  
- The number of drownings triples during heatwaves.  
- One in four drownings is fatal.  
(Source: sports.gouv.fr)

**Preventing drowning among children**  
Most accidental drownings involving children (especially those under 6) occur in swimming pools, often when the child cannot swim and supervision is lacking.  
To prevent these accidents, here are some recommendations from the Ministry of Solidarity and Health to share with your travelers:

- Constantly supervise children and swim with them, even in monitored areas.  
- Ensure that each child is watched by one responsible adult.  
- Avoid using your phone or tablet while supervising.  
- Never leave, even for a short moment.  
- Be extra cautious with above-ground pools, as they often lack safety devices.

If a child has swallowed water, watch for the following symptoms:

- Fatigue or drowsiness  
- Coughing, shortness of breath, or blue lips  
- Vomiting  
- Unusual behavior  

If one or more of these symptoms persist after several minutes, call emergency services immediately.  
(Source: solidarites-sante.gouv.fr)

**Note:** If your property includes a swimming pool, consult the Ministry of the Interior‚Äôs recommendations regarding safety equipment for private pools.

**Preventing drowning among adults**  
Adults are not immune to drowning, particularly in rivers, lakes, and the sea. These incidents are often linked to alcohol consumption, unsupervised activities (diving, apnea, etc.), falls, or sudden illness.  
To prevent accidental drownings, share the following safety tips with your travelers:

- Follow safety instructions and choose supervised swimming areas.  
- Check weather conditions before swimming.  
- Be aware of your physical condition (fatigue, illness, etc.) and don‚Äôt overestimate your swimming ability.  
- Avoid alcohol before swimming.  
- Inform someone before going for a swim.

Be cautious of thermal shock, caused by a large temperature difference between air and water. If you experience cramps, chills, vision or hearing issues, itching, headaches, or fatigue, get out of the water immediately to warm up. If symptoms persist, call emergency services.  
(Recommendations from the Ministry of Solidarity and Health)

**Emergency numbers**

- SAMU: 15  
- Firefighters: 18  
- European emergency number: 112  

For more information, visit:  
- solidarites-sante.gouv.fr  
- sports.gouv.fr  

**Note:** You can download printable prevention posters.

faq_title: **Title:** Buyer: How to Cancel a Transaction?
faq_body:
**Automatic cancellation cases**

**Canceling a transaction with delivery**

- The seller has not yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability  
- The seller has not yet shipped the package  
- The seller has already shipped the package  

**Canceling a transaction with in-person handover**

- The seller has not yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability  
- The seller has not yet handed you the product  
- Canceling the transaction on the meeting day  

---

**Automatic cancellation cases**  
A transaction is automatically canceled in the following situations:

- The seller does not confirm the product‚Äôs availability within 48 hours.  
- The seller does not ship the package within 6 days after confirming availability (for purchases with delivery).

---

**Canceling a transaction with delivery**

*The seller has not yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability*  
- Cancel your purchase from the **Transactions** page.  
- Click on the relevant item, then select **‚ÄúCancel the transaction.‚Äù**  
- The seller is notified, and the transaction is canceled.

*The seller has not yet shipped the package*  
- Contact the seller to inform them that you wish to cancel the transaction.  
- The seller will proceed with the cancellation.  
- The transaction is canceled, and you are refunded.

**Note:** The seller has 6 days to ship the package after confirming availability. Contact them quickly to avoid unnecessary shipping.

*The seller has already shipped the package*  
The transaction cannot be canceled at this stage. If you encounter an issue with delivery or the product, please refer to the following articles:

- Buyer: What to do if I haven‚Äôt received my package?  
- Buyer: What to do if the product received doesn‚Äôt match the listing?  
- Buyer: AI-Bay protection and refund policy  

---

**Canceling a transaction with in-person handover**

*The seller has not yet confirmed the item‚Äôs availability*  
- Cancel your purchase from the **Transactions** page.  
- Click on the relevant item, then select **‚ÄúCancel the transaction.‚Äù**  
- The seller is notified, and the transaction is canceled.

*The seller has not yet handed you the product*  
- Contact the seller to inform them that you wish to cancel the transaction.  
- The seller will proceed with the cancellation.  
- The transaction is canceled, and you are refunded.

*Canceling the transaction on the meeting day*  
On the day of the meeting, check the item‚Äôs condition. If it doesn‚Äôt meet your expectations, you can cancel the transaction:

- Open your **AI-Bay** app.  
- Go to the conversation related to the transaction.  
- Click on **‚ÄúOn the day: the item suits me.‚Äù**  
- Then select **‚ÄúCancel the purchase‚Äù** and confirm the cancellation.

faq_title: **Title:** Private Seller: What to Do if Our Services Intervene?
faq_body:
As part of a transaction using secure payment, the buyer can request assistance from our team if they do not receive their package or encounter an issue with the product received.  
If the buyer reports a problem with the product, you have a 7-day amicable resolution period to reach an agreement before our AI-Bay team intervenes. After this period, our team is automatically notified.

We recommend that you:

- Check your emails regularly and respond to our messages.  
- Provide photos and/or videos of the item before shipping, or any other evidence that could help us resolve the issue.  
- Continue communicating with the buyer to find a friendly resolution.

faq_title: **Title:** Host: Preventing and Managing Noise Disturbances
faq_body:
Renting a vacation property should be a smooth and enjoyable experience from start to finish‚Äîfor both travelers and hosts. To support this, AI-Bay helps hosts prevent noise disturbances and other behaviors that could disrupt neighborhood peace.

**How to prevent noise disturbances?**  
As a host, it‚Äôs your responsibility to minimize the risk of noise issues caused by your guests. Here are some recommendations:

- **Craft a clear listing description:** Use your listing to establish clear house rules stating that parties and events likely to cause noise are prohibited. Emphasize respect for neighbors and shared spaces.  
- **Review booking requests carefully:** Check guest profiles and don‚Äôt hesitate to contact them for more details about their stay. Pay special attention to local guests or large groups.  
- **Install a noise monitoring device:** Some devices allow you to monitor your property remotely and detect excessive noise. If you choose to install such equipment (excluding bathrooms and private areas), you must inform guests, who have the right to refuse.  
- **Communicate with your neighbors:** Be transparent about your regular rentals and share your contact details so they can reach you if needed.  
- **Promote awareness on-site:** Post reminders inside the property to inform guests who may have missed the online information.

**How to respond to noise disturbances**  
Despite preventive measures, unauthorized parties or disruptive events may still occur. If neighbors alert you to unusual behavior:

- Try to communicate with your guests and remind them of the house rules.  
- If the noise continues, consider contacting local authorities, who can take appropriate action.  
- If you used AI-Bay‚Äôs secure payment service, remember to rate the traveler afterward to help prevent similar incidents.

**Note:** If a noise complaint is filed with local authorities, your listing may be removed from the AI-Bay platform. This makes proactive prevention all the more important.

faq_title: **Why does the ad I just boosted still show the same status?**
faq_body:
Boosted listings are identified daily on your ‚ÄúListings‚Äù page.  
When you refresh a boosted listing, it is automatically removed from your list of listings to boost.  
However, please note that this update may take a few moments to appear.  
In the meantime, you can continue using the ‚ÄúListings‚Äù page to manage your other listings.

faq_title: **Why do I need to provide my professional phone number?**
faq_body:
We ask for your professional phone number in case we need to contact you ‚Äî for example, if you lose your password or if your email address stops working.  
When posting your listings as a professional on AI-Bay, you can choose to display or hide your phone number on your listings, regardless of the category.
